src_text: Ukulawulwa Kwehlekelele Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Taolo ya Dikoduwa Kamora Dikgohola.

src_text: IKhabinethi ililele beyaduduza boke abantu ababhujelweko eenkhukhuleni zamhlapha ezisahlele iindawo ezimbadlwana zelizwe, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebisitse matshediso bathong bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona dikgoholeng tsa morao tse mpe tse ileng tsa hlasela dibaka tse ngata tsa naha ya rona, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal..     Sepheo ka tsebahatso ya Maemo Dikoduwa Naha le dithuso tsa boiphediso tse sa tswa tsebahatswa ke Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne le ho netefatsa karabelo atlehileng le hlophisehileng makaleng ohle mmuso, ka Setsi sa Taolo ya Naha ya Dikoduwa.

Biliyone ya diranta eo mmuso e ntshitseng sebedisetswa ho tshehetsa maiteko dithuso le ho iphumana, ho kgutlisa ditshebeletso tsa motheo le ho phallela ba hlokang ka ho ba thusa ka dijo, metsi, botshabelo, tsa bohlweki le diaparo.

src_text: Ukumenyezelwa kobuJamo beHlekelele eliZweniloke kunye namagadango wokusiza ukwethula abantu umthwalo kezehlalakuhle nezomnotho, njengoba kumemezele uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa mhlapha, bekunqophe ukuletha ihlelo elihle lokulamulela abantu kizo zoke iingaba zikarhulumende, ngeZiko lokuLawula iHlekelele eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Motjha wa ho aha botjha dibaka tse amehileng se qadile mme le batho ba naha ya rona ba kopane ka maikemisetso ho thusa ba lahlehetsweng ke bodulo le thepa ya bona..     Tlhahisoleseding ka Lefu laCoronavirus (COVID-19).

Kabinete kgathatsehile ka ho eketseha ha morao tjena ha ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 dikarolong tse ding tsa naha mme ipileditse ho bohle ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa kgahlano le vaerase ena kotsi, haholoholo mariha tjena..     Vaerase ena ntse le kotsi mme ho enta ntse le sebetsa se bohlokwa haholo seo re ka itshireletsang ka sona.

src_text: Imali eyibhiliyoni yamarandi ekhutjhwe ngurhulumende isetjenziselwa ukusekela imizamo yokusiza nokulungisa, ukubuyisa izenzelwa ekuphilwa ngazo, ukunikela ngesizo leendingo zesitjhaba ezinjengokugoma, amanzi, iindawo  zokuhlala, ihlelo lehlanzeko yomphakathi kunye nezembatho.
tgt_text: Kabinete thabiswa ke hore batho ba bangata ba ntse ba kgetha ho enta le tshireletso ya bona ya pele kgahlano le COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao di bontshe hore batho ba baholo ba fetang dipersente tse mashome mahlano ba se ba entile diprovenseng tse hlano..     Kabinete ipiletsa ho ba so ente ho enta molemong wa ho itshireletsa le beng ka bona.

Bohle re lokela ho tswela pele le ho ikamahanya le melao ya ho itshireletsa ho COVID-19 kenyeletsang ho rwala semonkwana se kwahelang nko le molomo, ho hlapa matsoho ka metsi le sesepa, kapa ho sebedisa sehlwekisi se nang le alcohol ballwang dipersenteng tse 70, le ho arohana le ba bang ka bonnyane mitara..     Thuso Imollang Nakong ya Mathata (SRD).

src_text: Selithomile ihlelo lokuvuselela iindawo ezithintekileko njengoba abantu belizwe lekhethu babumbana bancamele ukusiza labo abagirikelwe ziinkumba bebonakalelwa yipahla.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgothaleditse baahi ba fumanang R350 ya SRDGrant ho etsa dikopo hape, kamora hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong melawana metjha laolang dikopo le ho lokela ha batho ho fumana dithuso.

Dikopo di ka etswa websaeteng ya Setheo sa Dithuso tsa Setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SASSA) leng:https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.Mokgwatshebetso wa dikopo butswe ka la 23 Mmesa 2022 mme etswa inthaneteng molemong wa ho potlakisa katleho ya ona..     Thuso ena ya ho imolla bohlokwa haholo malapeng hlokang le ka sulafallwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la bofuma le ho hloka mesebetsi.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho fana ka dithuso tsa setjhaba hoba hlokang haholo ba kgone ho fumana tseo ba di hlokang tsa motheo..     Polokeho le Tshireletseho.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyelele beyitshwenyekile ngokwanda kwabantu abangenwe yi-COVID-19 kezinye iingcenye zelizweli, yabe yakhwezelela boke abantu ukuthi batjheje, bazivikele kilengogwana engumabhubhisa, khulukhulu ebusika nje.
tgt_text: Kabinete tswella le ho nyatsa ho bolawa ka sehloho ha basadi mme ananetse karabelo potlakileng ya mapolesa ha tshwara babelaellwa polaong ya Mofumahatsana Hillary Gardee (28), waKamaguguMpumalanga.
Kabinete boetse nyatsitse ho bolawa ha batho ba tsheletseng Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.

src_text: Ingogwana le solo isese yingozi ebantwini, begodu ukujova solo kusese kuphela kwesikhali esinamandla ukuzidlula zoke sokuzivikela.
tgt_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho di re hopotsa hore re lokela ho sebetsa ka matla re le setjhaba ho fedisa dikgoka le dikgoka tsa bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete ipileditse ho bohle naheng ena ho sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ntweng kgahlano le bosenyi le GBVF.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozile ukubona ukuthi bayanda abantu abakhetha ukuhlaba njengendlela yokuthoma nenamandla khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngemva kobana iimbalobalo zitjengise ukuthi sesiwadlulile ama-50% wabantu abakhulu esele bahlabile eemfundeni ezihlanu.
tgt_text: Mmoho re ka netefatsa hore metse le diterata tsa rona di bolokehile bakeng sa batho bohle, ho kenyeletsa maqheku, basadi le bana..     Moruo.
Kabinete ananetse ho bulwa semmuso ha feme ya ho etsa ditene ya Kwastina ya Corobrik, Driefontein,Gauteng ke Presidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro la la 4 Motsheanong.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela boke labo abangakahlabi ukuthi basize bayokuhlaba kobanyana bazokuvikeleka, bavikele nabathandiweko babo.
tgt_text: Feme ena ya maemo phahameng haholo ke karolo ya matsete diranta tse dimiliyone tse 800 tsamayang mmoho le diranta tse ding tse dimiliyone tse 200 tse behetsweng ho atolosa feme ya Corobrik ya konkreiti KwaZulu-Natal.Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo tsa mona tse ileng tsa utlwa boipiletso ba Presidente Ramaphosa ba hore dikgwebo tsa Afrika Borwa le tsa matjhaba di tsetele moruong wa naha ena.

src_text: Soke kufuze bona sihlale sithobela imilayelo yokukhandela ukungenwa yi-COVID-19; sembathe imaski evala umlomo nepumulo, sihlale sihlamba izandla zethu ngamanzi nesibha, namkha sihlikihle izandla zethu ngesihlanzekisi esine-alkhoholi ema-70%, sibe sihlale maqalanga kabanye abantu, ubuncani bakhona siqalangane ngemitha.
tgt_text: Kabinete elelletswe hore moruo fokolang wahydrogen matlafaditswe kamora ho thakgolwa ha lori sebedisang hydrogen ke Anglo American.
Lori ena neng sebedisa diesel mme ya fetolelwa tshebedisong ya hydrogen le sebedisang le dibetri tsa lithium-ion keya pele lefatsheng.

src_text: Isibonelelo SezeHlalakuhle sokuBonelela ebuJameni bamaTlhuwo (i-SRD) .
tgt_text: Moruo wahydrogen hlwauwe le lewa le pele moruong wa naha ya rona lwantshang tshenyo ya tikoloho, mme moruo ona tla ntshetsa pele kgolo moruong thuse le ho thehweng ha mesebetsi..     Kabinetee boetse ananetse matsete mang moruong wa rona ka khampani ya dijo ya Ireland, The Kerry Group butseng feme ya diranta tse dimiliyone tse 650, Hammarsdale,KwaZulu-Natal, eo sepheo ka yona leng ho hlahisa dijo ho ya ho ile kontinenteng.

src_text: 1 IKhabinethi ikhuthaza izakhamuzi ezirhola isibonelelo esiyi-R350 ukuthi zifake iimbawo zazo zesibonelelo ngobutjha, njengoba sekunemibandela emitjha elawula iimbawo zokuthola lesisibonelelo nje.
tgt_text: Feme ena ke ikgethang hobane na le dikarolo tsa moshwelella tse kenyeletsang disebediswa tsa eneji nyenyane, tlhahiso ya matla letsatsi ho fokotsa tshebediso ya motlakase wa keriti ya naha ena, mokgwa wa paballo ya eneji, le wa paballo ya metsi, tshebediso ya ona hape le mokgwa wa ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona.
The Kerry Group fihlile Afrika Borwa ka 2011, mme matsete yona amang ke letshwao la hore Afrika Borwa ntse ratelwa matsete.

src_text: 2     Iimbawo zingafakwa kubunzinzolwazi be-Ejensi yeeMbonelelo zeSondlo noMhlalaphasi kaRhulumende yeSewula Afrika (i-SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Matsete ana tla kamora ho thakgolwa ha vene ena ya Isuzu D-Max hlahisitsweng naheng, Gqeberha, Kapa Botjhabela kgweding fetileng.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufaka iimbawo livulwe ngomhla wama-23 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022, kanti-ke lisebenza budijithali ngokupheleleko kobanyana lizokukhamba msinyana.
tgt_text: Koloi ena ya D-MAX ya mehleng ena bontsha boinehelo ba Isuzu naheng ena mmeke nngwe ya dikatleho tse fihletsweng tlasa Lenaneo la Ntshetsopele ya Tlhahiso ya Makoloi (APDP).

APDP ke mokgwatshebetso wa kgothatso wa tlhahiso bakeng sa indasteri ya makoloi oo sepheo ka ona leng ho phahamisa tlhahiso indastering boletsweng ya makoloi, ho phahamisa bolengindastering mme ka tsela ena ho thehwe mesebetsi makaleng ohle amanang le tlhahiso ya makoloi.Kediranta tse dibiliyone tse batlang di eba 2,8 tse tla etswa ka tlhahiso ya mona nakong ya tshebetso ya APDP.

src_text: 3     Isibonelelwesi sezehlalakuhle esithula abantu umthwalo weendleko siligadango eliqakathekileko emakhaya anganabuyo, abekangadosa emhlweni ngomtlhago wobuchaka nangokungasebenzi.
tgt_text: Matsete tla thusa ho theha mesebetsi fetang 1000 ka palo ka kotloloho femeng, le meng ya tlatsetso hirang batho ba 24 000, mme sena se tla kenya letsoho matlafatsong ya baahi lebatoweng.

src_text: Urhulumende uzibophelele ukusiza abantu abasengozini ekulu yokucaphazeka kobanyana bazokukghona ukutjheja iindingo zabo zokuphila.
tgt_text: Seboka sa tsa Merafo.

Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centreho tloha ka la 9 ho ya ho la 12 Motsheanong 2022, ke le leng la mapatlelo maholo ho bontshana le tshebedisano pakeng tsa ba amehang indastering ya merafo.

src_text: Ukuphepha Nokuvikeleka.
tgt_text: Mookotaba wa ketsahalo ena ne le: “Ntshetsopele ho tsa Merafo Afrika: Matsete Diphetohong ho tsa Eneji, ESG, leMeruo”.

src_text: IKhabinethi solo ikhalima ngamagama abukhali izenzo zokubulawa ngesihluku kwabantu abasikazi, nje-ke ikuthokozele nokubotjhwa msinyana kwabasolwa ngecala lokubulawa kwakaMma.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore Seboka sa tsa Merafo se tla thusa ho pepesa le ho phahamisa Afrika Borwa jwaloka naha ka kgahlang batsetedi..     Afrika Borwa amohela matsete naheng ya rona mme inehetse ho theheng maemo loketseng kgolo kenyeletsang bohle le diphetoho moruong..     Dikamano le Dinaha tsa Matjhaba le tsa Mabatowa.

src_text: u-Hillary Gardee (obekaneminyaka ema-28) obekahlala Kamagugu, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse ditherisano tsa morao tjena tsa Presidente Ramaphosa le Presidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Presidente Emmanuel Macron wa France le Presidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mapatlelong fapaneng.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, iKhabinethi ikuhlabile nokubulawa kwabantu abasithandathu eKhayelitsha, e-Cape Town.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tsena di nehile Presidente monyetla wa ho tiisa maqhama le tshebedisano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding ditabeng tsa bohlokwa boemong ba mabatowa le matjhaba, ho kenyeletsa ho fumana tharollo ya kgotso ntweng ya Ukraine     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Lezizenzo zokubulalela butjhwileni zisikhumbuzo sokuthi kusese kunengi ekusamele sikwenze simphakathi ukuqeda inturhu eqothele bobulili obuthileko nomukghwa wokubulawa kwabantu abasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete.

Kabinete ipiletsa ho baahi bohle ho mamela Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete tsa mafapha naha mmuso le puo ya lefapha la Bopresidente molemong wa hore ba behe mmuso leihlo..     Ha ho tekwa Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso, mafapha ohle fana ka dintlha tse felletseng tsa merero le tsa bohlokwa tseo ikemiseditseng ho di phetha selemong.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu elizweni lekhethweli ukuthi basebenzisane ngokusizana norhulumende ukulwisana ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso ke ho netefatsa hore ditjhelete tsa setjhaba di sebediswa hantle ho thusa setjhaba ka tseo di se hlokang.

src_text: Ngokusebenzisana singaqinisekisa ukuthi umphakathi neentrada zekhethu ziphephile ebantwini boke, abadala nabancani, abatjha nabentwana.
tgt_text: Dipuo tsa ditekanyetso di boetse ke monyetla wa hore Matona hlalose haholwanyane ka mosebetsi wa mmuso, ho kenyeletsa dikatleho le diphephetso tseo tobanang le tsona.
Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya Kgase ya Mafura (LPG).

src_text: Umnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya LPG, le phatlaladitsweng hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona ka Tlhakubele.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvulwa kwefemu epheka iintina i-Kwastina,  engaphasi kwe-Corobrik, ese-Driefontein e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho atolosa indasteri ya kgase ya mafura naheng.

src_text: Ifemu le ivulwe nguMengameli u-Ramaphosa ngeLesithathu womhla we-04 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: LPG tla ba le seabo se molemo phapanong ya mehlodi ya eneji..     Hara tse ding lewa le tla laola theko makaleng fapaneng tlhahiso le ho tshehetsa tlhahiso ya meqomo ya LPG naheng ena.

src_text: Ifemu le engeyezinga eliphezulu lokupheka iintina, iyingcenye yamasiso we-R800 weengidi akhambisana nenye i-R200 yeengidi enqophe ukukhulisa umsebenzi wekhonkhreyidi wakwa-Corobrik KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Le tla boela le rute setjhaba ka melemo ya ho sebedisa LPG jwaloka mofuta mong wa eneji..

src_text: I-Corobrik ingenye yamabhizinisi ambadlwana weSewula Afrikapha aphendule isibawo sikaMengameli Ramaphosa  sokukhombela amabhizinisi weSewula Afrika newamazwe ngamazwe ukuthi asisise emnothweni welizwe leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Le tla fumaneha kamora hore le phatlalatswe ke Lefapha la Diminerale le Eneji howww.dmr.gov.za.
Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha Mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.

src_text: IKhabinethi itjheje ukuthi umnotho we-hayidrojini osakhasako unikelwe amandla ngokwethulwa kwelori ekhamba ngerhasi ye-hayidrojini yi-Anglo American.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.

src_text: Ilori le – etjhugululwe ekukhambeni ngedizeli yakhanjiswa nge-hydrogen, esebenzisa amabhethri we-lithium-ion, ingeyokuthoma yalomhlobo ephasini.
tgt_text: Moralotshebetso tla tataisa lekala la poraefete le la setjhaba hore netefatse ho sireletswa ha ditokelo tsa basa itekanelang, jwalokaha di sireleditswe le Molaong wa Motheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: Umnotho we-hayidrojini ubekiswe njengeqalontanzi lamaqhinga emnothweni welizwe lekhethu onganarhasi esilaphazako, nokuzakuphakamisa ukuhluma komnotho nokuvula imisebenzi.

tgt_text: Moralotshebetso nehelana kadisebediswa tse tla thusa ho tlosa kgethollo thibelang ho nkuwa ha diqeto, haholoholo tse amanang le batho basa itekanelang boetse lemosa batho ba sa itekanelang hore ba tsebe ditokelo tsa bona jwalokaha di sireleditswe ke Molao wa Motheo.Moralotshebetso boetse fana ka thupelo hlokomedise mehloding ya ditaba le setjhabeng ka ditokelo tsa batho basa itekanelang thusa ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang.Afrika Borwa saenne Tumellano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Ditokelo tsa Batho basa Itekanelang mmoho le Tokomaneya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) yaLekgotla la Tumellano la Ditokelo tsa Botho le Batho Afrika mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang leng Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa basa Itekanelang Afrika).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokhunye ukusisa emnothweni wekhethu yikhamphani ekhiqiza ukugoma ye-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, yona evule ifemu etja ye-R650 yeengidi e-Hammersdale, KwaZulu-Natala, enqophe ukwenzela ikhonthinenti ye-Afrika ukugoma okubambelelako.
tgt_text: Ho bontshanwe le bohle ba amehang, ho kenyeletsa Ntshetsopele ya Moruo ya Naha le Lekgotlala Basebetsi..     Seboka sa Lefatshe Metseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe.

src_text: Ifemu le ihlukile kezinye ngoba yona inezinto ezimbadlwana ezizakwenza bona ukugoma kuhlale kukhona; hlangana nazo kubalwa neensetjenziswa ezingasebenzisi iimbaseli ngobunengi,  nezisebenza ngomtjhiso welanga ukuphehla igezi, okuzakusi ukuphungula ukusetjenziswa kwegezi enengi kile ephehlwa ziimphehligezi njenganje, nezikghona ukubamba zilonde umtjhiso ebewungalahlwa, nokulondeka kwamanzi, nokusetjenziswa kwamanzi ngobutjha kunye nokuphunguleka kwamanzi asetjenziswako.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seboka saMetse ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022, Gauteng..     Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Maikutlo ka Seboka saMetseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Tlhakubele.

src_text: I-Kerry Group solo yafika lapha eSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-2011, kanti-ke ukungezelela kwayo amasiso wayo lapha ekhethu kusitjengiso sokuthi iSewula Afrika solo ililizwe elenyulelwa ukusisa kilo.
tgt_text: Kabinete laetse hore ho be le dipontshano tse ding lebohle ba amehang..     Seboka ke sehlohlolo sa mosebetsi entsweng ngwahola ileng wa nonya maikutlo ba fapaneng ba amehang     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.

src_text: Lamasiso-ke alandela ukwethulwa kweveni  Isuzu D-Max efemini yeGqeberha, esePumalanga Kapa, ngenyanga ephelileko.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana, Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka Sontaha sa la 15 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong.

src_text: Leveni yomhlobo we-D-Max izaliselela ukuzibophelela kwekampani yakwa-Isuzu eSewula Afrika begodu ingelinye ihlangothi  lepumelelo lehlelo lokukhandwa kweenkoloyi i-Automotive Production Development Programme (i-APDP).
tgt_text: Ke lekgetlo la pele Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi (ILO) tshwarela seboka sena Afrika..     Baetapele ba Dinaha, matona 120, baemedi ba dikarolo tse tharo tsa dinaha tse 187 tseo leng ditho tsa ILO, makgotla Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba, ditheo tsa thuto phahameng, mekgatlo ya baahi, mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso le mehlodi ya ditaba ba lebelletswe ho ba sebokeng sena..     Seboka se tla boela se nehe Afrika Borwa monyetla wa ho beha ka pele Molao wa Motheo wa naha jwalokaha sireletsa ditokelo tsa bana.

src_text: I-APDP ilihlelo lehlohlomezelo lokukhanda iinkoloyi elinqophe ukwandisa umthamo weenkoloyi ezikhandwa ebubulweni leenkoloyi elithileko, ngaleyindlela kukhuthazeke ubuhle namandla womsebenzi emafemini weenkoloyi, ngaleyindlela kwande nemisebenzi ezakuvuleka emafemini weenkoloyi namanye akhambisana nawo.
tgt_text: Naha tla bontshana le dinaha tse ding tse itlhommeng pele phedisong ya mosebetsi wa bana mme ithute ho tsona.

src_text: Kulinganiswa ukuthi kuzakwenziwa imali engange-R. 8 yamabhiliyoni ngokukhandwa kweenkoloyi ngalelihlelo le-APDP ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke (DDM).

src_text: Ifemu le-ke izokuvula imisebenzi engaphezulu kwekulungwana eplantini yayo lapho yakhiwe khona, bese kuba nabanye abantu abazii-24 000 ezabaqatjha ngezinye iindlela ezingasibunqopha, ngaleyindlela-ke kuvuleke amathuba wokuphakamisa umphakathi walendawo.
tgt_text: Presidente Ramaphosa tla ba le Imbizo ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke Mpumalanga ka Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re siye motho morao”.

Jwaloka mokgwa wa bohlokwa wa ho ba le seabo ha setjhaba, Imbizo fa Presidente monyetla wa ho buisana le ba amehang ba fapaneng ka ho otloloha – haholoholo batho ba metseng ya mahae – le ho mamela mathata bona ka sepheo sa ho buisana le bona ka ona..     Sepheo ka Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke ke ho lwantsha tse sitisang phumantsho momahaneng ya ditshebeletso le ho kgothaletsa seabo sa baahi ho ikamahantswe le Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke..     Maafrika Borwa ka latela le ho ba leseabo dipuisanong kaho kena diwebsaeteng tsa ho etsa setswalle tlasa #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Umbuthano WezeeMayini.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.

src_text: UmButhano wokuCocisana ngeeNdaba zokuSisa eeMayini womNyaka wee-2022 ebewubanjelwe e-Cape Town International Convention Centre ukusukela ngomhla we-09  ukuya kumhla we-12 kuMrhayili, bewungomunye weenkundla ezikulu khulu  zokubonisana nokusizana hlangana kwabo boke ababelani ebubulweni leemayini.
tgt_text: Ho ketekwa ha selemo le selemo ha Kgwedi ya Afrika le Letsatsi la Afrika ka Laboraro lala 25 Motsheanong ho tla ba le mookotaba oo leng: “Selemo sa Phepo Nepahetseng: Matlafatso ya Phepo Nepahetseng le ya dijo tse lekaneng bohle kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Jwaloka karolo ya ponelopele ya nako telele ho Agenda 2063 (eo leng leano la ntshetsopele la Afrika la ho fihlella ntshetsopele ya tsa bophelo kenyeletsang bohle le ya moshwelella ya dilemo tse fetang tse mashome mahlano), mookotaba ona tsepame bokgoning ba batho ba Afrika mme ho tsepamisitswe maikutlo haholo basading, batjheng le baneng.

src_text: Ummongondaba walombuthano bewuthi: “Ukutjhuguluka Kokumayina E-Afrika: Ukuzibekela Ehlelweni Lokudlulela Komunye Umhlobo Weembaseli, i-ESG kunye nemiNotho.”                .
tgt_text: Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa ntshetsopele hobane se lebisa maphelong ntlafetseng bakeng sa motho ka mong, se lebise le meputsong hodimo le kunong hodimo bakeng sa dinaha..     Ntlha ka sehloohong meketeng ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Dikgokahano ya Afrika tla ketekwa Constitutional Hill, Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 23 ho ya ho la 27 Motsheanong.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi Umbuthano Wezeemayini (i-Mining Indaba) uzakusiza ukutjengisa nokukhuphula igama leSewula Afrika njengelizwe elilungele ukusiswa kilo.

tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa ho phahamisa kopano ya Afrika le momahano tebileng ya lebatowa, le ho inehela botjha ha Afrika bokamosong bo le bong.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyawathokozela amasiso angena elizweni lekhethu begodu izibophelele ngokwenza ubujamo bezinto bube buhle buvumele ukuhluma okuqalelela umuntu woke nokuhleleka ngobutjha komnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete hopotsa bohle hore ditabatabelo tsa rona tsa naha di amana haholo le botsitso, kopano le tswelopele ya Afrika     Melaetsa.

MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: •    MmePhindile Xaba(53),ya sebeditseng nako telele le ka bokgabane indastering ya ditaba, Afrika Borwa le mose sebeleditse ntlafalo ya naha ena ka boitelo.•    LenqosaSilumkoSokupa(74),ya sebeleditseng Lekgotla la Tshireletseho ya Mmuso maemong fapaneng, nako telele sebetsa ka bokgabane Tshebeletsong ya Mmuso.

src_text: Ubudlelwano Bamazwe ngamazwe Neberijini.
tgt_text: •    Profesa Francis Wilson(83), setsebi sa moruo se ipabotseng, le mothehi wa Lekala la Diphuputso la tsa Basebetsi le Ntshetsopele Lebatoweng le Borwa ba Afrika     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba eso ka ba tlola molao..     Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele ya Makgabane Ditheong, Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo (DCoG).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yathokozela nemikhulumiswano yamhlapha hlangana kwakaMengameli u-Ramaphosa newe-United States u-Joe Biden, we-France u-Emmanuel Macron, newe-Zambia u-Hakainde Hichilema, ngokwahlukahluka.
tgt_text: Monghadi Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomukajwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Tshehetso le Dithuso Mebusong ya Lehae,DCoG..     Monghadi Risimati Patrick Mathyejwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS)..     MonghadiCollin Xolani Zwane jwaloka DDG: Taolo, Tumellano le Phethahatso,DWS.

MonghadiMelanchton Makobe jwaloka DDG:Ditshebeletso tsa Molao le Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso Pusong, Dikgwebong tsa Mmuso,Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso     Kabinete dumellane le Matona ka ho hirwa ha ba latelang:.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano le inikele uMengameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwano beSewula Afrika namazwe esebenzisana nawo ngeendaba eziqakathekileko zerijini nezamazwe ngamazwe, hlangana nazo ekubalwa nendlela yokulamula ipi ye-Ukraine ngokuthula     Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi .
tgt_text: MonghadiBhekuyise Mathews Khenisajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Phethahatso(CEO)Lekgotleng la Ntshetsopele ya Phumantsho ya Bodulo (HDA).

src_text: Amavowudi Ngesabelo Seemali.
tgt_text: Mme Joy KelediMasemolajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Ditjhelete, HDA.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibawa zoke izakhamuzi ukuthi zilandele amaVowudi ngeSabelo seeMali seminyango karhulumende ngokwahlukahluka nese-Ofisi likaMengameli kobanyana zizokwazi ukulindela ukuzwa ngemisebenzi urhulumende ekufuze ayenze.
tgt_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jwalokaCEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.

src_text: Imizamo Yokubuyisa Okulahlekileko Nokwakha Ngobutjha Ngemva Kweenkhukhula.
tgt_text: Boiphumano le Maiteko Kahobotjha Kamora Dikgohola.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke yabe yathokoza boke abantu neenhlangano ezibe nesandla nelizwi emizameni yokubuyisa okulahlekileko nokwakha ngobutjha ngemva komonakalo otjhiye kulilwa isimayemaye kezinye iindawo zelizwe lekhethweli, khulukhulu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Kabinete rorisitse le ho ananela mosebetsi wa batho le mekgatlo yohle kentseng letsoho maitekong hore batho ba iphumane, le kahongbotjha kamora dikgohola tse mpe dikarolong tse ding tsa naha, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal lebohile mekgatlo yohle eo eseng ya mmuso, ya ditumelo, baahi, beng ba dikgwebo le mekgatlo thusang faneng ka dijo, diaparo, dikobo, dipakana tse sebediswang ke bomme ha ba le matsatsing  le diaparo tsa sekolo malapeng tlokotsing sa kgoneng ho iphumanela tsa motheo tseo di hlokang..     Setsi Sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa se ntse se tswela pele le ho kopanya makala ohle mmuso maitekong sona ho fana ka thuso ya diphallelo malapeng ohle amehileng.

src_text: Ithokoze zoke iinhlangano ezingasizombuso, iinhlangano zekolo, umphakathi, abosomabhizinisi kunye neenhlangano zesizo kabahluphekileko zona eziphakise abantu ukudla, izambatho, ipahla yesithunzi kunye nejinifomu yesikolo emindenini etlhagileko, kobanyana izokukghona ukugcina iindingo zayo ekuphilwa ngazo.
tgt_text: Batho ba fetang 7 000 ka palo ba fuwa botshabelo diterekeng tse nne tse amehileng haholo KwaZulu-Natal qadile mosebetsi wa ho fumantsha malapa amehileng bodulo ba nakwana ditsheng tseo leng tsa mmuso tse hlwauweng KwaZulu-Natal tse ka sebedisetswang ho ahela batho.
Kabinete tiisitse boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho laola matlole dithuso tsa kamora dikgohola ka hloko le ka ho se pate letho.

src_text: IZiko LezokuLawula IHlekelele EliZweniloke solo lisalungelela zoke iingaba zikarhulumende emzamweni walo wokulethela woke amakhaya athintekileko isizo lobuntu.
tgt_text: Mohlahlobi Moholo wa Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete Afrika Borwa fana ka tshebeletso ya tlatsetso ya peholeihlo mme tlhophisobotjha ya ditjhelete ikamahanya le mokgwatshebetso wa mmuso wa ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete..     Tsa Morao tsa Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: Bangaphezulu kween-7 000 abantu abasizwa ngeendawo zokufihla ihloko eenyingini ezine ezingezonakalelwe khulu kunezinye KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa ho thibela ho ata ha COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao tjena di bontshe hore palo ya batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba kulang a eketseha jwalokaha mariha se kene..     Kabinete hopoditse bohle ho tswela pele ka ho itshireletsa le batho ba bang ka ho hlapa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala dimonkwana ha motho le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere moya kene, le ho enta..     Ente ntse le tshireletso matla kgahlano le COVID-19 hobane thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala.
Ha hloke hore be le aterese ya moo dulang teng hore ente.

src_text: Uthomile umsebenzi wokwakhela imindeni ethintekileko izindlu zokuhlala kwesikhatjhana enarheni yombuso ekhonjwe njengendawo ekungafudukiselwa kiyo abantu KwaZulu-Natala.
tgt_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le bukana ya boitsebiso le ya se nang yona ka enta mahala dibakeng tsohle tsa setjhaba tsa ho enta naheng ka bophara..     Kgethollo ya Mmala ha Fele!.

src_text: IKhabinethi isifakazele isibopho sikarhulumende sokulawula imali ekhutjhelwe ukusiza abantu abonelwe ziinkhukhula ngokuyelela nemkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete nyatsitse diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala ka matla naheng ena, ho kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse tlalehilweng tsa Sekolo se Phahameng sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch, Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: UmHloliincwadi Zombelele weSewula Afrika ungezelela umsebenzi wokubeka ilihlo kanti-ke ukunikelwa kwamaqalontanzi amatjha wokusetjenziswa kweemali kukhambisana nehlelo likarhulumende lokwabiwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Diketso tsena tse mpe di kgahlano le makgabane Molaotheo ao naha ya rona thehuweng hodima ona kenyeletsang seriti sa botho, ho se kgethollane ka mmala, ho se kgethollane ka bong, toka setjhabeng, ho se be leeme, le hlomphano.
Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re tataisang hore re fedise dikarohano tse mpe le diketso tsa kgale tsa tlhokeho ya toka.

src_text: Zamva Nje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ho ipiletswa ho batswadi ho ruta bana ba bona ho se ikamahanye le diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala le ho atlarela diphapano jwaloka karolo ya letsholo la rona le tsitlalletseng ho kgothaletsa kaho ya setjhaba le momahano ya setjhaba re sebetseng mmoho ho pepesa diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala hohle moo di bonahalang di amoheleha mme re romele molaetsa hlakileng reng ha di amoheleha naheng ya rona ya demokrasi..     Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Germany.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhuthaza boke abantu eSewula Afrika ukuthi batjheje bayelele bakhandele ukurhatjheka kwe-COVID-19 njengoba iimbalobalo zamva nje zitjengise ukuphakama kwenani labantu abangenwe ngiyo i-COVID-19 nabaguliswe magulo akhambisana nobusika esingaphakathi kwabobu njenganje elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse leeto la semmuso le bileng le katleho la Tjhanselara ya Riphaboliki ya Federale ya Germany, Monghadi Olaf Scholz, Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi la la 24 Motsheanong.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhumbuze woke umuntu ukuthi ahlale azitjhejile atjheje nabanye abantu ngokunande ahlamba namkha ahlikihle izandla ngesihlanzekisi, afake imaski nakangekhaya, aqalangane nabanye abantu ngebanga elifaneleko, kuhlale kuvulwe namafesidiri kobanyana kuzokungena ummoya begodu woke umuntu ahlabe/ajove.
tgt_text: Tjhanselara Scholz etetse kwano semmuso menngwe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo leng moetapele wa letsholo la mmuso la ho kgothaletsa dikamano tse ntle tsa lebatowa le matjhaba, mmoho le ho hohela matsete hlokwang ka matla..     Hara tse ding baetapele bana ba babedi ba buisane ka ditsela tsa ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano ho tsa eneji le diphetoho maemong lehodimo, kgwebisano le matsete, le mekgwa ya ho lwantsha COVID-19 le tlhokeho matla ya ente.
Ba boetse ba buisana ka diketsahalo tsa kontinenteng ya Afrika le matjhabeng, ho kenyeletsa ntwa ya Ukraine le kamoo amang moruo wa lefatshe le phumaneho ya dijo le eneji.

src_text: Ukuhlaba/ukujova solo kusese sikhali esinamandla ukudlula ezinye zokulwa ne-COVID-19, ngoba phela khona kukhandela ukuthi umuntu angaguli akghokghe, abe ayokulaliswa esibhedlela namkha abe agcine abhubhile.
tgt_text: Germany ke molekane wa bobedi moholo kgwebisanong le Afrika Borwa, mme boetse ke naha ya boraro eo leng mohlodi wa bahahlaudi ba mose tsetela haholo naheng ena mme ke molekane ho tsa ntshetsopele..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.

src_text: Akunasidingo sokuthi ube ne-adresi yalapho uhlala khona nawuyokuhlaba/nayokujova.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho phethelwa ka katleho ha Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana se neng se tshwaretswe Durban ho tloha ka la 15 ho ya ho la 20 Motsheanong.

src_text: Nanyana ngubani, nanyana unomazisi nanyana akanaye, angahlaba/angajova simahla kiwo woke amaziko wokuhlaba/wokujova wombuso elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Ba amehang ba tswang lefatsheng ka bophara ba ne ba le sebokeng sena se neng se tshwerwe ka tshebedisano le Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi..     Kamora ho buisana ka mesebetsi metle kentsweng tshebetsong ke dinaha tse fapaneng le ho hlwaya tse salletseng morao le mehato potlakileng hlokehang bakeng sa ho potlakisa phediso ya ya ho etsa bana makgoba le ho qobellwa ha bana ho sebetsa, ho thehilwe ‘Durban Call to Action’ ho sebetsana le bothata ba ho etsa bana makgoba..     Ho etsa bana makgoba ke ntho mpe etswang ke setjhaba mme beha bana pontsheng ya maemo kotsi.
Ke tlhekefetso mme thibela bana ho fumana thuto le menyetla meng ka ba ntshetsang pele.

src_text: Sikhalima Ibandlululo Lobuzwe!
tgt_text: Ngwana mong le mong wa Afrika Borwa na le tokelo ke keng ya phehiswa ya ho sireletswa diketsong tse sotlang mosebetsing.

src_text: IKhabinethi izisola zoke izenzo zebandlululo lobuzwe nelomhlobo elizweni lekhethweli, sekubalwa neziga ezikhe zenzeka e-Goop Hope Seminary High School neYunivesithi ye-Stellenbosch eTjingalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Tokelo ya thuto ya motheo kentswe Molaong wa rona wa Motheo mme ho ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mong le mong tlameha ho netefatsa hore morutwana mong le mong eo mo hodisang kena sekolo ho tloha letsatsing la pele la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse supa ho sona ho fihlela letsatsi la ho qetela la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse 15 kapa bang ho kereiti ya borobong ho sona, ho tla ya ka hore ke efe etsahalang pele.” .

src_text: Lezizenzo ezinyenyisako ziphambana namagugu wethu womthethosisekelo asekele wona lomthethosisekelo, ekubalwa hlangana nawo nesithunzi somuntu, ukungabandlululi ngobuzwe nomhlobo, ukungabandlululi ngobulili, ubulungiswa bomphakathi, ukulinganiseka nehlonipho.
tgt_text: Ho ya ka Molao wa Bana wa 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ha ho motho ya ka sebedisang reka fana ka ngwana hore sebetse kapa hire ngwana”     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
Kananelo ya ho ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Batho Bohle ba Nyametswang ke Mapolesa (ICPPED).

src_text: UmThethosisekelo we-1996 weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika uyikomba yethu yendlela esingaruthula ngayo ukuhlukana okungamukelekiko nokutlhogeka komthethobulungiswa weenkhathi ezidlulileko.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tokomane ya tlhahiso ya ICPPED palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo ha Afrika Borwa lohotha ho ba karolo ya tumellano ena.

src_text: Ababelethi bakhuthazwa ukufundisa abantwana ukuthi bakucithe ukubandlululana ngobuzwe namkha ngomhlobo, basingathe ukwahluka kwabantu ngobubona njengengcenye yehlelo lethu elinamandla lokukhwezelela ukwakheka kwesizwe nokulungelelana komphakathi.
tgt_text: Ke tumellano tlamang dinaha tse saenneng tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) sebetsanang le tlolo ya ditokelo tsa botho ka mokgwa wa ho nyametswa ha batho ke mapolesa.

src_text: Asisebenzisane ukuveza ibandlululo lobuzwe/lomhlobo nanyana kukuphi lapho lithathwa khona njengento ejayelekileko, sithumele umlayezo ozwakala kuhle ukuthi ibandlululo alinandawo elizweni lekhethu lentando yenengi.
tgt_text: Tumellano hlalosa ho nyametswa ke mapolesa ho qobelletsweng ho kenyeletsa kwetelo, ho tshwarwa ke mapolesa, ho kwallwa kapa mekgwa meng ka bakang hore sesenyi se hane ho dumela kapa se pate hore lehlatsipa le kae..     Ha tumellano se ananetswe kenyeleditswe le melaong ya naha ena, ho tla lebellwa hore Afrika Borwa tlalehele Matjhaba Kopaneng dilemo tse ding le tse ding tse pedi ka kamoo sebedisang tumellano ena kateng.
Tumellano fana ka mehato eo dinaha tseo leng ditho di ka nkang ho thibela ho nyametswa ha batho.

src_text: Ubudlelwano Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJarimani .
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Afrika Borwa ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele ivakatjho lomBuso elibe yipumelelo leTjhansela ye-Federal Riphabhligi yeJarimani, oHloniphekileko u-Olaf Scholz, njengoba bekavakatjhele lapha eSewula Afrika nje ngeLesibili womhla wama-24 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse tlhahiso ya Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho Lekgotleng la Matjhaba Kopaneng la Ditokelo tsa Botho.
Tokomane ena tla lekolwa hamorao selemong ke lekala la Matjhaba Kopaneng le lekolang diketsahalo tse amang ditokelo tsa botho dinaheng tseo leng ditho tsa UN.

src_text: UTjhansela Scholtz umenywe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngalelivakatjho lakhe lomBuso, njengoba uMengameli uRamaphosa adosa phambili ijima likarhulumende lokukhwezelela ubudlelwano obuhle esiphandeni nemazweni ngamazwe nje, abe adosele namasiso adingeke khulu nganenwapha.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa se lekotswe makgetlo mararo esale ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Matjhaba Kopaneng, mme tekolo ya ho qetela entswe ka Loetse..     Tlaleho fana ka tsa morao tse mabapi le dikgothaletso tse 187 tse amohetsweng tsa motjha wa tekolo wa.
Ho qotsitswe maikutlo mang dintlheng tse netefaditsweng, tlhahisoleseding tswang mafapheng amehang, ditheo tse tshehetsang demokrasi le mekgatlo ya baahi amehang.

src_text: Abarholi ababilaba bakhulumisene ngeendlela zokukhuphula ukusebenzisana eendabeni ezinjengezeembaseli nezokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi, zerhwebo nezamasiso, kunye neendlela zokulwa ne-COVID-19 nezokufunakala kwemijovo yalesisifo.
Babuye bathinta nokwenzekako elizwekazini le-Afrika kunye nemazweni ngamazwe, sekubalwa nepi ehlabene e-Ukraine njenganje namacaphazela wayo phezu komnotho nokugoma, naphezu kweembaseli nezokuphepha.
tgt_text: Kabinete motlotlo ka kgatelopele entsweng ha ho kenngwa tshebetsong dikgothaletso tsena le ka dikarolo tseo ho ntseng ho sebetsanwa le tsona.
Tlaleho tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ka Phato.

src_text: IJarimani ayisilizwe lesibili elingelikhulu hlangana namazwe arhwebelana neSewula Afrika kwaphela, kodwana injalo nje ililizwe lesithathu ngobukhulu emazweni waphetjheya eza eSewula Afrika njengeemvakatjhibukeli, nomsisi omkhulu kunye nomsebenzisani wezetuthuko.
tgt_text: Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.

src_text: IKhonfrensi Yesihlanu Ngokuqedwa Kokusetjenziswa Kwabantwana Ephasini.
tgt_text: Leano lena le fana ka mekgwa ya ho sireletsa le ho baballa metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuragwa bekuphele kuhle kweKhonfrensi yePhasi yeHlandla lesiHlanu yokuQedwa kokuSetjenziswa kwabaNtwana ebeyibanjelwe eThekwini ukusukela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kumhla wama-20 kuMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Le setletsa mesebetsi ya merafong le boikarabello ba merafe ba ho netefatsa tshebediso ya metsi ya ho ya ho ile bakeng sa naha.

src_text: Ababelani abavela emazweni ngamazwe bebakhona kilekhonfrensi ebeyibanjwe ngokubambisana neHlangano yezabaSebenzi ePhasini (i-ILO).
tgt_text: Hara tse ding, leano le hlakisa mesebetsi le boikarabello ba makala mararo mmuso malebana le tse amanang le metsi merafo.
Diphetoho tse sisintsweng di tla rarolla mathata ho tlisa dikotlo kgahlano le merafo silafatsang metsi mme di bebofatse   tshebediso ya molao reng ba silafatsang ba lefe.

src_text: Ngemva kokukhulumisana ngeendlela ezihle zokusebenza eziphunyeleliswe mamazwe ahlukahlukileko nangemva kokubona itlhayelo namagadango arhabekileko afunekako ukuqeda umukghwa wokusebenzisa abantwana nokukatelela abantu ukuthi basebenze, bavumelene nge-‘Durban Call to Action’ ukulwa nomukghwa wokusetjenziswa kwabantwana.
tgt_text: Leano lena le hlahisitswe ho ikamahantswe le Molao wa Naha wa Metsi, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Woke umntwana eSewula Afrika unelungelo elingaphikisekiko lokuvikelwa emikghweni yezemisebenzi esihluku nezenzo zezabasebenzi ezidlala ngabantwana.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Peholeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.

Kabinete amohetse tlaleho ya kgatelopele ya ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Pehololeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.

src_text: Ilungelo lefundo esisekelo livikelekile emThethwenisisekelo kanti-ke ngokomThetho we-1996 weenKolo zeSewula Afrika  (umThetho Nomboro 84 womNyaka we-1996), “Umbelethi ngamunye kufuze enze ukuthi umfundi amjameleko uthoma isikolo ngelanga lokuthoma lesikolo emnyakeni aqeda ngawo iminyaka yokubelethwa elikhomba, abe ayokufika elangeni lokugcina lesikolo lomnyaka umfundi ahlanganisa ngalo iminyaka yobudala eli-15, namkha nakaqeda uGreyidi 9, kuye ngokuthi ngikuphi okuze ntanzi.”            .
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele matla entsweng ke mafapha fapaneng mmuso kentseng tshebetsong moralotshebetso ananetsweng ka..     Mafapha mang se behile pele maano tla tataisa mananeo matjha tla shebana le ditlhoko tsa basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.

src_text: NgokomThetho wabaNtwana wee-2005 (umThetho Nomboro 38 womNyaka wee-2005), “akunamuntu ozakuvunyelwa ukusebenzisa, ukuthola, ukunikela namkha ukuqatjha umntwana kobanyana azokwenza umsebenzi wabantwana.”      IinQunto ZeKhabinethi  .
tgt_text: Kabinete kopile hore ho be le mekgwa matla ya peholeihlo le tlaleho, haholoholo mafapheng so kenye ditlaleho tsa ona..     Puisano ya Batjha ya ho Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).

src_text: Ukuthotjelwa Kwesivumelwano Samazwengamazwe Ngokuvikelwa Kwabo Boke Abantu Abanyamalaliswe Ngekani (i-ICPPED)          .
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le NMYD selemo le selemo ho tloha ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa ePalamende kwe-ICPPED kobanyana iyoyihlola ukuthi iSewula Afrika angeze yasamukela na lesisivumelwano.
tgt_text: NMYD ya pele tla ba ka la 07 ho ya ho la 20 Phupu.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sisivumelwano esisibopho seHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) esiqalene nokwephulwa kwamalungelo wobuntu ngokunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani.
tgt_text: Bona ke boiteko ba Bopresidente ba ho neha batjha ba kontinente ena lepatlelo la ho tshwara ditherisano tse ahang ka ditaba tse ba amang..     Dipuisano tsena tse tla bua ka Mopresidente wa mehleng ya hlomphuwang haholo matjhabeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, di tla thakgola meqoqo amanang le ho otlella tlwaelo ya boetapele bo kgabane Afrika..     Dipuisanong tsena batjha ba tla nehwa monyetla wa ho abelana ka botjhaba ba bona.
Boiteko bona bo tla boela bo matlafatse dikamano tsa batho ka ho otloloha hara batjha ba kontinente.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sihlathulula ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani okunjengokuthunjwa, ukubotjhwa, ukuvalelwa ekubotjhweni namkhka nanyana yini okhunye okungenza umephuli wamalungelo abhale ukuveza namkha abe afihle ngabomu ukuveza ukuthi ungazimbi ukuphi.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang le tla fana ka dintlha tsa lenaneo la diketsahalo hamorao..     Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso ya Ntlafatso ya Basadi le Tekano ya Bong, Ntshetsopele ya Batjha le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2021/.
Kabinete fumane tlaheho ya selemo le selemo ya peholeihlo ya tshebetso ya 2021/22 malebana le ntlafatso ya basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.

src_text: Nasele samukelwe saba seencwadini zekhethu zomthetho, iSewula Afrika izakulindeleka ukuthi qobe ngeminyaka emibili ibikele i-UN ukuthi isiphumelelisa njani isivumelwanesi.
tgt_text: Tlaleho latella ditshupo tsa bohlokwa ntshetsopeleng ya tekatekano, boemo ba khiro le thuo le seabo sa dihlopha tsena tsa batho diketsahalong tsa mafapha le ditheo tsa mmuso..     Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho ikamahantswe le moralo, tekanyetso ya ditjhelete, peholeihlo, tekolo le moralotshebetso wa Hlahlobo ya Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete tsepameng ho bong ananetsweng ke Kabinete ka     Dibili.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sinikela amagadango wokukhandela ekufuze athathwe mamazwe amalunga ukukhandela ukunyamalaliswa kwabantu ngekani emakhabo.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho bakeng sa hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona.

src_text: Umbiko Wesine Welizwe LeSewula Afrika Wokuvikelwa Nokukhuthazwa Kwamalungelo Wobuntu   .
tgt_text: Sepheo ka Bili ena ke ho ntlafatsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho tsa basebetsi ba merafong, ho kenyeletsa tikoloho eo tshebetso ya merafong etsahalang ho yona.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa komBiko wesiNe weliZwe leSewula Afrika wokuVikelwa nokuKhuthazwa kwamaLungelo woBuntu emKhandlwini wamaLungelo woBuntu weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko.
tgt_text: Bili fetola Molao wa jwale wa Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong wa 1996 (Molao wa 29 wa 1996).

src_text: IsiQhema esiNande siBuyekeza imibiko ngaphasi kwe-UN sizakubuyekeza umbiko lo ngekukhambeni komnyaka lo.
tgt_text: Hara tse ding ditlhomathiso tse lokisitsweng di hlakisa dikgopolo tse ding tse kahara Molao, di matlafatse moralotshebetso wa bophelo bo botle le polokeho mme di amahanye le mekgwa ya tshebetso tswang pele lefatsheng ha ho tluwa ho tsa polokeho merafong.

src_text: Solo yatlikitla isiVumelwano samaLungelo woBuntu ngaphasi kwe-UN, iSewula Afrika seyibuyekezwe amahlandla amathathu, ngebuyekezo lokugcina elenziwe ngoKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya 2022 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona le hore Letona la Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Ditjhankana, Monghadi Ronald Lamola ntshe tsebiso nang le dintlha tsa tlhomathiso sisintsweng ya Molaotheo.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngeemphakamiso ezili-187 ezivunyiweko zehlelo lokubuyekeza lomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Bili fetola Karolo ya 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 tsebahatsang hore dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa tse 11 ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Ditlhomathiso di tla tlisa hlompho Puong ya Matsoho ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) jwaloka puo ya bo-12 ya semmuso naheng ena mme sena se tla ntshetsa pele puo le ba buang se boele se tiise tekano ya ditokelo tsa Maafrika Borwa ohle, ho sa kgathallehe maemo bona.

src_text: Imibono ekusetjenzwe ngayo lapha ngethethwe emabuthelelwenilwazi afakazelweko, nemininingwaneni evela eminyangweni efaneleko, neenHlanganweni zeSahluko seThoba kunye neenhlanganweni zomphakathi ezifaneleko.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le se le ananetse Puo ya Matsoho jwalo ka puo ya lapeng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyathokoza ngendima esele yenziwe ekuphunyelelisweni leziimphakamiso kunye naleziindima ezisasetjenzwako.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ya Naha ho tloha ho la 29 Motsheanong ho ya ho la 4 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “A re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le Kamora moo.”.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa emphakathini ungethulwa ku-UN ngoRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Bekeng ena ho tla tsepamiswa maikutlo ntlheng kgolo naheng ya ho ima ha batjha leng ntho totileng haholo ka nako ya COVID-19 ha batjha ba bangata ba beleha ka..     Kabinete ipileditse ho batswadi, mekgatlo ya baahi, ya ditumelo tse fapaneng le baahi ka kakaretso ho sebedisana le ho thusa ho lwantsha keketseho ya ho ima ha batjha..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Moruo (WEF).
Afrika Borwa na le seabo ho WEF tla tshwarelwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 22 ho ya ho la 26 Motsheanong 2022, tlasa mookotaba reng: “Re Sebetsa Mmoho ho Kgutlisa Tshepo”.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wee-2022 Wokulawulwa Kwamanzi Weemayini.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa thabela monyetla wa ho ba karolo ya tharollo le ho abelana ka boiphihlelo ba rona sebokeng sa lefatshe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umThethokambiso wee-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi weeMayini kobanyana sewungathoma ukusebenza.
tgt_text: Boteng ba rona WEF bo bohlokwa haholo ho phahamiseng lebitso la rona sebakeng sa matsete sa lefatshe, ho abelana le lefatshe ponelopele ya rona ya bokamoso le ho totobatsa tse ntjha tse seng di sibollotswe kahara naha..     Kgwedi ya Batjha.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uphethe iindlela zokuvikela nokulonda amanzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.”.

src_text: Ulinganisa imisebenzi yeemayini namandla onikelwe wona wokusebenzisa amanzi ngendlela ebambelelako elizweni leSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Batjha le tla ketekwa semmuso Kapa Botjhabela..     Monongwaha ho tla be ho ketekwa selemo sa bo-46 esale baithuti ba itseka ka la 16 Phupjane 1976, Soweto, ba ipelaetsa kgahlano le ho qobellwa ho ithuta dithuto kaofela ka puo ya Afrikaans ke mmuso wa kgethollo..     Ka moya oo wa Phuptjane 1976, Kabinete ipileditse ho batjha ba naha ena ho lwantsha tlhokeho ya mosebetsi ntseng eketseha ya batjha ka ho ba le seabo mananeong ntshetsopele kang thupelo ya mosebetsi lebisang ho fumaneng mangolo, le mananeo thupelo ya mosebetsi bakeng sa ba seng ba na le mangolo..     Mmuso sibollotse mananeo nang le molemong wa ho tshehetsa ho thehwa ha mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi ya nakwana.

Dikgwebo le tsona di kgothaletswa ho hohella batjha mosebetsing ka ho ba thehela menyetla ya mesebetsi..     Lenaneo la batjha bakeng sa kgwedi ya Phuptjane le kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse fapaneng ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo la dipulamadiboho tsa batjha, ho thakgolweng ha Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Letshwao wa NYDA le diketsahalo tse ding tsa tshebeletso ya naha ya Batjha naheng ka bophara.

src_text: Hlangana namanye amagadango wokulungisa, umthethokambiso lo uhlathulula imisebenzi ngaphakathi kweengaba zikarhulumende ezintathu malungana neendaba zamanzi eemayini.
tgt_text: Letona la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang Lefapheng la Bopresidente haufinyane le tla hlakisa lenaneo kaofela.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko enziwako la azakurarulula imiraro ekhona njenganje ngokukhalima abasilaphazi, enze kube lula ukusebenzisa ikambiso yokuthi umsilaphazi akhalinywe ngokuhlawuliswa.
tgt_text: Ho lebelletswe hore diketsahalo tsohle tsa batjha di ikamahanye le melawana ya bophelo bo botle ya COVID-.

src_text: Umthethokambiso usebenza ngokukhambisana nomthetho wezaManzi wee-1998 (umThetho Nomboro 36 womNyaka we-1998).
tgt_text: Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae.

Mmuso, ka tshebedisano le ntlo ya Naha ya Baetapele ba Setso tla ba le Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022 molemong wa ho buisana ka ditaba tse amanang le thuo ya mobu..     Ditaba tsena di kenyeletsa motjha wa ho tloswa ha lefatshe la metseng ya mahae Mmusong le iswa ho beng ba lona ba loketseng leng se bohlokwa bakeng sa matlafatso ya baahi ba metseng ya mahae.

src_text: Umbiko WomTlamo WokuHlela NgeeNdaba ZobuLili, Ukwabiwa KweeMali, UkuTjheja NokuLinganisa Kunye NokuHlolwa KweeNcwadi .
tgt_text: Ho se be teng ha thuo ya lefatshe ka molao metseng ya mahae ho fokodisa ditokelo tsa beng ba lefatshe le ho fokotsa bokgoni ba bona ba ho le sebedisetsa ho ntlafatsa maphelo bona le maemo bona ditjhelete     Melaetsa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko wendima yomsebenzi ngokuphunyeleliswa komTlamo wokuHlela ngeeNdaba zobuLili, ukwAbiwa kweeMali, ukuTjheja nokuLinganisa kunye nokuHlolwa kweeNcwadi.
tgt_text: MahlohonoloKabinete lebohisitse le ho lebisa ditakalletso tse ntle ho: Mme Leanne Manas, sebohodi sa lenaneo la SABC la Morning Live, ya hlomphilweng ka Kgau Tlotlang Tshebetso Ipabotseng ya France ho tswa naheng ya France ka Labobedi la la 17 Motsheanong 2022, bakeng sa seabo sa hae boqolotsing ba ditaba, kgasong le mesebetsing meng fapaneng ya ho thusa setjhaba.

MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: Monghadi Mpho Moerane (52), Ramotse wa mehleng wa Masepala wa Johannesburg, eo neng le radipolotiki ya neng lwanela ditokelo tsa batho bile le mohlanka wa batho ba Johannesburg.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyithokozele indima ekulu esele yenziwe minyango yaborhulumende embadlwana ekuphumeleliseni umtlamo owavunywa ngomnyaka wee-2019 kobanyana sewungasetjenziswa.
tgt_text: Pele e ba Ramotse bile setho sa Komiti ya Ramotse ya Tikoloho le Meralo ya Ditshebeletso.

Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), sebini se hapileng dikgau tse ngata mminong wa sedumedi se neng se sa tswa hlomphuwa ka Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music ke Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutehi se neng se hlompheha bile le setho se hlomphehang sa Boto ya Bahlokomedi ba Ditjhelete ba Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS Afrika Borwa.Monghadi Mike Schüssler (60), eo neng le setsebi se hlomphehang sa moruo Afrika Borwa le mokaubere indastering ena mme na le maikutlo tjhatsi ka maemo moruo wa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Minengi eminye iminyango esele ijamise amaqalontanzi womthethokambiso kobanyana azokukhanyisa indlela yamahlelo aqakathekileko aqothele abantu abasikazi, ilutjha kunye nabantu abanokukhubazeka.
tgt_text: Monghadi Jamie Bartlett (56), sebapadi se neng se tlotlwa Afrika Borwa sa kalaneng le dipapadi tsa thelevisheneng se neng se hapile dikgau tse ngata, se tumme ka seabo sa sona jwaloka Mike O'Reilly ho Isidingo le David Genaro ho Rhythm City.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele ukuthi kubekwe ilihlo elibukhali bekubikwe ngokutjheja, khulukhulu keminye yeminyango engakabukubika.
tgt_text: Kabinete mmoho le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba boetse ba lebisitse matshediso mmusong le bathong ba United Arab Emirates (UAE) kamora ho hlokahala ha Mopresidente Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73) wa UAE      KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuteho ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe hore ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
Monghadi Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Phethahatso Botong ya Ntshetsopele ya Indasteri ya tsa Kaho.

src_text: Ilanga Lelutjha Lokukhulumisana Ngo-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).
tgt_text: Mongadi Shabeer Hamid Khan ke Akhaontente Kgolo Matlotlong Naha..     Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong Thekong ya Thepa, Matlotlong Naha..     Kabinete dumellane le ho hirwa ha ba latelang bakeng sa ho tlatswa ha dikgeo Botong ya Balaodi ya Letlole le Leholo la Eneji     Monghadi Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Moruo.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ituthuko ekarisako yamhlapha yokungenelela kwesizwe  ekuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse kgatelopele tsa morao tjena tse kgothatsang, maitekong mmuso ao sepheo ka ona leng ho kgothaletsa kgolo ya moruo.

src_text: Ukuya ngokweembalobalo ezikhutjhwe mhlapha mayelana nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi liZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-StatsSA), ukuphela kwemisebenzi kwehla ukusukela kumaphesende ama-.
tgt_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi tse tswang ho ba Dipalopalo Afrika Borwa, tlhokeho ya mosebetsi fokotsehile ho tloha dipersenteng tse.

src_text: 3 ekoteni yesine yomnyaka wee-2021 ukuya kama-.
tgt_text: 3 kotareng ya bone ya 2021 ho ya dipersenteng tse.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: 5 kotareng ya pele ya.

src_text: Izinga elinabileko lokutlhayela kwemisebenzi lehlile emakoteni amabili ngokulandelana.
tgt_text: Ke kotara ya bobedi jwale sekgahla se atolositsweng sa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi se fokotseha.

src_text: Inzuzo ekulu ngemisebenzi kube semikhakheni yemisebenzi yomphakathi neyezehlalakuhle, yokukhiqiza neyerhwebo.
tgt_text: Mesebetsi mengata fumanwe makaleng ditshebeletso tsa baahi le setjhaba, makaleng tlhahiso le bohwebi.

src_text: IPahla ePheleleko yangeKhaya (i-GDP) ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2022 ikhule nge-.
tgt_text: Tlhahiso yohle ya kahara naha kotareng ya pele ya 2022 hodile ka persente tse.

src_text: 9% okubuyisela umnotho welizwe lekhethu esigeni sangaphambi kokwehla kukamabhubhisa oyi-corona.
tgt_text: 9% mme sena sa lekanya moruo wa rona le nakong ya pele ho sewa sena.

src_text: Kilekota, umkhakha wokukhiqiza ngiwo oqinise umnotho khulu ngokukhula ekukhiqizweni kweembaseli namakhemikhali, ukugoma neenselo, amamethali nemitjhini.
tgt_text: Kotareng eo, lekala la tlhahiso bile lona le sebetsang ka matla mme le bile le kgolo tlhahisong ya petroliamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le dimethale le metjhini..     Phaello tsena tse itekanetseng di bontsha hore moruo wa rona ntse le matla le hore maiteko kang Leano la Tlhophisobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ntse matlafala.

Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle ho tshehetsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tsa lehae ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tsa tsona..     Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya mokgatlo wa ditekolo wa S&P Global ya ho lekolabotjha maemo Afrika Borwa ho kgona ho lefa melato ya yona – ho tloha maemong tsitsitseng ho ya ho matle.

src_text: Lokhukuhluma okulingeneko kutjengisa ukuthi umnotho welizwe lekhethu usesenamandla nokobana amano wokufaka isandla njengeHlelo lokwAkha kabuTjha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP)  kungezeleleka amandla.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona boetse behile bokgoni ba naha ba ho lefa melato ya ditjhelete tsa dinaha tse ding ho BB minus le ya tjhelete ya kwano ho BB.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela woke umuntu ukusekela amabhizinisi namabubulo wangekhaya ngokuthenga imikhizo eyenziwe ekhayapha.
tgt_text: Theko ya tsa ho Iphedisa.
Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19) le ntwa ntseng tswela pele lefatsheng di bile le kameho matla thekong ya tsa ho iphedisa lefatsheng ka bophara.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto sesikhungo sokulinganisa i-S&P Global sokubuyekeza izinga lobujamo beemali zeSewula Afrika – ukusukela kobunzinzileko ukuya kobukarisako.
tgt_text: Maafrika Borwa le ona tsieditswe ke theko nyolohang ya mafura, dijo le tse ding tsa bohlokwa..     Re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho, re thusane re boele re baballe disebediswa tsa rona nakong tsena tse boima.

src_text: Isikhungo sokulinganisa sivumelene namazinga wesikolodo semali yangaphandle neyangaphakathi ezingeni le-BB minus nele-BB ngokulandelana..     Iindleko Zokuphila   .
tgt_text: Mmuso etsa ka hohle kamoo ka kgonang kateng ho thusa bohle, haholoholo ba futsanehileng..     Banka ya Afrika Borwa Kgolo sebetsang hantle matla le ikemetseng thusa ho sireletsa setjhaba ditlamoraong tsa boleng ba tjhelete ka ho tsitlallela infleishene seng batsi tlase ha ho bapiswa le ya dinaha tse ding..     Kabinete ananetse qeto ya Matlotlo Naha ya ho eketsa nako ya ho fokotswa ha Lekgetho la Mafura la Kakaretso (GFL).

src_text: Umabhubhisa wesiFo seNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) nenturhu eragako ephasini zibe nomthelela omkhulu eendlekweni zokuphila ephasini zombelele.
tgt_text: GFL fokoditswe ka  50 bakeng sa litara ya mafura ka Mmesa le Motsheanong, mme sena se tla tswela pele le ho tloha ho la 1 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 6 Phupu.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika nawo akhulelwe yihloko ngokukhula kweentengo zeembaseli, ukugoma neensetjenziswa eziqakathekileko.

tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya Khomeshene ya Ditlhodisano ya ho beha ditheko tsa dintho tsa bohlokwa leihlo, haholoholo pehelo ya hore dikgwebo di lokela ho fana ka mabaka ho eketsa ditheko tsa dihlahiswa..     Kopano ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Sidinga ukubambisana soke, sisizane songe iinsetjenziswa zethu kilesisikhathi esibudisi.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa Kopano ya morao ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa, eo ho yona ho dumellanweng ka lenaneo le leholo la mosebetsi le kenyeletsang tshebedisano ho tlisweng ha diphetoho ho tsa tikoloho, ditheknolojing tsa dipalangwang tsa motlakase le mehlodi ya motlakase ya tsa tlhaho..     Kopanong ho boetse ho dumellanwe ka hore ho be le letsholo la marangranng la ho hlakisa menyetla teng Afrika Borwa ho beng ba dikgwebo ba Japan, ntshetsopele ya boiphihlelo indastering ya lehae ya tlhahiso ya makoloi, menyetla ya tlhahiso le phapanyetsano ya boiphihlelo ho tsa tekgniki..     Japan ke nngwe ya dinaha tseo leng balekane ba bohlokwa kgwebisanong le rona mme tsetela haholo makaleng fapaneng Afrika Borwa, ho tloha ho tsa tlhahiso ya makoloi ho ya metjhining tswang pele ya merafong, le ho tloha ho kgwebo ho tsa temothuo ho ya ditshebeletsong tsa ditjhelete..     Kabinete boetse ananetse ho thehwa ha Mokgwatshebetso wa Barekisetsi ba Dinaheng tse ding ba Batho ba Batsho ke Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Ditlhodisano (dtic), molemong wa ho kopanya difeme tse romelang thepa entsweng naheng ena dinaheng tse ding lefatsheng.

src_text: Urhulumende wenza ngakho koke okusemandlenakhe ukwethula woke umuntu umthwalo, khulukhulu labo abanganabuyo.
tgt_text: Mokgwatshebeso ona tla thusa kabelanong ya tlhahisoleseding, bokgoni le tsebo, mme tsamaya mehlaleng ya dikatleho tsa Lenaneo la Beng ba Diindasteri ba Batho ba Batsho.

src_text: IBhanga yethu eKulu esebenza kuhle nenamandla isiza ukuvikela umphakathi ekurhayilweni yi-infleyitjhini ngokuthi ihlale ezingeni eliqothelweko; ngaphasi khulu kunelamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Eneji.
Mehato ya rona ya ho netefatsa boteng ba motlakase sa timeng  nako telele matlafaditswe kamora hore ho nehelanwe ka Karolo ya 4 ya Sebaka sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Kusile, Mpumalanga.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele isiqunto seZiko leeMali zeliZwe ukwelula isikhathi sokwehlisa umThelo weemBaseli  (i-GFL).
tgt_text: Ho nehelana hona ke letshwao la phihlello ya bohlokwa matsapeng Eskom ho tsitsisa mokgwatshebetso wa motlakase mme ho tla eketsa dimekawate (MW) tse 800 keriting ya matla..     Kabinete elelletswe hore kaho ya dikarolo tse nne tsa tse tsheletseng tsa ho fehla motlakase phethetswe projekeng ya Kusile ya ho Fehla Motlakase..     Kabinete ananetse ho eketswa ha bokgoni bo bong ba ho fehla motlakase keriting leng ntho kgonahaditsweng ke ho dumella bahlahisi ba motlakase ba ikemetseng hore ba hlahise motlakase.

src_text: I-GFL yehliswe nge-R. 50 ilitha eenyangeni  uSihlabantangana noMrhayili, godu isikhatheso sizokwelulwa  ukuya phambili ukusukela ngomhla wo-1  kuMgwengweni ukufikela  ngomhla we-6 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Mmuso sa tswa saena tumellano ya ho reka dimekawate tse 150 ho Scatec ASA, bao leng bahlahisi ba motlakase tswang mehloding ya tlhaho..     Lekgotla la Boeletsi la Matlafatso ya Batho ba Batsho Batsi Moruong (B-BBEE).

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu isiqunto seKomitjhini yePhaliswano sokuqalisisa iintengo zokugoma okuphilwa ngakho, khulukhulu isiqalelelo esisekela amabhizinisi nakakhuphula iintengo.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho kgethwa ha Lekgotla le letjha la naha la Boeletsi la B-BBEE.

Lekgotla le na le batho ba bangata ba tswang makaleng kgwebo, mekgatlo ya basebetsi, mekgatlo ya baahi le ditheo tsa thuto hodimo, ba tla thusa ho tataisa mmuso ho tlisweng ha diphetoho moruong..     Leha ho bile le kgatelopele kgahlisang molemong wa ho lokisa tse senyehileng nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo, ho sa na le tse ngata tse lokelang ho etswa ho matlafatsa botsamaisi ba batho ba batsho, ho matlafatsa ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le ho atolosa phumano ya thepa le ditshebeletso molemong wa ho neha batjha le basadi ba batho ba batsho menyetla.

src_text: Ikundla Yezamabhizinisi Hlangana KweSewula Afrika NeJapan.
tgt_text: Dikgohola.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  umphumela weKundla yezamaBhizinisi weSewula Afrika neweJapan ebeyibanjwe mhlapha, evumelene ngehlelo lomsebenzi  oncamileko elifaka hlangana ukusebenzisana  ngokuvula amabubulo akhandela ukusilaphazeka kwebhoduluko, itheknoloji yeenkoloyi zegezi nehayidrojini ehlwengileko.
tgt_text: Dithuso tse ntseng di tswella tsa mmuso diprovenseng tse anngweng ke dikgohola di etsa phapang kgolo.
Mmuso behile pele phumantsho ya dijo, metsi le botshabelo bakeng sa batho ba tlaletsweng ke naha, le ho lokiswa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso senyehileng.

src_text: Ikundla le ivumelene godu  ‘ngomkhangiso’  wethungelelwano levidiyo ukuveza amathuba weSewula Afrika  nakabanye abosomabhizinisi be-Japan, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa emabubulweni weenkoloyi walapha ekhethu,  imikhakha yezemisebenzi ekukhiqizeni nokwabelana ngelemuko lezecwephetjhe.
tgt_text: Ho sebetswa ka matla ho tsoseletsa ditshebeletso tsa motheo tse kang metsi, motlakase, bohlweki le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere..     Ke tjhelete ka bang dimiliyone tse R189, 217 sebediswang Lenaneong la Ntlafatso ya Mekhukhu leo ka lona sepheo leng ho fetola boleng ba bophelo ba ba phelang mekhukhung..     Ho boetse ho na le dimiliyone tse R733, 086 tsa Ntshetsopele ya Nyehelo ya Phumantsho ya Matlo tse tla thusa ho thehweng ha bodulo ba moshwelella le bo momahaneng ha batho..     Kabinete ananetse thuso ya botho tswang naheng ya Qatar ya dijo, diaparo, di-generator, dihlwekisametsi, metjhini thusang bakudi ho phefumoloha, ditente le disebediswa tsa bongaka.
Nyehelo ena tla thusa batho ba fetang 4 000 ka palo ba fuweng bodulo ba nakwana ditsing tsa tlhokomelo tsa baahi.

src_text: I-Japan ingomunye wabarhwebelani bethu abaqakathekileko nabasisimali abakhamba phambili emikhakheni yeSewula Afrika, ukuthoma ngeenkoloyi, imitjhinini yeemayini yezinga eliphezulu, zokulima nezeemali.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse thuso ya botho tswang United Arab Emirates (UAE) ya dijo le metsi ho thusa mahlatsipa dikgohola..     Ho Thehwa ha Letlole la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba.
1    Kabinete ananetse ho thehwa ha Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba ke Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Diindasteri (IDC) sebedisana le lefapha la Bookamedi le dtic.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele godu  ukusungulwa kweThungelelwano labaThengiseli bangaPhandle babaNtu abaNzima (i-Black Exporters Network) elisungulwe mNyango wezeRhwebo, amaBubulo nePhaliswano (i-dtic), ukuhlanganisa amabubulo wabantu abanzima njenganje abathumela imikhiqizo yabo yangekhaya kamanye amazwe.
tgt_text: Tshehetso ena tla thusa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi ya nakwana bakeng sa batjha ba ka bang 50 000 leng mesebetsi tla tswela setjhaba molemo etswang metseng.. 2    Tshehetso tla kenyeletsa tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle le ya baahi, dijo le phepo ntle ka mokgwa wa dibaka tsa ho phehela batho, ntshetsopele ya ho ngola le ho bala, mananeo ho hlokomedisa ka tsa tikoloho le ho lwantsha diphetoho maemong lehodimo mmoho le maiteko ho tshehetsa batjha.

src_text: Ithungelelwaneli lizokukghonakalisa ukwabelana ngelwazi, ilemuko namakghono, lakhela godu phezu kwepumelelo yeHlelo laboSomabubulo abaNzima.
tgt_text: Letlole le tla tshehetsa dikgwebo tse 26 tsa baahi le tse sa iketsetseng phaello..     Bosenyi le Bobodu.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho tshwarwa ha batho mabapi le diketso tsa manyofonyofo, ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong le bobodu.

src_text: Amano wethu wokufumana amandla isikhathi eside asekeleke khulu ngemva  kokudluliselwa ephikweni lezerhwebo kwe-Unit 4 yePhawa iKusile  eseMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Ba tshwerweng ba kenyeletsa bao neng le bahlanka ba hodimo mmusong le dikgwebong tsa mmuso, mme ba bang ba bona ba tobane le diqoso tse kenyeletsang ho tlolwa ha Molao wa Botsamaisi ba Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).

src_text: Lokhukudluliswa kungelinye iliqhasilinganiso emizameni ye-Eskom yokunzinzisa ihlelo lokuphehlwa kwegezi, kanti lizokungezelela ama-800 wama-megawatt (MW) ethungelelwaneni lokuphehlwa kwegezi.
tgt_text: Ho tshwarwa ha batho bana ho kenyeletsang le ho tshwarwa ha mohlanka wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha, Setsing sa Kamohelo ya Baphaphathehi sa Desmond Tutu, Pretoria, ya belaellwang ka ho nka tjotjo ho letswantle, ke bopaki ba hore ha ho motho eo molao sa tlo mo fihlela mme ha ho sebaka sa basebetsi ba sa tshepahaleng lekaleng la setjhaba..     Kabinete boetse ananetse kgatelopele bonahalang pusetsong ya baena ba ha Gupta, Rajesh le Atul, Afrika Borwa.
Sena se latela ho tshwarwa ha morao ha bona Dubai, UAE, kamora hore Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Mapolesa Bosenyi (Interpol) ntshe ditsebiso tsa ho ba batla.

src_text: Ikhabinethi itjheje ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwamayunithi amane aphehla igezi kasithandathu sele kuphelile kilephrojekthi yePhawa  iKusile.
tgt_text: Bobedi bona bo batleha Afrika Borwa mabapi le seabo sa bona ho hatjweng ha mmuso, ho kenyeletsa manyofonyofo le ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong.
Ditherisano pakeng tsa mekgatlo ya tshebetso ya molao ya naha ya UAE le Afrika Borwa ka pusetso ya bona naheng ya rona di tswela pele.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele ukungezelelwa okutjha kwamandla kilelithungelelwano lokuphehla igezi, okuphunyeleliswe siqunto sokuvumela abaphehli begezi abazijameleko ukuthi baphehle igezi.
tgt_text: Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa maikemisetso mmuso ho lwantsha bosenyi le bobodu ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..     Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa metjha le mekgwa sebetsang hantle ya hore ba belaellwang ka bosenyi ba ikarabelle diketsong tsa bona tse mpe le ho netefatsa hore ha ho ya kahodima molao..     Kabinete nyatsitse boiteko bo se nang dihlong ba ho kgella mmuso le naha ya rona fatshe kamora hore ho senngwe hampe kheibole Karolong ya 1 ya Seteishene sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Matla sa Eskom, Mpumalanga ne le ketsahalo ya bone ya tshenyo belaellwang seteisheneng sa ho fehla motlakase kamora hore diketsahalo tse tshwanang le eo di tlalehwe diteisheneng tse ding tse tharo dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng.

src_text: Urhulumende usandukutlikitla isivumelwano sokuthenga ama-MW ali-150  kumphehli wegezi ozijameleko, i-Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa diketso tsa bosenyi ke pontsho ya hore re tlameha ho leka ka matla re le setjhaba ho etsa hore ho be le polokeho metseng ya rona.

src_text: UmKhandlu Oweluleka Ngokuhlonyiswa Kwabantu Abanzima Ngamandla Womnotho (i-B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Dintlha tsena di re hopotsa hore ho lwantsha bosenyi ke boikarabelo ba setjhaba le hore kaofela ha rona, ho kenyeletsa mapolesa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, baahi, malapa, beng ba dikgwebo, basebetsi le mekgatlo ya baahi, re lokela ho ba le seabo twantshong ya bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore ditjhelete tse ding tse behetsweng thoko ke Lefapha la Mapolesa bakeng sa diteishene tsa mapolesa tse nang le palo hodimo ya melato ya dipolao, dipeto le diketso tse ding tsa bosenyi ba dikgoka, di tla thusa ho fetola maemo le ho tlisa polokeho metseng..     Tsa Morao tsa COVID-.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele  ukubeka kwakaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa umKhandlu omutjha oLuleka nge-B-BBEE elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Kabinete hopoditse bohle hore COVID-19 ha so fele mme dikotsi tsa tshwaetso tse ntjha di tla eketseha nakong ya mariha.

Re tlameha ho tswela pele ho nka mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho itshireletsa le ba bang kenyeletsa ho hlapa kapa ho hlwekisa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala semonkwana ha le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere hore ho kene moya le ho enta..     Seboka sa African Union (AU).

src_text: Umkhandlu lo wakhiwe babantu abahlukileko ngokwamabhizinisi, iinhlangano zabasebenzi, iinhlangano ezinzinze emphakathini nabosolwazi bezefundo, abazokuthwala umsebenzi wokubonisa  urhulumende ngokutjhugululwa komnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tsebahatso, boitlamo le boinehelo bo ananetsweng Sebokeng se sa Tlwaelehang sa AU sa Boferekanyi le Diphetoho tse sa Tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo Afrika se neng se tshwaretswe Malabo, Republic of Equatorial Guinea, ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotse ditshoso tse pheelletseng, ba lekola mekgwa ya jwale ya ho di arabela mme ba itlama ho matlafatsa polokeho ya dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa AU tse tobaneng le boferekanyi le bongangele..     Lefu la Monkeypox.
Kabinete tiiseditse Maafrika Borwa hore balaodi ba rona ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba malala laotswe ho beha leihlo le ho thibela lefu la Monkeypox kamora hore le qhome dinaheng tse se nang lona.

src_text: Nanyana ibonakala nje indima esele yenziwe ukubuyisela emva ukudungwa komnotho njengoba wadungwa mbuso webandlululo (i-apartheid) nje, kodwana usesemnengi umsebenzi ekusafanele wenziwe ukwandisa isandla sokulawula sabantu abanzima, nokuphakamisa amakghonofundwa kunye nokunabisa ihlelo lokuthengwa kwepahla kobanyana abantu abasikazi babantu abanzima nelutjha bazokuvulekelwa mathuba.
tgt_text: Leha ho se motho ya fumanweng na le lefu lena Afrika Borwa, balaodi ba tsa bophelo bo botle naheng ba tswela pele ho beha maemo ana leihlo     Qeto ya Kabinete.
Puisano le Setjhaba ka Mehato ya ho Sebetsana le Kgwebo seng Molaong ya Masalla Ditshepe.

src_text: Iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le dipuisano le setjhaba mabapi le ditshisinyo tsa ho thibela kgwebo ya masalla ditshepe tse utswitsweng le tse lokisitsweng.

src_text: Inendima ebonakalako imizamo karhulumende esaragako yokubethula umthwalo abantu abacaphazelekileko eemfundeni lapho kusandukusahlela khona iinkhukhula.
tgt_text: Boshodu ba masalla ditshepe le dikheibole tsa koporo meralong ya ditshebeletso ya setjhaba bo sitisa tshebetso ya moruo ka ho baka ditjeho tse hodimo.

src_text: Urhulumende ukwenze kwaba liqaloqangi ukunikela ngokudla, amanzi nobusithelo kilabo abasele banganabuyo nokulungiswa komthangalasisekelo owonakeleko.
tgt_text: Tse ding tsa ditshitiso di kenyeletsa tshitiso ya phepelo ya motlakase le ditshebeletso tsa diterene ka lebaka la diporo tse sentsweng.

src_text: Sewuthomile umsebenzi omkhulu wokulungisa nokuvuselela ukutholakala kweensetjenziswa ekuphilwa ngazo, njengamanzi, igezi kunye nokukhanjiswa/nokulahlwa kweenzibi.
tgt_text: Ho sitisa tsamaiso ya dipalangwang tsa bapalami ho eketsa ditefello tsa ho tsamaya.

Dikheibole tsa motlakase tse sentsweng le tse sa bolokehang di kotsi ho baahi, haholoholo bana..     Kabinete laetse dtic ho etella pele dipuisano bakeng sa nako itseng, le ho nonya maikutlo setjhaba le makala loketseng, ka mehato sebetsang hantle eo mmuso ka kenyang tshebetsong ho thibela ho senngwa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso ya bohlokwa.

src_text: Imali epheze ibe ziingidi ezi-R189, 217 isetjenziselwa iHlelo lokuVuselela iiNdawo zokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu ngazo okuzokwenziwa ngcono ipilo yabantu abahlala emikhukhwini.
tgt_text: Kamora moo, Kabinete tla tsebahatsa mehato tjhaetsweng monwana     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
Seboka sa Matjhaba se Mabapi le Theknoloji Polokong ya Kgotso (PTPS) sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN).

src_text: Singezelelwe ngeengidi ezima-R733, 086 isiBonelelo sokuThuthukisa ukuHlaliswa kwabantu nokusiza  ekwakhiweni kweendawo zabantu ezihlalekako.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara seboka sa Botshelela sa PTPS Lekgotleng la Diphuputso tsa Saense le Diindasteri Pretoria ho tloha ka Labobedi la la 21 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.

Ho lebelletswe baromuwa ba 300 ba tswang dinaheng tse 50 tseo leng ditho sebokeng sena..     Seboka se kopanya ba nang le thahasello ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng, le batho ka kakaretso Dinaheng tseo leng Ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng molemong wa hore ba sebetse mmoho tshebedisong ya ditheknoloji tsa sejwalejwale le tse tswetseng pele le dikgopolotaba matsholong poloko ya kgotso Matjhaba Kopaneng.

src_text: IKhabinethi yamukele isizo lemBusweni we-Qatar elikukudla, izambatho, amajenereyitha, iinhlanzekisi zamanzi, imitjhini yokuphefumula, amatende nemitjhoga.
tgt_text: Seboka se tla sebediswa jwaloka lepatlelo la ho abelana ka tlhahisoleseding le ho qothisana lehlokwa bakeng sa dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa UN tse nang le seabo matsholong ho boloka kgotso ka tshebediso ya ditheknoloji tsa morao tjena matsholong ana..     Tlhodisano ya Naha Tshwarwang Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi tla Tshwarwa Lekgetlo la Bone ya WorldSkills South Africa (WSZA).

src_text: Lomnikelo uzokusiza izakhamuzi ezingaphezu kwee-4 000 ezisaje zifihliswe ihloko eendaweni zokutjheja umphakathi.
tgt_text: Ho tshwerwe Tlhodisano ya Naha ya Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi ya Bone ya WSZA, Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 10 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ntlafatso ya Tlhahiso ya ba Etsang Mesebetsi ya Matsoho Mongwahakgolong wa bo-21”..     Ketsahalo ena sebedisetswa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba batho ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka mosebetsi ka phedisang motho le ho lebisa tshebedisanong le ba bang indastering ena.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yamukele godu isizo lezehlalakuhle elibuya elizweni i-United Arab Emirates (UAE) ngokunikela ngokugoma namanzi ukusiza abongazimbi beenkhukhula zamhlapha.
tgt_text: Ketsahalo ena boetse sebedisetswa ho lekola boemo ba boithuto ba mosebetsi le ntshetsopele ya ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho hodima ho kgothaletsa ho kgethwa ha mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka kgetho ya pele ya baithuti ba rona     Molaetsa.

MatshedisoKabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lebisitse matshediso Lelapeng la Boreneng le setjhabeng sa Borena ba Maphoto kamora ho hlokahala ha Motlotlehi Morena Moholo Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao..     Monghadi Jacob Ganny Mbele jwaloka Molaodi-Kakaretso (DG) Lefapheng la Diminerale le Eneji..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi ba Meru Lefapheng la Meru, Botshwasi le Tikoloho.

src_text: Ukuvulwa Kwesikhwama Sokuthuthukisa Umphakathi  .
tgt_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu jwaloka Moeletsi ya ka Sehloohong wa Mmuso wa Molao Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe jwaloka Mokhomeshenara Khomesheneng ya Ditlhodisano..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa jwaloka Moeletsi ya Ikgethang wa nako tsohle ho Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo lefapheng la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso le Tsamaiso.

src_text: Ukutjhuguluka Kwetlayimethi.
tgt_text: Diphetoho Maemong Lehodimo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuvakatjhela eSewula Afrika kukaNom.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Monghadi Alok Sharma, Afrika Borwa, eo leng Mopresidente wa Seboka sa bo-26 sa Maemo Lehodimo sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN), ho tloha ka la 19 ho ya ho la 21 Phuptjane 2022, le tekolo ya hae ya hore Afrika Borwa bontshitse ho ikemisetsa ho fetohela enejing ya mehlodi ya tsa tlhaho..  Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kopane le baetapele ba bang tsebahatsong ya tshebedisano ya bohlokwa le dinaha tsa France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika, mmoho le European Union, molemong wa ho tshehetsa phetoho nang le toka moruong sebedisang mehlodi ya eneji sa hlahiseng khabone le setjhaba se nang le bokgoni ba ho emelana le maemo lehodimo mabe..  Afrika Borwa sebeditse ka thata itokisetsa ho fetela tlhahisong ya motlakase hlwekileng le ho fallela mehloding ya eneji ya tlhaho kang matla mafura hlwekileng etswang ka metsi le motlakase, dimela, matla moya, matla letsatsi le metsi, hara mehlodi meng.

src_text: Alok Sharma, onguMengameli wehlandla lama-26 lomHlangano weenKhulu zeHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) ngokuTjhuguluka kweTlayimethi, ukusukela ngomhla we-19 ukuyokufika kumhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, yathokozela nokulinganisa kwakhe ukuthi iSewula Afrika izibophelele ngokubonakalako  ngokweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko.
tgt_text: Motswako ona wa eneji tlisa tekatekano pakeng tsa mehlodi ya eneji ho netefatsa matla tshepehang emelanang le ditlhoko tsa naha tsa eneji tse eketsehang..  Tshebediso ya Ente ya Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).

Kabinete ananetse ho theoha ka matla ha palo ya batho ba tshwaetswang ke COVID-19 rekotilweng Afrika Borwa dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ya kgothaletsa batho bohle ba loketseng, ho tswela pele ka ho enta leng ntho thusang ho thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala..  Ho fihlela jwale halofo ya palo ya batho ba baholo ba Maafrika Borwa se fumane bonnyane ente le nngwe ya COVID-.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2021, uMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nabanye abarholi ekumemezeleni ukusebenzisana okwakhe umlando bokubambisana naborhulumende bamazwe naka alandelako: i-France, iJarimani, i-United Kingdom ne-United States kunye ne-European Union ukusekela ihlelo elilungileko lokweyamela emnothweni womthamo ophasi wekhabhoni kunye nomphakathi okwazi ukujamelana nokutjhuguluka kwetlayimethi.
