tgt_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho sebedisa tjhelete ya tswala tlase eo sa tswa kadingwa ke Banka la Lefatshe ho reka diente tse ding tsa COVID-19 le ho netefatsa hore setjhaba se sireletsehile ka ho lekaneng ditshwaetsong tse ka bang teng..  Kabinete boetse buisane ka dintlha tse amanang le tswelopele taolong ya sewa sa COVID-19, haholoholo kgatelopele etswang molemong wa ho kgutlela bophelong bo tlwaelehileng.
Letona la Bophelo bo Botle, Ngaka Joe Phaahla, le tla fana ka dintlha tse ding..  Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha.

src_text: ISewula Afrika seyinesikhathi isebenza ngokukhuthala, isebenzela ukulungiselela ukweyamela ehlelweni leembaseli ezingasilaphaziko, ilungiselela nokuthoma ukusebenzisa imithombo yamandla weembaseli ehlwengileko, enjengehayidrojini ehlwengileko, i-biomas, umtjhiso wommoya, umtjhiso welanga, kunye negezi ephehlwa ngamanzi,  hlangana nezinye zeembaseli ezivuselelekako.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebohile Maafrika Borwa ohle ikamahantseng le mekete ya naha ya Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha ya Labone la la 16 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.” Moya wa tjantjello le matla bontshitsweng ke batjha naheng ka bophara ke dintho tse ka ketekelwang mme di tlisa tshepo ya bokamoso bo tjhatsi..  Jwalokaha re lebile mafelong Kgwedi ya Naha ya Batjha re tebiseng matsapa rona ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fihlella mananeo mangata ao mmuso fanang ka ona le ho ba thusa hore ba kgone ho ba le seabo moruong..  Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba, jwaloka mohiri moholo arabetse phephetso ena ka ho thusa batjha ba phethetseng dithuto tsa bona ba sa sebetseng ho fumana boiphihlelo ka Lenaneo la Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba la ho Rupella Batjha Mosebetsing.

src_text: Lokhu okuthiwa ziimbaseli ezimvango kunzinzisa imithombo yamandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunegezi eyaneleko ezakugcina iindingo zegezi ezisolo zisanda elizweni lekhethweli.
tgt_text: Mmuso boetse kenya tshebetsong Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba (SEF) le Tsehebeletso tsoseleditsweng ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) leng maiteko ho theha mesebetsi tla thusa khirong ya batjha ba ka bang.

src_text: Ikarekelo Yomjovo Wesifo Sengogwana I-Corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Maiteko ana tla fana ka boiphihlelo bo hlokehang haholo ba mosebetsing mme boele tiise molemo wa seabo sa baahi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukwehla khulu kwenani labantu abangenwe sisifo se-COVID-19 eSewula Afrika eemvekaneni ezidlulileko, yabe yakhuthaza boke abantu abalungele ukuhlaba ukuthi baragele phambili basihlabele lesisifo, njengoba lokhu kulisizo nje ekuphephiseni abantu ukuthi bangangenwa magulo amambi, bangalaliswa esibhedlela namkha bagule bebabhubhe.
tgt_text: SEF sebetsa mmoho le mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso (di-NGO) ha NYS hira batjha ditshebeletsong tse tswelang baahi molemo naheng ka bophara..  Dipalangwang.
Kabinete ananetse Morero wa Dintlha tse 11 wa Tshebetso tla sebetsana le ho kwalwa ha mebila le ho hirwa ha matswantle jwaloka bakganni ba dilori.

src_text: Isiquntu sabo boke abantu abakhulu beSewula Afrika bekube nje, ubuncani bakhona sebakhe bahlaba kanye bahlabela i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Morero ona sibollotsweng ke Komiti ya Matona Fapaneng (IMC) ya Mebila le ho tsamaiswa ha Thepa ka tshebedisano le ba amehang indastering ya ho tsamaiswa ha thepa, hara tse ding kgothaletsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ditokomane tsa ho eta le ho ikamahanya le melao ya tsa basebetsi..  IMC thehetswe ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tse jeleng setsi tsa ho kwalwa ha mebila le mehwanto ya boipelaetso ya bakganni ba dilori ba Maafika Borwa ba sa kgotsofalang.

src_text: Urhulumende unqophe ukusebenzisa imali asandukubolekwa yona mhlapha evunyelwe yiBhanga yePhasi, enamakonyana aphasi, ukungezelela imithamo yomjovo we-COVID-19, kuzokuqinisekiseka ukuthi isitjhaba sivikeleke ngokwaneleko engozini yokutheleleka ngalesisifo..  IKhabinethi ibuye yaqala neendaba eziphathelene nokulawulwa kwesifo esikhe sarhagalesi, i-COVID-19, khulukhulu malungana nendima esele yenziwe nokubuyela ngokupheleleko emisebenzini ejayelekileko kezomnotho.
tgt_text: Mehwanto le ho kwalwa ha mebila di na le kameho mpe phallong ya dipalangwang tshosa boramatsete ba dinaha tse ding mme sa bohlokwa haholo na le kameho mpe moruong le metjheng bohlokwa ya phepelo sebedisang mebila amehang mehwantong..  Kgaello ya metsi Masepaleng Moholo wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezePilo uDorh.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse seabo sa Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) Masepaleng Moholo wa NMB, Kapa Botjhabela molemong wa ho thibela ho kwalwa ha phepelo ya metsi nakong eo provense tobaneng le mathata matla kgaello ya metsi qadileng ka.

src_text: Joe Phaahla usezasinikela eminye imininingwana malungana nalokhu.
tgt_text: DWS sebetsa le provense ho kenya tshebetsong mehato ya nako kgutshwane bohareng le telele ya ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa komello..  Kabinete boetse ipileditse ho baahi ba NMB ho ikamahanya le melawana ya metsi behilweng ke bomasepala ba lehae ho netefatsa boteng ba metsi nako telele.

Ka kakaretso, metsi sebediswang ka letsatsi lokela ho fokotswa ka dilitara tse dimiliyone di 50, ho tloha ho dilitara tse dimiliyone di 280 tse sebediswang hona jwale ka letsatsi, mme sena se tla lebisa tshebedisong ya dilitara tse dimiliyone di 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le bobodu.

src_text: ILanga LeLutjha LeliZweloke.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha mosebetsi wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha ofising ya Benoni ya nehileng moahi wa Bangladesh bukana ya ho eta ya mokunyata.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze woke amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlanganyela esikhumbuzweni seLanga leLutjha leliZweloke ngeLesine, ngomhla we-16 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sikhuthazela Ingomuso Elingcono Lendlela Yokuziphilisa Ebambelelako Nekhambisana Nobujamo Bezinto Elutjheni.” Ummoya wamandla wetjisakalo newokujamelana nobujamo bezinto otjengiswa lilutjha elizweni lekhethu loke umthombo wokuhlalela ethembeni nokuthokozela ingomuso elingcono.
tgt_text: Mosebetsi eo leng Mme Sibongile Simelane fumane beili ya R5 000 Lekgotleng la Dinyewe la Makgistrata la Benoni ka Labobedi la la 21 Phuptjane.
Moahi enwa wa Bangladesh leng Monghadi Fahim Kazi tshwerwe leka ho tswa naheng ena ka la 12 Motsheanong 2022 sebedisa lebitso la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: Njengoba iNyanga YeLutjha seyiya ngekupheleni nje, asiqiniseni imizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abatjha bayawathola amahlelo amanengi avulwe ngurhulumende wabe wakghonakalisa nokuthi baba nelitho abalenzako emnothweni.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha (DHA) le sa tswa romela sebapadi sa dipaleng sa Lithuania, Ieva Andrejevaite naheng ya habo, ha ne batla ho sebedisa hampe botsamaisi ba Afrika Borwa ba taolo ya baphaphathehi iqapela pale eo seng nnete batla botshabelo kwano ka lebaka la “ntwa Ukraine.”.
Kabinete rorisitse mosebetsi etswang ke Karolo ya ho Lwantsha Bobodu ya DHA thoholetsa le ho kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa ho tswela pele ka ho tlaleha diketso tseo tsa tlolo ya molao.

src_text: IKoro yemBusweni, njengoba imqatjhi omkhulu kinabo boke nje, isisikimele lesisitjhijilo ngokuvulela iimfundiswa ezineziqu kodwana ezingasebenziko ukuthi zithole ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi ngehlelo lokuFundisa iimFundiswa ezineziQu umsebenzi emBusweni.
tgt_text: Diketso tse seng molaong tsa Maafrika Borwa rekisang boitsebiso ba ona di na le ditlamorao tse mpe le tse kgolo bakeng sa polokeho ya naha le maemo yona bophelong ba setjhaba le moruong wa yona.

src_text: Urhulumende godu uphumelelisa isiKhwama sokuVulela umPhakathi imiSebenzi (i-SEF) ngehlelo leLutjha eliVuselelwe ngobuTjha (i-NYS) lokuvula imisebenzi, elizakuvulela abantu abatjha amasango wokungena emnothweni; ihlelo ngalinye kilawa lizakuvulela abantu abatjha abama-50 000 amasango wokungena emnothweni.
tgt_text: Mmuso tla tswella le ho nka mehato matla kgahlano le mang kapa mang ya ikamahanyang le diketso tse seng molaong tseo leng tello melao ya rona ya ho kena naheng ena, ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..  Kabinete boetse ananetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha titjhere ya Durban, mme Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ya ahlotsweng dilemo tse tharo tsa ho sebeletsa setjhaba le tse nne tsa tjhankaneng, mme hloletswe kantle dilemo tse tharo ke Lekgotla la Dinyewe la Lebatowa la Mlazi, Kwazulu-Natal – ka ho tlola Molao wa Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala wa Mebuso ya Lehae, 2000 (Molao wa 27 wa 2000).

Jwaloka titjhere sekolong se neng se le sebaka sa ho kgetha nakong ya Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala, Mme Gabuza dumetse molato wa ho kgetha makgetlo 24, ho kenyeletsa makgetlo 12 Dikgethong tsa Bomasepala le 12 Dikgetho tsa Diwate..  Kahlolo ena ke pontsho matla ya boinehelo ba Khomeshene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa ya ho nka bohato kapele le ho bontsha taolo ya boitshwaro bo bobe.

src_text: Amagadango lawa-ke angeze agcine ngokunikela ilimuko lokwazi umsebenzi elidingeke khulu, kodwana lizakuqinisa namandla wokuthi abantu abatjha babe zizakhamuzi ezinelizwi eendabeni zelizwe.
tgt_text: Ena ke tiisetso matla ya mekgwatshebetso ya dikgetho seng matlafaditswe ka ho hlahiswa ha Sesebediswa sa Taolo ya Bakgethi thibelang ho kgetha habedi..  Kabinete tiisitse hore dikgetho ke tshiya ya demokrasi ya rona mme di lokela ho sireletswa ka hohle kamoo ho ka kgonehang kateng..  Seboka sa bo-12 sa Matona (MC12) sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Kgwebisano (WTO).

src_text: I-SEF isebenzisana neenhlangano ezingasizombuso (ama-NGO) bese kuthi i-NYS isebenzise abantu abatjha emisebenzini ebuyisela umphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa WTO MC12 neng tshwaretswe Geneva, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 12 ho ya ho la 17 Phuptjane 2022, haholoholo qeto reng dinaha tse nang le bokgoni di ka ba le ditokelo tsa ho hlahisa diente tsa COVID-19 ho fihlela ka.
Qeto ya ho atolosa sena hore se kenyeletse kalafo le hlahlobo tsa COVID-19 kgutliseditswe morao ka dikgwedi tse tsheletseng.

src_text: Zokuthutha  .
tgt_text: Esale Afrika Borwa itlhomme pele boipiletsong ba hore WTO dumelle dinaha tse ding ho ba le ditokelo tsa ho iketsetsa diente tsa COVID-19 mme sena se ka netefatsa hore ho na le phihlello lekanang enteng le ho kgonahatsa hore dinaha tse nang le bokgoni ba ho hlahisa diente di di etsa..  Seboka se boetse sa inehela motjheng bulehileng le kenyeletsang bohle molemong wa ho tlisa diphetoho mesebetsig ya sona, mme ha dumellanwa ka ditumellano tsa kgwebisano tse sebetsanang le tsa bophelo bo botle, ho behwa ha meedi dithusong tsa botshwasi, kemiso ya nakwana kgwebisanong ya marangranng le boteng ba dijo nako telele  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokozele iHlelo lomSebenzi lamaPhuzu ali-11 elizakusebenza ngomraro wokuvalwa kweendlela nokuqatjhwa kwabatjhayeli bamathraga abamaphandle.
tgt_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la ho Fallela Kgasong ya Dijithale (BDM).

src_text: Ihlelweli, elitlanywe yiKomidi eHlanganyelwe miNyango yaboNgqongqotjhe (i-IMC) eqalene nezeeNdlela nokuThutha ngokusebenzisana nababelani bezeendlela nezokuthutha, likhuthaza ukuthotjelwa kwemithetho yeencwadi zokukhamba (ama-visa) ikhuthaze nokuthotjelwa kwemithetho yezemisebenzi nezabasebenzi, hlangana nokhunye.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsebisitswe ka tsa morao Lenaneong la BDM mme ya amohela kgatelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa ha di-set-top box le karolo ya ho fallela kgasong ya dijithale ho tloha ho ya analogue.

Kabinete boetse tobokeditse tlhokeho potlakileng ya ho phethela BDM molemong wa ho etsa hore ho be le spectrum se hlokehang bakeng sa phihlello ya inthanete, le bakeng sa mesebetsi meng amanang le theknoloji ya tlhahisoleseding le dikgokahano..  Letona la Dikgokahano le Ditheknoloji tsa Dijithale, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni le tla ba le seboka le boraditaba hosane (Labohlano, 24 Phuptjane) ho fana ka dintlha tse ding.

src_text: I-IMC yasungulelwa ukulungisa ukuvalwa kweendlela okuthuweleleko nokutjhagala kwabatjhayeli bamathraga beSewula Afrika abanghonghoyilako.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.

src_text: Imitjhagalo nokuvalwa kweendlela kuliya ukukhambeka kweendlela, kwethusa abasisi bangaphandle, kanti ngaphezu kwakho koke, kuthela umnotho namarherho aqakathekileko wokukhambisa ipahla ngamacaphazela amambi, njengoba amarherho lawa asebenzisa leziindlela lapho kukhamba khona amathraga ekubangwa umsebenzi wawo nje.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tlaleho ya bobedi ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
Tlaleho fana ka tlhahisoleseding mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Morero wa Naha wa Tshebetso wa Bana bakeng sa 2019 ho ya ho.

src_text: Ukutlhayela Kwamanzi Kumasipaladi Wedorobha i-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB)          .

IKhabinethi ithokozela igadango elithethwe mNyango wezaManzi nokuHlwengisa (i-DWS) kuMasipaladi we-NMB ePumalanga Kapa ukuphepha iLanga lokuPhela kweziYela (elaziwa nge-Day Zero) njengoba lesisifunda sitlhayelelwa mamanzi kangaka nje solo kwangomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tlaleho hlakisa dikatleho tsa 2020 ho ya ho boetse hlakisa dibaka tse sa ntseng di fana ka bothata, ho kenyeletsa polokeho ya bana le ho se lekane pakeng tsa bana ba hlokang le ba sa hlokeng.

src_text: I-DWS isebenzisana nesifunda ukuphumelelisa amagadango wesikhatjhana, newesikhathi esilingeneko kunye newesikhathi eside wokuthundubaza ubukhali besomiso kilesisiphande.
tgt_text: Tlaleho boetse bontsha kamoo sewa sa COVID-19 se ammeng bana kateng nakong ena..  Sepheo ka mehato ya ho kena dipakeng kenngwang tshebetsong ke mmuso ke ho netefatsa ho hlomphuwa ha ditokelo tsa bana, jwalokaha di hlalositswe Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
Mehato ena boetse tshehetsa maitlamo naha Ditumellanong tsa Dinaha tsa Matjhaba tsa Ditokelo tsa Ngwana (UNCRC) le Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Afrika ya Ditokelo le Thekolohelo ya Ngwana (ACRWC).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yakhwezelela izakhamuzi ze-NMB ukuthi zibabalele amanzi ngokuthobela imibandela yesilinganiso sokusetjenziswa kwamanzi esibekwe ngumasipaladi wendawo.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa saenne ditokomane tsa UNCRC le ACRWC..  Tlaleho bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha mmuso le ba bang ba amehang boemong ba naha le ba diprovense.

src_text: Kubekwe isilinganiso esithi ukusetjenziswa kwamanzi kufanele siphungulwe ngama-50 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga, ukusuka ema-280 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga njenganje, ukuyokufika ema-230 weengidi zamalitha ngelanga.
tgt_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla behwa websaeteng ya Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba: www.dsd.gov.za.
Tlaleho ya Nako le Nako ya Afrika Borwa ho UNCRC Kopantsweng ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ho UNCRC.

src_text: Ubulelesi Nobukhohlakali.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Tlaleho ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ya Nako le Nako ho UNCRC.

src_text: IKhabinethi izithokozele iindaba zokubotjhwa kwesiphathimandla somNyango wezaNgekhaya esisebenzela e-ofisini le-Benoni, esibotjhelwe ukwenzela isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh ipaspoti yomgunyathi, mhlapha.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena tla kamora ya bobedi tekilweng ho UNCRC ka.

src_text: Isiphathimandleso, uMma uSibongile Simelane, uvulelwe ngebheyili yee-R5000 eKhotho kaMarhistrada we-Benoni ngeLesibili womhla wama-21 kuMgwengweni wee-.
Isakhamuzi se-Bangladesh esenzelwe ipaspoti yomgunyathi, uNom.
tgt_text: Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho latela Karolo ya 44 ya UNCRC, mme boetse akaretsa ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tse entsweng tlalehong ya ho qetela.

src_text: Fahim Kazi, ubotjhwe alinga ukubaleka ekhethwapha ngomhla we-12 kuMrhayili wee-2022, ngegama lika-‘Lebogang Ndlovu.’         .
tgt_text: UNCRC rometse ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tsa naha ka.

src_text: UmNyango wezaNgekhaya (i-DHA), mhlapha usandukududula umlingisi omsikazi we-Lithuania uMma u-Ieva Andrejevaite, wambuyisela ekhabo, nabekalinga ukukhwabanisela ihlelo leSewula Afrika lokubhadwa ngekhwapha kwabantu abaphalalele ekhethwapha, ngokuleya amala nakalinga ukwenza isibawo sokubhaciswa asithi batjho ubaleke “ipi elwa e-Ukraine.”                 .
IKhabinethi iyawubuka umsebenzi owenziwa liPhiko le-DHA eliLwa nobuKhohlakali.
tgt_text: Pokeletso entswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha ohle loketseng le ba amehang naheng ka bophara.

src_text: Ithokoza beyikhuthaza amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili ngokuhlaba umkhosi ngezenzo zobulelesi ezinjengalezi.
tgt_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe UNCRC.

src_text: Ukwephula kwamaSewula Afrika umthetho ngokuthengisa abomazisi bawo kunemiphumela emimbi kumbi ekuphepheni nebujameni behlalakuhle yomnotho yelizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya naha ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha tlaleho ya pele ya Afrika Borwa ya naha mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong tekwa Lenaneong la Phumantsho ya Bodulo la UN (UN-Habitat).

src_text: Urhulumende uzakusolo abathathela amagadango abukhali nanganasirhawu, ngaphandle kwevalo, abantu abanesandla ezenzweni eziphambana nomthetho ezinyefisa imithetho elawula ukungena kwamaphandle lapha ekhethu.
tgt_text: UN-Habitat amohetse Lenaneo la yona le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong, Sebokeng sa yona sa Phumantsho ya Bodulo le Ntshetsopele ya Bodulo ba Ditoropng bo Tsitsitseng ka Mphalane.

Ho ne ho lebelletswe hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di nehelane ka ditlaleho tsa kgatelopele ka ho ithaopa..  Afrika Borwa tsheheditse ho amohelwa ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong mme hamorao ya le kenya tshebetsong ka Moralotshebetso Momahaneng wa Ntshetsopele ya Metse ya Ditoropong (IUDF).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele nokulahlwa ngecala abe ethweswe nesigwebo utitjhere weThekwini uMma uNomusa Precious Gabuza (oneminyaka ema-37) – ogwetjwe iminyaka emithathu yokusebenzela umphakathi, namine yokudosa ejele, elengiswe iminyaka emithathu eKhotho yesiPhande e-Umlazi KwaZulu-Natala – ngokwephula umThetho wezeKhetho laboRhulumende beeNdawo zemaKhaya womNyaka wee-2000 (umThetho Nomboro 27 wee-2000).
tgt_text: Sepheo sa IUDF ke ho tataisa ntshetsopele ya bodulo ba ditoropong bo kenyeletsang bohle, bo matla le bo nang le seriti..  Tlaleho ya kgatelopele bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mmuso wa naha, diprovense le mebuso ya lehae, le mekgatlo loketseng eo seng ya mmuso..  Lewa le Momahaneng la Ntshetsopele ya Batjha (IYDS).

src_text: UGabuza, ongutitjhere wesikolo esasisetjenziswa njengesiteyitjhi sokuvowuda ngeKhetho laboMasipala ngoSewula wee-2021, ulivumile icala lokuvowuda ngomgunyathi amahlandla ama-24 ekhethweneli; amahlandla ali-12 eKhethweni likaMasipala wabuye wavowuda amahlandla ali-12 eKhethwni lamaWadi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha IYDS.
Lewa le thusa ho kenya tshebetsong Leano la Naha la Batjha la 2020 ho ya ho.

src_text: Ukulahlwa kwakhe licala nokwethweswa kwakhe isigwebo kuphakamisa ukuzibophelela kweKomitjhini yezeKhetho eziJameleko yeSewula Afrika ekuthatheni amagadango wamsinyana wokukhalima izephulamthetho.
tgt_text: Le hlalosa diketsahalo, diprojeke le mananeo lokelang ho etswa ke ba fapaneng ba amehang ho tswa mekgatlong ya batjha..

src_text: Lokhu godu kubuye kube nanga bufakazi bamandla wamahlelo wezekhetho, esele aqiniswa solo kwathoma ukusetjenziswa kwesiSetjenziswa sokuLawula abaVowudi (i-Voter Management Device) esikhandela ukuvowuda kabili namkha ngokubuyelela kanengi.
tgt_text: Le boetse le thusa ka ho fokotsa phethapheto ya dithuso tsa mmuso mme le tataise kamoo mekgatlo ya basebetsi le lekala la poraefete di ka tshehetsang batjha ho fihlella menyetla.
Pokeletso ya lewa na le maikutlo makala fapaneng setjhabeng..  Moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Ho ya Ho Ile ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyavuma ukuthi amakhetho ayisika yehlelo lethu lentando yenengi, begodu kufuze avikelwe ngazo zoke iindlela.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.

Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo, mme di bohlokwa boiphedisong ba batho..  Tokomane ena ya Tataiso thusa ho kenya tshebetsong dkgothaletso tsa Moifo wa Boemo bo Hodimo wa Ditsebi kgethilweng ka 2019 hore lekolebotjha maano jwale, molao le mekgwa ya ditaba tse amanang le mefuta ya bohlokwa ya dihlodilweng..  Tlaleho kgothaleditse tshibollo ya leano le leholo le akaretsang la paballo le tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya dihlodilweng tsa naha.

src_text: IKhonfrensi YaboNgqongqotjhe Yehlandla le-12 (MC12) YeHlangano YezeRhwebo YePhasi (i-WTO) .
tgt_text: Leano le tla kenngwa tshebetsong makaleng ohle mmuso.

src_text: IKhabinethi iwuthokozele umphumela we-WTO MC12 ebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland, ukusukela ngomhla we-12 ukuyokufika kumhla we-17 kuMgwengweni wee-2022, ithokozele khulukhulu isiqunto sokuthi amazwe afaneleko angawacitha amalungelo wobunikazimjovo bemijovo ye-COVID-19 bekube mnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Paballo bohlokwa bakeng sa letsholo la naha la ho potlakisa kgolo ya moruo le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..  Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha.

src_text: Siriyadiswe ngeenyanga ezintandathu isiqunto sokuthi lokhu kungadluliselwa na nemahlelweni wokulawula nokuthola ukuthi umuntu uphethwe yi-COVID-19, nemitjhogeni yokwelapha i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona.
Sepheo ka lewa ke ho hophisa le ho tlisa diphetoho indastering ya nama ya tse hlaha.

src_text: ISewula Afrika soke isikhathesi beyidosa phambili esibaweni sokuthi i-WTO ayisuse amalungelo wobunikazingqondo akhambisana nemijovo ye-COVID-19 okuzakwenza ukuthi boke abantu bakghone ukuthola umjovo ngokufanako nangokulinganako, kube kwenze nokuthi amazwe akghona ukukhiqiza imijovo enze njalo.
tgt_text: Sepheo se seng ke ho ba le seabo phumanehong ya dijo nako telele..  Indasteri ya nama ya tse hlaha indastering eo haholoholo sa hlophisehang sebetsang ka mokgwa sa momahanang.

Lewa lena le sisinngwang le fana ka mokgwa wa tshebetso tla hlophisa le ho matlafatsa lekala lena jwaloka le fanang ka dijo nako telele le la kgolo ya moruo le ka thusang ho thehweng ha menyetla ya mosebetsi  Dibili.

src_text: Ikhonfrensi le ibuye yazibophelela nehlelweni elivulekileko neliqalelela umuntu woke lokuhlela ngobutjha yoke imisebenzi yayo, yabe yavumela nebuthelelo leemvumelwano zokurhwebelana emakorweni anjengezepilo, nekubekweni kweenlinganiso eemalini eziphungula iindleko ekuthiyweni kweenhlambi, ukujanyiswa kwesikhatjhana kokurhweba ngethungelelwano le-inthanethi kunye nelokutholakala kokudla   Iinqunto ZeKhabinethi   .
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya.

src_text: Indima Ngokudlulela Ehlelweni Lokurhatjha Budijithali (i-BDM) .
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya 2022 Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithole umbiko ngendima esele yenziwe ngeHlelo le-BDM, yayibona indima esele yenziwe ngokufakelwa kwama-Set-Top Box njengengcenye yokufuduka ehlelweni lokurhatjha nge-analogu kuyiwe ehlelweni lokurhatjha budijithali.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka dikarolo tse ngotsweng botjha ke ho lekolabotjha Molao wa Boetapele ba Setso le ba MaKhoi-San wa 2019  (Molao wa 3 wa 2019) keneng tshebetsong ka la 01 Mmesa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuyelele yagandelela ukurhabeka kokuqedelelwa kwe-BDM kobanyana kuzokuvuleka ikundla yokurhatjha efunekako ebanzi, ekhambisekako nekhambisa amaza wokurhatjha ngebelo elikhulu, kunye nethekhnoloji yelwazi nezokuthintana.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang, Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezokuThintana nezeTheknoloji yeDijithali u-Khumbudzo Ntshavheni uzokubamba umhlangano weendaba kusasa (ngeLesihlanu, 24 kuMgwengweni) lapho azakunaba khona ngemininingwana.
tgt_text: Ha se amohetswe, Bili tla fetola Molao wa jwale wa Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo Kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang wa 2004 (Molao wa 33 wa 2004).
Bili ena fetile motjheng matla wa dipuisano le setjhaba kamora hore tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Motsheanong.

src_text: Umbiko WaQobemnyaka NgobuJamo BamaLungelo WabaNtwana EliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka diphetoho ke ho tjhorisa metjha ya kwano ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi le ya lefatshe teng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukumenyezelwa komBiko waQobemnyaka wobuJamo bamaLungelo wabaNtwana ongowehlandla lesibili.
tgt_text: Diphetoho di boetse tsa lokisa dikarolwana tseo ho neng hothwe ha di ikamahanye le molaotheo ke Lekgotla la Molaotheo..  Jwaloka setho sa Lekgotla la Tshireletseho la Matjhaba Kopaneng, Afrika Borwa tlameha ho sebedisa melao ya matjhaba naheng ena leng melao eo sepheo ka yona leng ho matlafatsa mehato ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi lefatsheng  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphethe zamva nje ngokuphunyeleliswa kweHlelo lemiSebenzi eyenzelwa abaNtwana esikhathini see-2019-.
tgt_text: Seboka sa bo-14 sa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).

Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla etella pele Afrika Borwa Sebokeng sa mokgwa wa vidiyo sa bo-14 sa Baetapele ba dinaha tsa BRICS se tla tshwarwa ke People’s Republic of China ho tloha ka Labone la la 23 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.

src_text: Umbiko lo uphakamisa ipumelelo eyenzeke ngesikhathi see-2020-.
Ubuya godu uveza neendawo ezisafuna itjhejo, ekubalwa hlangana nazo nokuphepha kwabantwana kunye nokutjhiyana ngendima okusolo kuthuwelele kuya phambili hlangana kwabanothileko nabanganalitho.
tgt_text: Botho ba rona ba BRICS bo tswela pele ho tswela naha molemo.

src_text: Umbiko lo godu uveza nokuthi isifo esikhe sarhagala kokapha, i-COVID-19, sibacaphazele njani abantwana ngalesisikhathi.
tgt_text: Ngwahola thepa ya Afrika Borwa rometsweng dinaheng tse ding ballwang dipersenteng tse fetang tse 17 ile dinaheng tsa BRICS, mme dipersente tse fetang tse 29 tsa thepa tlileng kwano di ne di tswa dinaheng tseo.
Boleng ba kgwebisano ena ntse bo ntse bo hola, mme kgwebisano yohle ya Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding tsa BRICS ka 2021 ballwa dibiliyoneng tse R702, ha ka 2017 ne ballwa dibiliyoneng tse  .

src_text: Amagadango athathwa ngurhulumende anqophe ukuphumelelisa amalungelo wabantwana, njengoba kusitjho umThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Tshebedisano hara dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa BRICS makaleng kang bophelo bo botle le kgwebisano ntlafetseng hodisitse diindasteri tsa naha ena, mme tswetse ditho tsohle tsa BRICS molemo.

src_text: Asekela neembopho zelizwe lekhethu eemVumelwaneni ze-UN ngamaLungelo wabaNtwana (i-UNCRC) nomTlolo we-Afrika ngamaLungelo neHlalakuhle yomNtwana (i-ACRWC).
tgt_text: Sepheo ka botsetedi ba rona diprojekeng tsa ntshetsopele ya meralo ya ditshebeletso le maiteko ho potlakisa metjha ya kgwebo ke ho eketsa thepa romelwang ho balekane ba rona ba BRICS..  Sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo.

src_text: ISewula Afrika yayitlikitlela yomibili imitlolo yeemvumelwano i-UNCRC ne-ACRWC.
tgt_text: Sekolo sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG) se tla tshwara Lenaneo la sona la boraro la sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo bakeng sa Bahlanka ba Phethahatso, Johannesburg ho tloha ho la 27 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 1 Phupu.
Sebokeng ho tla tla Matona tswang Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan le Afrika Borwa; le Balaodi-Kakaretso ba Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana neminyango karhulumende nabanye ababelani abafaneleko abambadlwana belizweloke neemfundeni ngeemfunda.
tgt_text: Boramotse ba Afrika Borwa, mmoho le ditho tsa dikomiti tsa boramotse le makgotla phethahatso ba tla ba teng le bona..  Ho lebelletswe hore bahlanka bana ba phethahatso ba tswang dinaheng tse fapaneng ba abelane dikgopolo le dithuto ka maemo fapaneng ao ba kopanang le ona mosebetsing wa bona wa letsatsi le letsatsi..  NSG radile lenaneo la selemo le selemo bakeng sa ditho tsa phethahatso ka 2020 le karolo ya tshehetso ya yona boinehelong ba mmuso ba ho aha naha nang le bokgoni.

src_text: Umbiko opheleleko uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezokuThuthukiswa komPhakathi, ku-www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka sekolo sena hara tse ding ke ho hlomella bahlanka ba phethahatso makaleng mararo mmuso ka boetapele bo ntlafetseng le bokgoni ba ho hlokomela le hore ba kgone ho lekola botjha diphephetso tsa tsamaiso tse sitisang ho kenyeletswa ha bohle le kgolo ya ho ya ho ile ya moruo..  Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela.
Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela le ka Mantaha, 18 Phupu 2022, mme le tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Etsa seo se kgonang, ka seo nang le sona, moo leng teng”.

src_text: Umbiko WeSewula Afrika Ohlanganisiweko Wesithathu Ukuyokufika Kowesithandathu  Onande Uthunyelwa I-UNCRC              .
tgt_text: Ke boipiletso bo matla bathong hore ba tshehetse le ho ba le seabo letsholong lena ka maiteko moshwelella nang le thuso ya nako telele..  Bo bong ba maiteko ao moshwelella ke Dipuisano tsa selemo le selemo tsa Batjha tsa ho tlotla Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bo Kgabane bo tsepameng dintlheng tseo ho buuwang ka tsona haholo tse amanang le batjha Afrika Borwa le lefatsheng ka bophara..  Nako ya Lekgetho.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa komBiko wesithathu ukuyokufika kowesithandathu onande wethulelwa i-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Sehla sa 2022 sa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho se qala ka la 1 Phupu ho ya ho la 24 Mphalane.

src_text: Lombiko ulandela wesibili umBiko oNande uthunyelwa i-UNCRC, owagcina ukwethulwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Balefi ba lekgetho ba kgothaletswa ho kenya ditokomane tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka mokgwa wa eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kapa ho MobiApp ya Tshebeletso ya Pokello ya Lekgetho ya Afrika Borwa (SARS)..  Monongwaha SARS tla nne sebedise tlhahisoleseding eo e bokellang ya motho ka mong, ho etsa tlaleho ya motho nang le dintlha tsohle tsa hae tsa ditjhelete, ho thusa ho bebofatsa motjha wa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho.
Ka 2021 SARS bokelletse tlhahisoleseding ya balefi ba lekgetho ba dimiliyone tse fetang tse tharo.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokweNdinyana 44 ye-UNCRC, begodu umumethe nokwatjhejwako nokwaphakanyiswako embikweni wokugcina.
tgt_text: Ho kenngwa ha ditokomane ka nako le ka nepo ho netefatsa hore batho ba ikamahanye le melao ya lekgetho, le ho thusa mmuso ho isa ditshebeletso ho Maafrika Borwa di hlokang haholo  Melaetsa.

src_text: I-UNCRC ithumele ekutjhejileko nekuphakamisileko ngelizwe leSewula Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: DithoholetsoKabinete thoholeditse le ho lebisa ditakaletso tse ntle ho bana: • Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers kamora hore kgethelwe ho ba moahlodi wa Lekgotla la Molaotheo la Afrika Borwa.
• Kabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lakaleditse Mopresidente wa Mehleng Thabo Mbeki mahlohonolo Letsatsi la Tswalo ha qeta dilemo tse 80, leo le ketekileng ka la 18 Phuptjane.

src_text: Umbiko lo uhlanganiswe ngokubonisana nayo yoke iminyango nababelani abafaneleko elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Monghadi Mbeki lakaleditse Maafrika Borwa ohle bokamoso bo tjhabileng le bo nang le katleho  KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.

src_text: Umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa ungethulwa ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Balaodi ba Ikemetseng ba Boto ya Boladi ya Bofofisi Afrika Borwa  Monghadi Ernest Khosa  Mme Bulelwa Koyana  Monghadi Surendra Sooklal; led.
Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.

src_text: Umbiko Welizwe Ngokuphunyeleliswa Kwe-Ajenda Etja Yemadrobheni   .
tgt_text: Ditho tsa Ofisi ya Diphatlalatso tsa Dilounu tsa ho reka Matlo le Phatlalatso ya Dikoloto tsa Matlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Monghadi Errol Vincent Magerman  Moadvokheiti Mandla Dludlu  Monghadi Matsobane Gabriel Mello  Mme Palesa Mawasha  Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton  Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga  Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.

src_text: Zamvanje Ngesifo Sengogwana I-corona (i-COVID-19)   .
tgt_text: Tsa Moraorao Mabapi le Kokwanahloko ya Khorona (COVID-19).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke boke abantu eSewula Afrika abakhethe ukuhlaba nokuthobela yoke imilayelo ye-COVID-19, okubangele ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libalekele ukukhutjhukelwa linani labantu abangenwa sisifesi nasehla kwehlandla lesihlanu.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ba ileng ba kgetha ho enta le ho ikobela dipehelo tsohle tse mabapi le COVID-19 leng se entseng hore lenane la batho ba tshwaetsehang le se ke la phahama haholo leqhubung la bohlano la sewa sena naheng ena..     Leha ho le jwalo, re ntse re tlameha ho ba hlokolosi jwalo ka ha COVID-19 ntse so fele.
Leha mmuso sa tswa phumula molao qobellang batho ho apara dimonkwana setjhabeng, empa batho ba nang le mafu sa phekoleheng, le ba kulang, ba ntse ba tlameha ho tswela pele le ho di apara.

src_text: Nanyana kunjalo, kodwana nokho akukafaneli sizigedle ngoba i-COVID-19 isesekhona.
tgt_text: Re ntse re tlameha ho tswela pele le ho hlapa matsoho rona kgafetsa kapa ho hlwekisa ka sebolaya dikokwanahloko, ho iqaqolohanya le ba bang mmoho le ho ba sebakeng se kenang moya hantle..     Ente ntse le yona feela mokgwa nang le bopaki ba saense ba hore thibela COVID-19, mme Kabinete kgothaletsa batho bohle ba so kang ba enta ho etsa jwalo ka potlako le ba entileng ho fumana ente ya tlatsetso mahala ditsing tse haufi tsa ho entela..     Monkeypox.

src_text: Nanyana ilizwe lekhethu mhlapha libulele umlayelo okatelela abantu ukuthi bembathe imaski nabahlangana nabantu, kodwana abantu abanezinye izifo abaphila nazo nalabo abagulako bakhuthazwa ukuthi bahlale bawembethe amamaski nabahlangana nabantu.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya behwa sehlohlolong sa ditaba tsa moraorao mabapi le Monkeypox le ho tshwaetsa ha yona naheng ena ho latela ho fumaneha ha motho wa bobedi ya nang le bohloko bona naheng ena.

src_text: Ukudlula lapho, kusamele bona sisolo sihlala ngokunande sihlamba izandla namkha sizihlikihle ngesihlanzekisi, sihlale siqalangene, besihlale siseendaweni ezibetha ummoya ngokwaneleko.
tgt_text: Bakudi bana ka bobedi ba ipolokile ka bonngwe malapeng mme ho ntse ho tsongwa batho bao ba kileng ba kopana le bona, bao ho ka etsahalang hore ba bile kotsing ya ho tshwaetseha..     Ka bobedi Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Mahloko Tshwaetsanang, ba sebedisana mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle ho hlahloba kotsi ya tshwaetsano bohlokong bona naheng ena ba ipapisitse le dipehelo tsa Matjhaba tsa Bophelo bo Botle..     Kokwanahloko ya monkeypox ha tshwaetsane ha bonolo ntle le ha thetsane le motho ya nang le yona jwalo ka ho sunana, ho mo sika kapa ho thetsa dikarolo tsa mmele tse nang le yona.

Batho ba se nang matshwao kokwanahloko ena ba ke ke ba tshwetsa ba bang..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba bang le matshwao feberu mokgohlane tlwaelehileng tsamaisanang le matjhatjhetsi kang lekgopho hore ba etele ditsi tsa bophelo bo botle ho ka fumana ho hlahlojwa le ho alafuwa sa le nako..     Koduwa ya Tameneng ya East London.

src_text: Ukuhlaba solo kuyindlela yesayensi ehle khulu yokuzivikela esifeni se-COVID-19, ngalokho-ke neKhabinethi nayo ikhuthaza boke abantu abangakahlabi ukuthi bahlabe khona nje, bangasariyada ukuya phambili, ikhuthaza nabantu abahlabileko ukuthi bayokuhlaba umjovo wokuqinisa amasotja womzimba eendaweni zokuhlaba eziseduze nabo, simahla.
tgt_text: Koduwa hlahileng Tameneng ya Enyobeni, East London mane Kapa Botjhabela, ka la 26 Phuptjane 2022, eo ho yona ho ileng ha hlokahala batjha ba 21 ile ya tshosa naha ka bophara.

Re ipotsa hore be malapa bona ikutlwa jwang ka ho lahlehelwa ke bana ba ona koduweng kang eo..     Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona mmoho le ho leboha bohle ba ileng ba bontsha moya wa botho ka ho tshehetsa malapa ao nakong eo ya tlokotsi..     Ke ntho ngongorehisang hore bana ba dilemong tsa bo 13 ba dumellwe ho kena dibakeng tseo ho nowang jwala ho tsona.

src_text: Ipokisi Yeemfene.
tgt_text: Re ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore le sona se nke karolo ho netefatsa hore bana ba rona ba bolokehile ka dinako tsohle..     Bana ba dilemo tse ka tlase ho tse 18 ha ba dumellwa ho kena ditameneng, dishibining, dibakeng tseo ho nwellwang ho tsona le tse rekisang jwala.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngezamvanje zokurhatjheka kwesifo sePokisi yeemFene elizweni lekhethweli, ngemva kobana sekuqinisekiswe ukuthi sebabili abantu ababanjwe yipokisi yeemfene ekhethwapha.
tgt_text: Ke tlolo ya molao ho batho bohle ba hwebang ka jwala ho se ikobele melao ena, mme hape ba tlameha le ho amohuwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa ho rekisa jwala..     Sephetho sa Kopano ya Baetapele ba Dinaha tse Supileng (G7).

src_text: Lababantu esele kuqinisekiswe ukuthi babanjwe yipokisi yeemfene bakhethelwe ngahlanye emakhaya lapho bahlala khona, kanti-ke sekuthonyiwe ukulandelela abantu ekungenzeka ukuthi bakhe baba seduze nalaba abangenwe sisifesi, kobanyana bazokuhlolwa ukuthi abakatheleleki na.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ile nka karolo Kopanong ya Baetapele ba G7 neng tshwaretswe Bavaria, Jeremane, ka Mantaha wa la 27 Phuptjane.
Mopresidente ne menngwe kopanong ena ke Moetapele wa naha eo ho neng ho tshwaretswe kopano ena ho yona leng Motjhanselara Olaf Scholz.

src_text: UmNyango wezePilo neZiko leziFo eziThelelanako (i-NICD) usebenzisana neHlangano yezePilo yePhasi ukuhlola ubungozi bokuthelelana ngesifesi ekhethwapha, ngokukhambisana nemiThetjhwanalawulo yezePilo yamaZwengamazwe.
tgt_text: Kopanong ena, ho ne ho sekasekwa ditaba tse amang maemo lehodimo, motlakase, tsa bophelo bo botle, tlhahiso ya dijo boemong ba matjhaba le tekatekano ya bonng..     G7 ke tshebedisano ya mebuso le diforamo tsa dipolotiki dinaheng tse kang Khanada, Fora, Jeremane, Ithali, Japane, United Kingdom le Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Amerika     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
Moralo wa Tshebetso wa Lekala la tsa Molao (LSC).

src_text: Ingogwana yepokisi yeemfene ayirhatjheki lula, begodu ivamise ukudlulela komunye umuntu ngemva kokutjhidelana nomunye umuntu, njengalokhuya abantu nabamanganako, nabanganako/nabagonanako nofana nabathinta izitho zomzimba ezineenlonda namkha ezinamanceba wepokisi yeemfene.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa LSC bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Abantu abanganamatshayo wepokisi yeemfene angeze badlulisela ingogwana yesifesi kabanye abantu.
tgt_text: Maikemisetso dipehelo tsena ke ho potlakisetsa ho etswa ha diphetolo lekaleng lena ho etsa hore kemedi ho lona be nepahetseng ho ya ka maemo setjhaba ka ho fapana.

Dipehelo tsena di tla thusa ho theha mokgatlo tla netefatsa hore lekala lena le ba le batho ba rupeletsweng ka botlalo ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa molao..     Ho ngolwa ha moralo ona wa LSC ho ne ho okametswe ke Mokgatlo wa Basebeletsi ba Molao leng mokgatlo thehilweng ho latela Karolo ya 4 ya molao wa Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) ka tlasa tataiso ya Leano la molao wa Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (B-BBEE) wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: IKhabinethi ilemukise abantu abanamatshayo wefiva, womgomani ojayelekileko, nabanamathuthuva anamanzi ukuthi baye emaziko wezepilo aseduze nabo kobanyana bayokuthola isizo lokuhlolwa nokwelatjhwa kusese nesikhathi.
tgt_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 neha Letona la Dikgwebo le Ditlhodisano matla ho etsa dipehelo mabapi le tshebetso nepahetseng ho tsa tshehetso ya ba batsho moruong makaleng itseng.

Ha jwale, ba ditshebeletso tsa molao ha ba na dipehelo tseo ba sebeletsang hodima tsona ho tobana le mathata ho se lekalekane lekaleng lena la tsa molao..     Moralo ona wa LSC tla phatlalatswa Bukeng ya Diphatlalatso tsa Mmuso matsatsi 60 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka ona..     Tlaleho ya Tshebetso ya Habedi ka Selemo.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo Eyehle Ethaveni YeMonti.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho ya tshebetso tswang habedi ka selemo ya ho tloha ka Mphalane 2021 ho isa ho Tlhakubele.

src_text: Ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeke Enyobeni Tavern eseMonti ePumalanga Kapa ngoSondo nakama-26 kuMgwengweni wee-2022 kwabhubhela kiyo abantu abatjha abama-21, ilethuse loke ilizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Ditlaleho tsena ke karolo ya Leano la Meralo ya Nako ya Bohareng (MTSF) ho tloha ka selemo sa 2019 ho isa ho sa.

src_text: Kubudisi ukulinga ukucabanga isizi abakilo bemakhabo labantwana ababhubhe ngesihluku esingaka.
tgt_text: Leano lena la MTSF 2019-2024, ke moralo wa tshebetso oo ka ona ho boetseng ho ikemiseditsweng ho fihlela Leano la Naha la Ntshetsopele: Leano la Tjhebelo pele la selemo sa 2030 tla beng le nako ya puso ya botshelela..     Ditlaleho tsena di shebile haholo maikemisetso ao mmuso a behileng pele leng (1) Diphetoho moruong le thehong ya menyetla ya mesebetsi; (2) Tsa thuto, thupello, le tsa bophelo bo botle; (3) Leano la tshehetso ya setjhaba ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa boleng ka tsela otlolohileng; (4) Tsa bodulo ba setjhaba le tsa bommasepala; (5) Tshebedisano ya setjhaba mmoho le polokeho ya sona; (6) Theho ya mmuso nang le bokgoni le puso nang le toka; le (7) Ho theha maemo betere Afrika le matjhabeng mmoho le ho kenella ha puso ya botshelela..     Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele dikarolong tse neng di hlwahilwe nakong ena ya ho lekola botjha.
Kabinete boetse elelletswe le dikarolo tseo ho sa ntsa neng ho hlokahala ho kenellwa ho tsona ka lebaka la tieho bileng teng ka lebaka la sewa sa COVID-.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibalilele imbiko bemakhabo labantwana abasitjhiyileko, yathokoza woke umuntu ngesekelo lakhe lobuntu ngokusekela imindeni ehluphekileko ngalesisikhathi sobudisi.

tgt_text: Matona tla tshwara diboka tsa boraditaba dibekeng tse mmalwa tse tlang ho hlalosa ha batsi ka ditlaleho tsa ona le ho hlalosa dikarolong tseo ho hlokahalang hore ho sebetswe ka thatanyana ho tsona     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: Kuzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi abantwana abancani beminyaka eli-13 kwaphela bavunyelwe ukungena endaweni yokusela bayokusela utjwala.
tgt_text: Seboka sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho le Barekisi Dinaheng tsa Matjhaba (BIEC).

src_text: Sikhombela woke umphakathi ukuthi ulime indimawo ngokugcina abantwabethu baphephile soke isikhathi.
tgt_text: Seboka sa pele sa BIEC se tla tshwarelwa Sandton International Convention Centre, Lejweleputswa ka Laboraro la la 20 Phupu.

src_text: Abantwana abangaphasi kweminyaka eli-18 abakavunyelwa ukungena emathaveni, esipotini, eendaweni zokuditjha ngotjwala kunye neentolo ezithengisa utjwala.
tgt_text: Seboka sena se tla ka mora tlhomamiso ya Marangrang Thekiso Matjhabeng ke mmuso bakeng sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho ka maikemisetso ho ba thusa ho kena mmarakeng meng, le ho fumana ditsela tsa ho fumana ditshehetso tsa ditjhelete le mekgwa ya ho bapatsa     Melaetsa.

src_text: Abathengisi botjwala abazakutholakala bephula imithetho le kufuze babotjhelwe ukwenza ubulelesi, bemukwe namalayisensabo wokuthengisa nokusebenza ngotjwala.
tgt_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Sehlopha sa Springboks, ka tlholo ya sona papading ya sona le naha ya Wales papading ya sona ya pele ya tse tharo tsa diteko Lebaleng la Loftus Versveld, Tshwane, ka Moqebelo wa la 2 Phupu.

Banyana Banyana, ka tlholo ya bona ya 2-1 ka Montaha wa la 4 Phupu 2022 kgahlano le naha ya Nigeria papading ya bona ya pele Tonamenteng ya Basadi ya Dinaha tsa Afrika tshwaretsweng naheng ya Morokho     Khiro    Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.

src_text: Umphumela Womhlangano Weenkhulu Wabarholi Besiqhema Samazwe We-G.      UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ube yingcenye yomHlangano weenKhulu wabaRholi be-G7 ebewubanjelwe e-Bavaria, eJarimani ngoMvulo nakama-27 kuMgwengweni wee-.
tgt_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana kgethetswe ho ba Modulasetulo wa Komeshene ya Naha ya Diloto..     Moatevokate Rory Voller kgethetswe ho ba Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Ngodiso ya Dikhamphani le Dihlahiswa tsa Mahlale.

src_text: Zegezi.
tgt_text: Motlase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele amagadango wokungena hlangana kombuso ekurarululeni umraro omkhulukazi wokutlhayela kwegezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho kenella ha mmuso mathateng motlakase naheng ena.

src_text: Amagadango angeneleleko la avula indlela yokwehlisa izinga lokucinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga, kutjhugululwe indlela yokusebenza kilomkhakha wegezi khona kuzakufikelelwa ubujamo bokufumaneka kwegezi ngendlela enzinzileko.Ukusekela isiphehligezi nokusiza ilizwe lekhethu ekufunyaneni igezi kabudisi, sidinga ukunciphisa izinga lokusetjenziswa kwegezi okuzii-6000 zamamegawathi eenyangeni ezintathu ezizako..  Izakhamuzi zingafaka isandla ekongeni igezi ngokuhlala bacima amalampa angasetjenziswako neesetjenziswa ezisebenzisa igezi enengi ngeenkhathi lapho igezi isetjenziswa khulu khona.
tgt_text: Mehato ena betla tsela yang boitekong ba ho fedisa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa, ho fetolwa ha lekala la motlakase le ho ba le tharollo ya nako telele tabeng ya motlakase..   Ho kenya letsoho ho fokotseng mathata phepelo ya motlakase naheng ena, re tlameha ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona ka megawatts tse 600 naheng ka bophara dikgweding tsena tse tharo tse tlang..   Malapa le ona ka nka karolo ho fokotseng hona ha tshebediso ya motlakase ka ho tima mabone sa hlokahaleng le disebediswa tse jang motlakase haholo nakong ya tshebediso phahameng ya motlakase.

src_text: Amabhizinisi ayakhuthazwa ukwamukela ithekhnoloji eyonga igezi nawo azibandakanye ekuphumeleliseni amano wokwehlisa isidingo esiphezulu segezi..  I-Operation Vulindlela  .
tgt_text: Dikgwebo le tsona tlhahisong ya tsona di kgothaletswa ho sebedisa thekenoloji ya sejwale jwale ho leka ho fokotsa tshebediso matla ya motlakase..   Letsholo la Vulindlela.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele iragelophambili eyenziweko ngaphasi kwejima le-Operation Vulindlela ukususa iinqabo emikhakheni yezamandla, umthangalasisekelo wezokuthintana nemikhakha yezamanzi nezevakatjhobukela ngomnqopho wokuvuselela umnotho.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele seng fihletswe tlasa Letsholo la Vulindlela ho leka ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano neng le teng lekaleng la motlakase, la tsa kgokahano, la metsi ha mmoho le la bohahlaudi ka maikemisetso ho aha moruo botjha..   Ho se ho tsoseleditswe botjha meralo ya motheo robong ho 26 mme 11 le yona bontsha kgatelopele.

src_text: Sele kufikelelwe ngepumelelo ematjhugulukweni alithoba kama-26, kanti ali-11 wawo amatjhuguluko la akhamba kuhle.
tgt_text: Hara dikatleho tse seng di fihletswe re ka bala le ho nyollwa ha tekanyetso ya tlhahiso ya motlakase ke bahlahisi ba ikemetseng, ntlafatso ya Taolo ya Naha ya Boemakepe ba ha Transnet, ho lekolwa botjha ha letoto la mesebetsi bohlokwahadi, ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa inthanete wa ho kenya kopo tsa Visa dinaheng tse 14, ho kenyeletsa le dibaka tse ntjha tse kgolo tsa bohahlaudi tse kang Tjhaena, Indiya, Kenya le Nigeria..   Ditlhekefetso tsa Bonng le ho Bolawa ha Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: Ipumelelo ifaka hlangana ukukhuliswa komthamo wokunikelwa kwamalayisensi wokusatjalalaliswa kweensetjenziswa zegezi, ukwakhiwa kabutjha kweBandla le-Transnet leenTetjhi zemiKhumbi leliZweloke, ukutjhatjhululwa kwerhelo lamakgonofundwa aqakathekileko nokusetjenziswa kwehlelo le-e-Visa emazweni ali-14’ kufaka hlangana amazwe amakhulu amatjha kezevakatjhobukelo anjenge-China, i-India, i-Kenya ne-Nigeria..  INturhu Eqothele Bobulili Obuthileko Nokubulawa Kwabasikazi (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete halefisitswe ke ketso soto ya ho betwa ha basadi ba robedi mane Krugersdorp, Gauteng.

src_text: Ikhabinethi iveze ukusilingeka kwayo ngesehlakalo samhlapha sokugagadlhelwa kwabantu bengubo ababunane e-Krugersdorp, e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Ketso tsena tse sehloho ha mmoho le ho hlekefetswa ha basadi di kgella fatshe mosebetsi wa setjhaba.

src_text: Izenzwezi zelunya nokuhlukunyezwa kwabomma ziqalela phasi ifundiso yethu yokuziphatha emphakathini.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse thoholetsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa ka ho potlaka ho tshwara babelaellwa diketsong tsena tsa bonokwane..   Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sebedisana le mekgatlo qobellang molao ka ho fana ka lesedi kapa hona ho tlaleha diketso tse belaetsang.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibuke godu iButho lamaPholisa weSewula Afrika ngokubopha msinyana abasolwa abathinteka ezenzwezi zelunyezi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele imiphakathi ukusebenzisana nabathobelisimthetho ngokuthi babelane ngelwazi elidingekako ukubika izenzo ezisolisako.
tgt_text: Ha re sebedisana re ka fetola setjhaba sa rona ho ba dibaka tse bolokehileng bakeng sa bana le basadi..   Moafrika Borwa mong le mong na le boikarabelo ba ho lwantsha diketso tsa dikgoka ka tsela tse molaong ka tlaleha diketso tsohle tsa GBVF sepoleseng se haufi kapa letsetse Nomoro ya Mahala ya ho Tlaleha Ditlolo tsa Molao: 08600 10111, kapa ya Naha ya ho Tlaleha Diketso tsa GBVF: 0800 428 428 kapa ya ho Tlaleha Diketso Tlhekefetso ya Bonng: 0800 150. .

src_text: Ngokubambisana, singenzela abomma nabentwana imiphakathi ephephileko..  Woke amaSewula Afrika anesibopho sokuphikisana nezenzo zabaphehlinturhu ngokulandela umthetho.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src_text: Bika ngezehlakalo ze-GBVF esitetjhini samapholisa sangekhenu namkha udosele inomboro yokuBika ngobuLelesi yasimahla ku-0860 01 0111, iSentha eLwisana nobuLelesi be-GBVF ku-0800 428 428 namkha udosele umTato weSizo ngokuPhelisa iNturhu ku-0800 150. .
tgt_text: Kgwedi ena ya Basadi Ketekwa selemo le selemo ho hlompha basadi bohle ba ileng ba lwanela tokoloho ya naha ena le basadi bohle setjhabeng sa rona..   Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Basadi ketekilwe tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Tshehetso le Ditokelo tsa Basadi Moruong le Setjhabeng: Kaho Botjha bakeng sa Ntlafatso le Matlafalo ya Basadi.”.

src_text: INyanga yaboMma.
tgt_text: Basadi ba fetang 20 000 ba ileng ba hwantela Union Buildings, Tshwane ka la 9 Phato 1956, ba ne ba netefatse hore tekatekano ya bonng ba ya bohlokwa ho demokrasi ya Afrika Borwa..   Sebete sa bona se ile sa kgothatsa basadi ka kakaretso ho bapala karolo ya bona Palamenteng, mmusong le setjhabeng, mme re tswelapele le moralo ona ho tloha re fumane tokoloho ka.

src_text: NgeNyanga yaboMma egidingwa qobe mnyaka ngoRhoboyi kuhlonitjhwa abomma abazibandakanya emzabalazweni wetjhaphuluko nabo boke abomma abenza umehluko emiphakathini yekhethu..  INyanga yaboMma yanonyaka igidingwa ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “AmaLungelo waboMma wezeHlalakuhle newezomNotho nokubaThuthukisa: Ukwakhela aboMma kabuTjha nokuQinisa Ukusimelela Kwabo” – Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..  Bangaphezu kwee-20 000 abomma abamatjhela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhlana ali-9 kuRhoboyi we-1956 bafaka isandla ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukulingana ngokobulili nokunikelwa kwaboMma amandla kezomnotho kuhlala kuliqalontangi eSewula Afrika ebuswa ngokwentando yenengi.
Izenzo zabo zesibindi zakhuthaza abomma ukuthatha isikhundla sabo epalamende, kurhulumende neenhlanganweni zomphakathi begodu sakhela kilepumelelo selokhu safumana itjhaphuluko ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Sehopotso sa Marikana.

src_text: Isikhumbuzo Sebangamatlhuwo ye-Marikana.
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi la la 16 Phato 2022, mmuso le setjhaba ba ile ba kopana mmoho ho hopola koduwa neng etsahale Marikana, Leboya Bophirima ka.

src_text: NgeLesibili, mhlana ali-16 kuRhoboyi wee-2022, urhulumende wahlanganyela nelizwe loke ekukhumbuleni ibangamatlhuwo eyenzeka e-Marikana eseTlhagwini Tjingalanga ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Bohloko ba basebetsi bao, ba malapa bona esitana le setjhaba ka kakaretso bo tla dula bo hopoleha nalaneng ya rona..   Ho thehilwe Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Marikana ho tlisa maemo tla dumella ho ntlafatswa ha maphelo setjhaba sa Marikana.

src_text: Ubuhlungu babasebenzi, imindenabo nesitjhaba soke buzakuhlala buyingcenye yomlando welizwe lekhethu..  Ihlelo lokuVuselela i-Marikana sele lihlonyiwe ukwakha kabutjha nokwenza ubujamo obamukelekako ukuthuthukisa ihlalakuhle yomphakathi we-Marikana.
tgt_text: Ngwahola mmuso lefile tjhelete ya ditlhapiso kalo ka dimilione tse R176 ho malapa mahlatsipa mme nyewe ntseng tswelapele lekgotleng la dinyelwe yona tlameha ho fela pele ho mafelo Phato.

src_text: Ngomnyaka ophelileko urhulumende walilisa imindeni yabongazimbi ngemali eziingidi ezili-R176 begodu imilandu esaleleko esatjhutjhiswako kulindeleke bona iqedelelwe ekupheleni kwakaRhoboyi wee-.

tgt_text: Ho na le matlo ntlafaditsweng le ahilweng botjha bakeng sa bahlolohadi ba marikana mme tse ding di tla qetelwa selemong sena.

src_text: Isibalo esithileko seenkumba ezivuselelweko namkha eziqeda ukuthengwa zinikelwe abahlolokazi be-Marikana kanti ezinye zizokuphela ukwakhiwa nonyaka.
tgt_text: Ho na le projeke ya kaho ya matlo ya dimilione tse R700 tla etsa hore basebetsi ba merafong ba dule matlong maemong matle.

src_text: Iphrojekthi yokwakha izindlu ebiza iingidi ezima-R700 izokwenza abasebenzi beemayini banikelwa iinkumba ezithe tjha.
tgt_text: Ho teng mehato seng nkilwe ho ntlafatsa maphelo batho ba sebetsang merafong.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo oqakathekileko wezehlalakuhle uyanikelwa ukuthuthukisa ubujamo bokuhlala kwemiphakathi eyakhele iimayini..  Imbizo kaMengameli Emayelana neHlelo lokuThuthukisa Iiyingi (i-DDM) e-Gauteng.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Mopresidente ya Gauteng ya Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM).

src_text: Ngemva kokubanjwa ngepumelelo kweeMbizo zikaMengameli ezethula i-DDM amahlandla amathathu eTlhagwini Tjingalanga, eFreyistata neMpumalanga ngokulandelana, uMasipala wesiYingi se-Sedibeng ubambe Imbizo yesine NgeLesihlanu, nakali-12 kuRhoboyi wee-..  Ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ungatjhiyi Namunye Ngemva”, UMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa wadosa phambili isiqhema sabajameli abaziimphathimandla zikarhulumende welizwe, beemfunda nebeendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Ka Labohlano la la 12 Phato 2022, Masepala wa Setereke wa Sedibeng mane Gauteng ne tshwere Imbizo ya bone neng eteletswe ke tse tharo tse neng di tshwaretse Leboya Bophirima, Foreisitata le Mpumalanga..   Tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Ho se be le ya salang”, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele kemedi ho tswa mmusong wa naha, wa profensi esitana le wa bommasepala.

src_text: AmaSewula Afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwamakoro wawo akhuthazwa ukubambisana ekulwisaneni namazinga akhulako womtlhago nokudobha phasi ukungabi nobuyo okubangelwa bujamo bezomnotho obubudisi..  IsiYingi se-Sedibeng sesibe neragelo phambili ekusebenziseni ngokomthetho iinZinda zomNotho eziKhethekileko (ama-SEZ) zomlambo i-Vaal, ekungizo ezinekghono lokuvuselela amabubulo werijini, isifunda newelizwe.
tgt_text: Ho ile ha etswa kgoeletso ho Maafrika Borwa ka ho fapana hore tshwarane ho lwantshana le bofuma hammoho le masisapelo bakwang ke maemo mabe moruo..   Setereke sa Sedibeng se se se hatetse pele Lenaneo la Ntlafatso ya Moruo la Noka ya Lekwa (SEZ) le nang le kgonahalo ya tsoseletso ya moruo wa sedika seo, profensi eo esitana le naha ka bophara.

src_text: I-SEZ yomLambo i-Vaal ihlala ikukwamukela imikhakha eqakathekileko elandelako: IDrobha eHle (i-Vaal River Smart City); isiKhungo esiTjheja iKghono leBhoduluko; isikhungo semikhiqizo yebange; iinsetjenziswa zezokulima; idrobha emagega nedoyelo leemphaphamtjhini; isiqetjhana sokudoya kwaboflayi abancani; imithwalo ekhamba ngesiphaphamtjhini nomkhakha ovuselelweko wesimbi.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena la Noka ya Lekwa le ikemiseditse ho kenyeletsa makala latelang bohlokwa: Sitsi se Setjha sa Thekenoloji sa Noka ya Lekwa; Thekenoloji ya Tlhahiso ya Motlakase wa Metsi; thekiso ya dihlahiswa tsa matekwane; tsamaiso ya dihlahiswa tsa tsa temo; kaho ya boemafofane ba difofane tse kgolo le tse nyane; tsamaiso ya thepa ka difofane le ntlafatso ya tlhahiso ya tshepe..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba.

Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Lekala la Setjhaba se ne se tshwaretswe Ekurhuleni mane Gauteng ka la 4 le la 5 Phato 2022 mme lepetjo la teng le ne le re “Tshehetso ya Tshebedisano ya Setjhaba ho Thusa Setjhaba ho Nka Karolo Moruong le Tabeng tsa Setjhaba.” Seboka sena se ile sa kopanya batho ho tswa makaleng fapaneng ho tla sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ho tobana le mathata setjhaba ha mmoho le moruo, esitana le ho sebedisa dihlahiswa tsohle tse teng molemong wa setjhaba..   Seboka sena se nkilwe le seboka sa ditlaleho ho tswa diprofensing kaofela mathateng ao di nang le ona ho kenyeletsa tshehetso ya ditjhelete, mathata mabapi le taolo, ntlafatso ya lekala lena la setjhaba ka maikemisetso ho sebedisana le setjhaba ho ka rarolla mathata kang bofuma, ho se lekalekane ha mmoho le leqeme la mesebetsi..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho mekgatlo ya setjhaba ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho aha bokamoso bo betere ho latela Morero wa Ntshetsopele ya Naha: la Tjhebelopele ya   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: UmButhano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.

src_text: Umbuthano kaMengameli womKhakha wezeHlalakuhle owabanjelwa Ekurhuleni, e-Gauteng ukusuka  nakama-4 ukuya nakama-5 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukubuyisana ngokuPhumelelisa ukuzibandakanya kwemiPhakathi ngezeHlalakuhle nezoMnotho”, wahlanganisa abalimindima beenkhungo ezihlukileko ukusebenzisana norhulumende ukutjheja iintjhijilo zezehlalakuhle nezomnotho nokufumanela imiphakathi iinsetjenziswa, hlangana neminye iminqopho..  Umhlangano lo watjheja imibiko yemikhulumiswano yeemfunda zolithoba mayelana neentjhijilo zazo, ezifaka hlangana ukufikeleleka kwesizo leemali, iindaba zokulawula, ukutjhugululwa komkhakha wezehlalakuhle ngomnqopho wokukhuthaza itjhebiswano lombuso nomphakathi ukuqalana nemiraro yomtlhago, ukungalingani nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi..  Ikhabinethi ikhombele iinhlangano zomphakathi nezakhamuzi ukulima indima eqinileko ekwakheni ikusasa elingcono, njengombana lokho kusehlelweni lomTlamo wokuThuthukiswa kweliZweloke: ngeNembombono yomNyaka wee-  IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Diindasteri tsa Setso le Bonono.

src_text: ITlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko, zobuKghwari nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tobane haholoholo le taba ya tlhahiso ya bonono ba ditshwantsho; mesebetsi ya matsoho le ho rala; ditshwantsho le mmino; mesebetsi ya meralo le bonono; dipapadi le menyanyako, ho kenyeletsa mmino, diphatlalatso le kgatiso..   Moralo ona tla kenella makaleng ana ho thusa ho tlisa diphetoho lekaleng la bonono hore le kgone ho tsebisahala boemong ba matjhaba.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukusetjenziswa kwetlhatlha lamaBubulo wezamaSiko nezobuGwali.
tgt_text: Sena se tla etsa hore lekala lena le kgone ho sebetsa kwano le matjhabeng.

src_text: Itlhatlheli litjheja ubukghwari obubukelwako, imisebenzi elukwako, yemigwalo neyeembikiindaba; okubukelwako nokuthintana ngeensetjenziswa; ukugwala nobukghwari; imidlalo nokugidinga, kufaka hlangana umbhino, ukugadangiswa kwemitlolo..  Lelitlhatlha lizokungenelela kilemikhakha mayelana nokwakha umkhakha wobukghwari obutjhugululiweko obuzokwamukelwa godu bube sezingeni lephasiloke ehlangothinelo.

Lizokusiza ibubulo lezobugwali nezobukghwari leSewula Afrika lifikelele amamakethe wangekhaya newangaphetjheya..  UmThethomtlamo Obuyekeziweko wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali Zobujamo Oburhabako.
tgt_text: Tokomane Lekotsweng Botjha ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iinkhibelelo zomthethomtlamo wamva nje wokuBolekwa kweeMali nguMasipala neeMali zobuJamo obuRhabako.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwane dintlafatso tse entsweng Tokomaneng ya Kadimo ya Ditjhelete tsa Tshohanyetso ke Bommasepala.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zinqophene khulu nengcenye yokubolekwa kweemali.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso tsena di entswe karolong ya dikadimo feela.

src_text: Hlangana neenkhibelelo ezihlongozwako ngokwethula isikhathi sokuboleka eseluliweko ukukhambisana nesikhathi sokusebenza kwepahla esekelwe ngeemali.
tgt_text: Tse ding tsa dintlafatso ke tsa ho lelefatsa nako ya lefa tjhelete ya kadimo ho tsamaisana le boleng ba thepa rekilweng.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi godu zihlathulula indima yamaziko asiza ngeemali kezokubolekisa ngeemali kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso tsena di boetse di hlakisa karolo ya dibanka tsa thuso ya ditjhelete ho kadimeng bommasepala ditjhelete..   Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 dumella bommasepala ho kadima ditjhelete bakeng sa ho reka thepa kapa ho lefa dikoloto.

src_text: IsiGaba sama-230 somThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika womnyaka we-1996 unikela abomasipala igunya lokuboleka iimali zokuqalana neeNdleko zabo.
tgt_text: Tokomane ya pele ne tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka selemo sa 2000 le ho tataisa Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Kadimo ya Ditjhelete ke Bommasepala wa 2003, (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Umtlamo wokuthoma wavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukuhlahla isiGaba sesiThandathu nese-13 somThetho wokuphathwa kweeMali zikaMasipala wee-2003 (UmThetho Nomboro 56 womNyaka wee-2003).
tgt_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlisa merokotso itseng ho dikhamphane tse kadimang bommasepala tjhelete, empa sa kgeloha maikemisetsong tokomane ena sethatho leng dikadimo.

src_text: Iinkhibelelo ezivunyelweko zinqophe ukuthokoza ababolekisi kumakethe yabomasipala kodwana kuragwe ukulandela imigomo ekhambisana nokuboleka iimali kwabomasipala.

tgt_text: Ho Phatlalatswa Pele ho Nako ha Tokomane ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditlolo tsa Molao tsa Kotara tsa Selemo sa Ditjhelete sa 2022/.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi  kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tshisinyo ya ho phatlalatswa pele ho nako ha tokomane ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tsa selemo sa ditjhelete sa 2022/.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota zomnyaka weemali wee-2022/.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tse sa tswa phatlalatswa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhwa kweembalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe ngekota.
tgt_text: Sena se etseditswe ho fetola nako ya ho phatlalatswa ha dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa naha..   Dinako tse sisintsweng tsa phatlalatso ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara ke Phato 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya pele le Pudungwana 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya bobedi.

src_text: Lokhu kunqotjhwe ngakho ukutjhugulula ikambiso yokukhutjhelwa kwelizwe iimbalobalo zobulelesi ezikhutjhwa qobe mnyaka.
tgt_text: Tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone tsona di tla phatlalatswa ka ho latellana ka Hlakola le Motshehanong.

src_text: Ukukhutjhwa ngaphambi kwesikhathi kweembalobalo zobulelesi okutjhukunyiswako kulethwe kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ekoteni yokuthoma kwathi kwekota yesibili kwasiwa kuSinyikhaba wee-.
Iimbalobalo zobulelesi zekota yesithathu zizokukhutjhwa ngoMhlolanja wee-2023 kuthi zekota yesine ngoMrhayili wee-.
tgt_text: Ho Fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fediswa ha Maemo Koduwa Naheng ho latela dikgohola tse neng di le Kapa Botjhabela le KwaZulu-Natal..   Maemo ana fedisitswe ka la 18 Phato ho latela ho eketswa ha nako ya teng ka la 18 Phupu.

src_text: UkuPheliswa Kwesikhathi Sobujamo Behlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD).
tgt_text: Ho eketswa hona ha nako ne le ho fana ha nako ho makala mmuso neng shebane le tshenyo neng bakilwe ke maemo lehodimo diprofensing tsena tse amehileng..   Kabinete dumellane hore maemo renang ha jwale ha sa hloka mehato matlafetseng jwalo ka ha makala mmuso ikemetseng le mekgatlo ya setjhaba di tla tswela pele ho fana ka thuso le kaho botjha   Tshisinyo tsa Melao.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuqedwa kwesikhathi sobuJamo beHlekelele yeliZweloke (i-NSoD) esamenyezelwa ngemva kweenkhulula ePumalanga Kapa naKwaZulu-Natala..  I-NSoD yaphelelwa sikhathi mhla ali-18 kuRhoboyi wee-2022 ngemva kokwelulwa kwayo kusukela mhla ali-18 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa ho Ngodisa Ditsha wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Ukwelulwa kwesikhathi sehlekelele kwenziwa kuyelelwe isidingo sokuraga nokuqinisa amagadango wanje athethwe maphiko wombuso ukuqalana nomthelela wobujamo bezulu obumbi eemfundeni ezithintekileko..  IKhabinethi ivumile ukuthi ubujamo banje abusavumelani namagadango aqinileko njengamaphiko wombuso, amakhampani wangeqadi neenhlangano zomphakathi ezizokuraga ngawo ukufumana isizo, ukuvuselelwa kwepahla nokwakha kabutjha  ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Ngodiso ya Ditsha wa Selemo sa 2020 ho tla sekasekwa ho ya pele.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwePahla.
tgt_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka Phuptjane 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..   Dintlafatso tse tshisinyong ena di tla thusa ho netefatsa taba ya ho ba le mobu ngotsweng Karolong ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wokuTloliswa kwepahla wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena fana ka dipalopalo ho ya ka merabe, bonng, bodudi le boahi ba naha ho batho ba nang le ditokelo tsa ho ba le mobu Afrika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komthethomlingwa lo ngoMgwengweni wee-..  Iinkhibelelo ezitjhukunyiswako zizokuphumelelisa ubunikazi benarha okusemthethweni kusiGaba sama-25(6) womThethosisekelo weRiphabhliki yeSewula Afrika we-.
UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela ukubuthelelwa kweembalobalo mayelana nombala, ubulili, ubakhamuzi babanikazi bamalungelo wenarha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Shebaneng le Mokgatlo wa Meralo ya Motheo ya Metsi wa Selemo sa 2022 (NWRIA).

src_text: Isiqalelelwesi sizokusiza  lokha nakutjhuguluwa ubunikazi benarha..  UmThethomlingwa we-Ejensi yemiThombo nomThangalasisekelo waManzi  (i-NWRIA) wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa NWRIA wa 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba ho tla nka matsatsi   Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho tla le meralo, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le kaho ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi bakeng sa naha ena tla boele laola le taolo ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi teng ha jwale..   Mokgatlo ona tla netefatsa phepelo otlolohileng le tshepahetseng ya metsi ikamahantseng le Molaotheo wa naha.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa i-NWRIA womnyaka wee-2022 isikhathi esingaba malanga amatjhumi alithoba (90) ukobana kuvezwe imibono ngawo.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona tla thehwa le Lekala la Mmuso tlasa Shetjule ya bobedi ya Molao wa Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, wa 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukuhlonywa kwe-NWRIA ezokuqalana nokuhlela, isekelo leemali nokuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo welizwe.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona tla etsa mosebetsi oo ha jwale etswang ke Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Izokuqalana godu nokutjhejwa komthangalasisekelo wamanzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Dumellang Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa.

src_text: I-ejensi izokuqinisekisa ukufumaneka okuragako nokunzinzileko kwamanzi ngokukhambisana neembopho zomthethosisekelo zokufumaneka kwamanzi nebhoduluko elinepilo.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena etsa dintlafatso Molaong laolang Matla Bommasepala ho Iketsetsa Lekgetho wa Selemo sa 2007, (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007).

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuhlonywa ibe liZiko lomBuso ngaphasi kweShejuli yesiBili yomThetho wokuPhathwa kweeMali zomBuso we-1999 (umThetho Nomboro 1 ka-1999).
tgt_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo laola matla bommasepala ho lefisa lekgetho bakeng sa dintlafatso tsa mobu tse tliswang ho bona.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokuthatha ilawulo lemisebenzi eyenziwa njenganje yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  IsiKhibelelo Somthethomlingwa Wamagunya NemiSebenzi YaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso tsena di tlo netefatsa hore bommasepala ba lefisa lekgetho ka nepo le ka tsela hlokang leeme.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ne tjhaele Tshisinyo ena monwana ka 2020 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ukhibelela umThetho wamaGunya nemiSebenzi yaboMasipala womNyaka wee-2007 (umThetho Nomboro 12 wee-2007).
Iinkhibelelwezi zilawula amagunya wabomasipala ekuthuthukisweni kwehlelo lokubhadelwa kweemali mayelana nokwenziwa kweembawo ezithunyelwa kibomasipala.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi zizokuqinisekisa ukuthi abomasipala bahlawulisa ngefanelo, tjhatjhalazi nangokulungileko.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Ditaba tsa Ditjhelete wa Selemo sa.

src_text: IKhabinethi yavumela ukukhutjhelwa emphakathini komThethomlingwa lo ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa melao supileng leng (1) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane tsa Dipenshene, wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Masole, wa 1976, (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso wa 1996; (4) Molao Laolang Komeshene Shebaneng le Lekgetho, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1997; (5) Molao Laolang Banka ya tsa Temo le Mobu, wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005 le (7) Ntlafatso ya Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2021 (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).
Ho Molao Laolang Dipenshene tsa Masole wa 1996 ho kenyeleditswe hore motho kenye molekane wa hae mme seo se nkuwa ka se etsahetse ho tloha ka la 27 Mmesa.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso molaong ona wa dipenshene tla thusa hore balekane ba masole ba kgone ho fumana karolo ya bona hang hang ha ba kgaola lenyalo..   Ho hong hape, dintlafatso tsena di tla hlakisa karolo ya Letona La Matlotlo mme lehlakoreng la mosebetsi wa ho hlahloba dibuka teng dintlafatso tsena di fetola hanyane matla komiti ya bahlahlobi ba dibuka ha ho etsahetse mohlahlobi wa dibuka fumanwa le molato.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wezeeMali womNyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ile ya phatlalatswa ka Hlakola 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa ukukhitjelelwa kwemiThetho elikhomba, elandelako (1) i-Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act ka-1963 (umThetho Nomboro 41 wee-1963); (2) umThetho womHlalaphasi wamaJoni (i-Military Pension Act)  womNyaka we-1976 (umthetho Nomboro 84  we-1976); (3) UmThetho wezomHlalaphasi wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumende we-1996; (4) UmThetho wezeeMali neweKomitjhini eLuleka ngeeMali (i-Financial and Fiscal Commission Act) we-1997 (umthetho Nomboro 99 we-1997); (5) UmThetho wokuThuthukiswa kweBhanga yezokuLima neNarha wee-2002 (umThetho Nomboro 15 wee-2002); (6) UmThetho wokuLawula abaHloliincwadi (i-Audit Profession Act) wee-2005 (umthetho Nomboro 26 wee-2005);  (7) nesiKhibelelo somThetho oLawula abaHloliincwadi wee-2021 (umThetho Nomboro 5 wee-2021)..  Iinkhibelelo ezihlongozwako zifaka hlangana, ngaphasi komThetho woMhlalaphasi wamaJoni womnyaka we-1996, ukufakwa kwabalingani abangakathathani babe bazuzi ukuthoma emva mhla ama-27 kuSihlabantangana womnyaka we-.
Iinkhibelelo zomthetho womhlalaphasi zizokusiza abalingani ukufumana inzuzo khonokho nakutjhatjalaliswa umtjhado.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa.

src_text: Ngaphezu kokuhlathulula indima kaNgqongqotjhe wezeeMali nekuhlolweni kweencwadi, iinkhibelelwezi zihlalisa kuhle igunya lekomiti lapho umhloliincwadi avuma khona umlandu.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo wakhutjhelwa emphakathini ngoMhlolanja wee-2022 ukobana kuvezwe imibono.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tlisa dintlafatso melaong latelang  Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Mautlwela, wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Mekgatlo sa Etseng Phaello, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao Laolang Thepa Laolwang ke Matlole, wa 1988 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1988; (iv) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane, wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao Laolang Lekala la Ditjhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017)..   Dintlafatso tsena di kgona ho rarolla mathata neng fumanwe ke Komiti Ikgethang neng Lekola Maemo Ditjhelete tsa Naha (FATF).

Komiti ena ne etse dikgothaletso tse 40 tse tla thusa Afrika Borwa hore kgone ho sebetsa ka tsela ya matjhaba mabapi le ho lwantsha phapanyetsano seng molaong ya ditjhelete mmoho le tshehetso ya botshosetsi ka ditjhelete..   Ho ne ho fumanehe hore Afrika Borwa ne haella dikarolong tse.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo semiThetho eVamileko (Ukulwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela  amaVukelambuso ngeeMali) wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tla lokisa dikarolo tse 14 ho tsena tse badilweng.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa wemiThetho eVamileko (UkuLwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweeMali nokuKhandela ukuSekela amaVukelambuso ngeeMali).
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa FAFT ho tloha ka.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo ungomumethe eminye imiThethomlingwa nokhibelela imithetho yanje ebizwa  umThetho weSentha yobuHloli bezeeMali wee-2001 (umThetho Nomboro 38 wee-2001); (ii) UmThetho weenHlangano eziNgasebenzeli  iNzuzo we-1997 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-1997); (iii) UmThetho oLawula iPahla eHlanganyelweko (i-Trust Property Control Act) we-1988 (umThetho Nomboro 57 we-1988) (iv) UmThetho wamaKhampani wee-2008 (umThetho Nomboro 71 wee-2008) no  umThetho oLawula amaZiko wezeeMali (i-Financial Sector Regulations Act) wee-2017 (umThetho Nomboro 9 wee-2017).
Iinkhibelelo ziphendula ukutlhayelelwa okutshwaywe lokha nakuhlolwa ikghono lamazwe alinganako siQhema sokuSetjenziswa kweeMali (i-FATF).
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa.

src_text: Umbiko wokuhlolwa ngokuzinikela uveze iintjhukumiso ezima-40 ezizokusiza ukuthi iSewula Afrika ikhambisane namazinga wamazwe ngamazwe wokulwisana nokukhukhuthiswa kweemali nokusekela iinhlangano zamavukelambuso..  ISewula Afrika yafunyanwa itlhayelelwa khulu emikhakheni ema-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya tsona seng Molaong ya 2002 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjheja imikhakha eli-14 kekhonjiweko.
tgt_text: Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano seng Molaong ya tsona, wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) bolelang hore ke tlolo ya molao ho hlahisa dithethefatsi tse ngotsweng ho Shetjule ya Pele le ya Bobedi ya Molao ona..   Dintlafatso tsena di bolela ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya molao oo se molaong sa dumellane le molaotheo wa naha jwalo ka ha shetjule ya molao ona dumella Letona ho etsa diphetoho molaong ona ntle le ho latela tsela nepahetseng ya ketsa molao..    Ka 2020, Lekgotla la Molaotheo le ne le bolele ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa 1992 mme lekgotla la neha Palamente ho fihlela ka la 17 Tshitwe 2022 ho lokisa phoso eo.

src_text: ISewula Afrika solo yathoma ukuba lilunga le-FATF ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Ketsahalo Tlang.
Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa.

src_text: IsiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa Olwisana Nokukhukhuthiswa Kweendakamizwa wee-.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tlo tshwara Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa 2022 mane Kapa ka la 9 le la 11 Lwetse.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ngePalamende kwesiKhibelelo somThethomlingwa olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa wee-2022 kobana uhlaliswe kuhle.
tgt_text: Mohope ona tla be tshwarelwa lekgetlo la pele kontinenteng ya Afrika moo dihlopha tsa banna ba 24 le sa basadi ba 16 di tla beng di qothisana lehlokwa   Melaetsa.

src_text: UmThetho olwisana neenDakamizwa nokuKhukuthiswa kwazo wee-1992 (umthetho Nomboro 140 we-1992) wenza kube kukwephula umthetho ukukhiqiza nokusabalalisa namkha ngiwuphi umkhiqizo obalwe kuTjhejuli yokuThoma nakuTjhejuli yesiBili yomThetho.
tgt_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ho etsa nalane ka ho hapela Afrika Borwa Mahope wa Pele wa Basadi wa Dinaha tsa Afrika (WAFCON), ka ho hlola naha ya Morokho papading ya makgaolakgang ka Moqebelo wa la 23 Phupu.

src_text: Iinkhibelelwezi ziqalana nokungasebenzi kwesiGaba sama-63, esafunyanwa sitjhayisana nomthethosisekelo mayelana nokunikelwa kukaNgqongqotjhe amalungelo wokukhibelela amatjhejuli ngaphandle kokulandela ikambiso yokutlanywa komthetho.
tgt_text: Tlholo ena ya bona ba kentse Mohopeng wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa Basadi tla tshwarelwa naheng ya Australia le New Zealand ho tloha ka la 20 Phupu ho ya ho 20 Phato.

src_text: Ngomnyaka wee-2020, iKhotho yomThethosisekelo yamemezele ukuthi isiGaba sama-63 somThetho olwisana nokuKhukhuthiswa kweenDakamizwa womnyaka we-1992 utjhayisana nomthethosisekelo godu wajanyiswa ekusebenzeni ukufikela nakali-17 kuNobayeni wee-2022 ukunikela iPalamende ithuba lokulungisa ubutjhaphobo  Umnyanya Ozako.
tgt_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa, ka ho hapa dimetale tse 27 dipapading tse fapafapaneng Dipapading tsa Commonwealth mane Birmingham, Englane ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho ya ho 8 Phato.

src_text: Iphaliswano lePhasiloke likaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022).
tgt_text: Sehlopha sena se ne se be maemong borobong ka metale tse supileng tsa kgauta, tse robong tsa silifera le tse 11 tsa bronze.

src_text: ISewula Afrika izokusingatha iphaliswano lephasiloke likamakhakhularahwe (i-Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022) eKapa mhla ali-9 namhla ali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ka ho hlola naha ya Spain Letotong la Dipapadi tsa Basadi tsa Mariha tse neng di bapalla Lebaleng la Emirates Airline Park, Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), ka ho ba Mmabotle wa Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: Imbedla yemidlalo le izokubanjwa kokuthoma kukhonthinenthi ye-Afrika begodu iinqhema zabaduna ezima-24 nezabasikazi ezili-16 ezivela ephasini jikelele zizabe ziphalisana  Imilayezo.
tgt_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka ho hapa Dipapadi tsa 2022 tsa AIG Women’s Open mme ba mosadi wa boraro wa Afrika Borwa wa ho hapa kgau ya kgauta..   Matshidiso       Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya: ●   Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), sebini le sengodi sa dipina ya neng tumi nakong eo ba neng ba theha sehlopha sa TKZee ka 1996 le metswalle ya hae mmedi..  Kgiro.

src_text: Siyabathokozisa Ikhabinethi ithokozise beyadlulisela neemfiselabuhle zayo kabalandelako: Isiqhema seBholo eRarhwako i-Banyana, ngokwenza umlando ngokuthumba iphaliswano le-Afrika lokuthoma labomma i-Women's Africa Cup of Nations (i-2022 WAFCON), ephaliswaneni egade libanjwe e-Rabat, e-Morocco ngoMgqibelo, nakama-23 kuVelabahlinze wee-.
