tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.

src_text: Ngokufanako bebaphumelela ukungenela iPhaliswano leBholo yaboMma lePhasiloke (i-FIFA Women’s World Cup) ezokusingathwa ngokuhlanganyela kwe-Australia ne-New Zealand ukuthoma nakama-20 kuVelabahlinze ukuya nakama-20 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): Karolong ya Dipatlisiso ka Melawana le Taolo Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: IsiQhema seSewula Afrika (i-Team South Africa), ngokuthumba iimendlela ezima-27 emikhakheni ehlukahlukileko emidlalweni i-2022 Commonwealth Games ebanjelwe e-Birmingham, e-England ethome mhlana ama-28 kuVelabahlinze ukufikela nakabu-8 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Sitsing sa Nala sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo..   Ntate Adam Mthombeni jwalo ka DDG: Dikamanong tsa Mafapha Mmuso Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: Baqede iphaliswaneli basebujameni bethoba bafumene iimendlela zerhawuda ezilikhomba, ezilithoba ngezesiliva kanti ezili-11 ngezethusi.Isiqhema saboMma sikaMakhakhulararhwe (i-Springbok Women), ngokubetha i-Spain emdlalweni wabo wokuthoma kuthungelelwano lemidlalo yokulinga emibili i-Winter Test Series, edlalelwa e-Emirates Airline Park ngeJwanisbhege.IKosazana u-Ndavi Nokeri (oneminyaka ema-23), ngokuthumba iphaliswano likaNomhlekhabo weSewula Afrika womNyaka wee-2022 (u-Miss South Afrika 2022).IKosazana Ashleigh Buhai, ngokuthumba i-2022 AIG Women’s Open nokuba mSewula Afrika wesithathu ongumma ukuthumba iphaliswano elingelikhulu likanongorwana werhawuda.

Sibalilela Imbiko Ikhabinethi idlulise amezwi wayo wokutjhiriya emndenini nebanganini baka: ● Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (obekaneminyaka ema-46), umbhini, umkhaleli nomtloli wombhino owaduma lokha yena nabangani bakhe ababili batlama Isiqhema sombhino we-Kwaito ngomnyaka we-1996 esibizwa i-TKZee.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.

Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jwalo ka Motsamaiso ya ka Sehloohong Mokgatlong wa Ntshetsopele ya Eneji Afrika Borwa..   Ditho tsa nakwana tsa Mokgatlo wa Naha Laolang Taba tsa Motlakase Afrika Borwa: Ntate Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo); Mme Precious Sibiya;Mme Thembeka Semane; leNtate Fungai Sibanda kgethilwe hape)..   Modulasetulo le setho sa Moifo wa Boto ya Thekenoloji ya Dimenerale: Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leMoprofesara Lwazi Ngubevana..   Mme Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe jwalo ka Motsamaisi Moholo wa Sedika wa Mokgatlo wa Tshireletso wa Afrika Borwa wa KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Moruo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukuphunguka kancani kwenani labantu abangasebenziko, abaphunguke nge-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho fokotseha hanyane ha palo ya batho ba sa sebetseng naheng ena ka persente tse.

src_text: 6%, ukusukela ku-.
tgt_text: 6, ho tloha ho persente tse.

src_text: 5 ekoteni yokuthoma yomnyaka bayokuba yi-.
tgt_text: 5 ho ya ho tse.

src_text: 9% ekoteni yesibili yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: 9 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa.

src_text: Iimbalobalo ezimenyezelwe liZiko leemBalobalo (i-StatsSA) zitjengisa ukuthi lapho imisebenzi ivuleke khona ngobunengi ukudlula kezinye iindawo kube seKorweni yemiSebenzi yomPhakathi (276 000), kezeRhwebo (169 000), kezeeMali (128 000) nemaGontrageni (104 000).
tgt_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tse phatlaladitsweng Tokomaneng ya Kotara ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditaba tsa Kgiro phatlaladitsweng ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Afrika Borwa, mesebetsi mengata fumanehile lekaleng la Ditshebeletso tsa Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba (276 000), la tsa Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditjhelete (128 000) le la Kaho (104 000).

Palo ya batho ba sebetsang ha jwale ke dimilione tse 15,6 kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 mme palo ya ba sa sebetseng yona eketsehile ka batho ba 132 000 ho ya ho ba dimilione di 8,0 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 ha ho bapiswa le kotara fetileng.

src_text: Inani elipheleleko labantu abasebenzako belijame eengidini ezili-15,6 ngekota yesibili yee-2022, kwathi inani labantu abangasebenziko lakhuphuka ngee-132 000 layokuba zii-.
tgt_text: Keketseho ena le ha le nyane, empa bontsha kgatelo pele boitekong ba mmuso le mahlahana ona ba ho aha moruo botjha esitana le ho theha menyetla hlokahalang ya mesebetsi.

src_text: 0 yeengidi ngekota yesibili yee-2022, nakulinganiswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Sena ke bopaki ba hore ha re tshwarisane, mme re sebetsa mmoho re ka hlola diphephetso tse shebaneng le moruo wa rona.
Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano maikutlong Maafrika Borwa jwalo ka ha hula ka thata ka lebaka la leqeme la mesebetsi le ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela.

src_text: Ukukhuphuka kancazana kodwana okukarisako kwaleziimbalobalo, kutjengisa ukuthi ithoma ukuthela iinthelo imizamo karhulumende nabasebenzisani bakhe bomphakathi yokuhlumisa umnotho bekwakhiwe nemisebenzi edingeke khulu.
tgt_text: Jwalo ka mmuso hlokomelang, re ikemiseditse ka hohlehohle ho sebedisana le mahlahana rona ho aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa batho bohle.
Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa lapeng ka ho reka le ho sebedisa ditshebeletso tsa lapeng.

src_text: Lobu-ke bufakazi bokuthi nasisebenzisana ngokubambisana soke ngokuhlanganisa amandlethu wokusebenza, singazinqoba iintjhijilo esiqalene nazo emnothweni welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Disebediswa tsa Setjhaba.
Kabinete hanyetsana haholo le taba ya tshenyo ya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ke baahi ba Tongaat mane KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya boipelaetso ba bona ka lebaka la ho kgaoha ha phepelo ya metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyawuzwisisa umraro wokujanyelwa ziinhloko kwamaSewula Afrika lokhuya nakalinga ukuphila ipilwawo yangamalanga, ngenca yokudura kwezinto nokukhuphuka kwenani labantu abangasebenziko.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se be le mamello jwalo ka ha mosebetsi se qadile wa ho lokisa Sitsi se Hlwekisang Metsi sa moo Tongaat..  Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano ya baahi jwalo ka ha ba tlameha ho sebedisa metsi tliswang ka dilori ka lebaka la tshenyo neng bakwe ke dikgohola botjheng ba selemo sena.

src_text: Njengorhulumende otjhejako, solo sisazibophelele ngokusebenzisana neenhlangano zomphakathi ukwakha ingomuso elingcono kiwo woke umuntu.
tgt_text: Leha ho le jwalo, meruso le ho senya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ha se tharollo, empa le ho eketsa mathata setjhabeng.

src_text: Urhulumende solo uzibophelele ngokusekela amabhizinisi welizwe lekhethu ngokuthenga ipahla nezenzelwa ezenziwe khona lapha eSewula Afrika.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa.

Kabinete amohetse ho saenelwa ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa 2022, (Molao wa bo 3 wa Selemo sa 2022) ho ba molao ka botlalo ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Umthangalasisekelo Womphakathi .
tgt_text: Ka molao ona, ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa maemo le boleng ba tshebetso ya bommasepala.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikusolile ukugirizwa komthangalasisekelo ogirizwe zizakhamuzi zeThongathi KwaZulu-Natala lokhuya nazitjhagalela ukuthola amanzi.
tgt_text: Molao ona, ke karolo ya matsapa mmuso ho ntlafatsa maemo Phano ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba leng tokelo ya sona ngotsweng ho Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa Selemo sa..  Molao ona hlakisa hantle le tsela tlamehang ho latelwa ha ho hirwa basebeletsi maemong hodimo boetse hape thibela basebeletsi ba mmuso ho ba ketapeleng ya mekga ya dipolotiki.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele izakhamuzi ukuthi zizincenge, zehlise ummoya, njengoba phela nakhu sewuthomile umsebenzi wokulungisa ubuTsengelo baManzi beThongathi.
tgt_text: Molao ona hape dumella hore dikgeo tsa batsamaisi ba bommasepala di phatlalatswe boemong ba naha ho bebofatsa taba ya ho fumana batho ba nang le bokgoni bo hlokahalang.

Kabinete na le boitshepo ba hore diphetoho tsena di tla netefatsa hore ba kgethelwang kapa ba hirelwang dikgeong tseo, ba sebetsa ka tsela lebelletsweng le ho netefatsa hore re ntlafatsa maphelo batho bohle.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyakuzwisisa ukujanyelwa ziinhloko kwezakhamuzi ezikateleleke ukuthi zisebenzise iinlori ezithutha amanzi isikhathi eside, solo kwasahlela iinkhukhula phambilini nonyaka.
tgt_text: Bonokwane.

src_text: Nokho-ke nanyana kunjalo, inturhu nokudungeka kwezinto akusizinto ezingaba sisombululo, kanti nokugirizwa komthangalasisekelo womphakathi kunomthelela omumbi phezu kwabantu bendawo le kwaphela.
tgt_text: Kabinete thoholetsa ba Ditshebeletso tsa Lekgetho Afrika Borwa ka ho kgona ho fumana sethethefatsi sa crystal meth sa boima ba 785kg, se ka bitsang dimilione tse   Sethethefatsi sena, se fumanwe mane Boemafofaneng ba Matjhaba ba OR Tambo ka Sontaha sa la 28 Phato.
Ho fumaneha ha sethethefatsi sena, ho tla romela molaetsa ho dinokwane hore madiboho rona sebetsa ka thata ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: UmThetho Wee-2022 WamaTjhuguluko Wamahlelo WaboMasipala BeeNdawo  zemaKhaya   .
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Moifo wa Thuto Phahameng Mabapi le Dipatlisiso ka Meputso ya Baokamedi ba Diyunivesithi (CHE) le Basebeletsi ba Boemong ba Botsamaisi ho tsona Afrika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukutlikitlelwa emthethweni nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukutjhugululwa komThetho wee-2022 wamaHlelo waboMasipala (umThetho 3 wee-2022).
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya hlajwa malotsana ka sephetho sa dipatlisiso ka CHE, tse neng di thakgolwe ke Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale, Ngaka, Blade Nzimande, ho hlahloba taba ya meputso le tsela ya tshebetso ya batsamaisi ba ka sehloohong diyunivesithing dilemong tse 15 tse fetileng, ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 ho isa ho sa..  Dipatlisiso tsena, di ne di lekola taba ya tshebetso, katleho le ntshetsopele diyunivesithing kapa lekaleng la thuto phahameng naheng ena.

src_text: UmThetho lo unqophe ukwenza ngcono amandla wokusebenza newokuziphatha kwaborhulumende beendawo.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena le dikateng tsa yona di kenyeletsa le dikgothaletso tsa teng.

src_text: Umthetho lo uyingcenye yemizamo karhulumende yokwenza  iKoro yabaSebenzi bemBusweni irage umsebenzi wayo ngekambiso yamakghonofundwa ibe iqinisekise ukuthi abantu bahlala benzelwa izenzelwa ekufanele benzelwe zona, njengelungelo elisisekelo elimumethwe mThethosisekelo weRiphabhligi yeSewula Afrika we-.
tgt_text: Tse ding tsa dikgothaletso di kenyeletsa ho matlafatswa esitana le ho sebetsa ka tsela hlakileng mabapi le ditaba tsa meputso.
Tse ding dikgothaletso di eletsa ho thehwa ha komiti ikemetseng tla shebana le taba ya meputso.

src_text: UmThetho lo uhlathulula ikambiso ekumele ilandelwe nakuqatjhelwa iinkhundla eziphakemeko.
tgt_text: Dikgothaletso tsena, di boetse di sisinya le hore ho be le ho matlafatswa mmoho le ho lekolwa ha tshebetso  ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.

src_text: Nje awusavumi ukuthi iimphathimandla zembusweni zeenkhundla eziphakemeko ziphathe neenkhundla eziphakemeko eenqhemeni zepolitiki.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tsena, di boetsa tsa lekola le ho fetana ha boholo ba ditsi tsena mme tsa boela tsa bapiswa le maemo matjhaba.

src_text: Okhunye, njengoba sekusebenza lomThetho nje, iinkhundla ezivulekileko zabaphathi babomasipala  kulindeleke ukuthi zikhangiswe elizweni loke kobanyana zizokudosa abafakiimbawo abafaneleko babe banengi ngokungakghonakalako.
tgt_text: Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale ho lebeletswe hore le buisane le ketapele ya diyunivesithi ka maikemisetso ho di ntshetsa pele.
Ka morao ho moo, tlaleho ena tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Thuto Phahameng le Thupello: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: IKhabinethi inesiqiniseko sokuthi amatjhuguluko la azakuqinisekisa ukuthi labo abazakuqatjhelwa iinkhundlezi bazakukghona ukugcina iinthembiso zabo kobanyana woke umuntu azokuphila ipilo engcono.
tgt_text: Ho Potlakiswa ha Diphetoho Dipatlisisong le Mokgweng wa ho Ruta Lekaleng la Thuto Phahameng.

Kabinete tshehetsa dikgothaletso tsa dipatlisiso tse pedi tse neng di etswe ho ka eletsa ka tsela le mekgwa ka sebediswang ho potlakisa diphetoho dipatlisisong le mokgweng wa ho ruta ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.

src_text: Ubulelesi .
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya pele ne etswe ke Komiti Ikgethileng ya Matona neng fuputsa ka thibelo ya kgiro, tshebediso le katleho ya barutehi ba batho ba batsho Afrika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuke iimphathimandla zeZiko eliButhelela umThelo leSewula Afrika (i-SARS) eziqalene nezomthelo wepahla ekuthengiselanwa ngayo namazwe wangaphandle ngokubamba isidakamizwa i-crystal meth ema-785 kg ebeyingathengiswa ngemali eziingidi ezima-R236, edoyelweni laboflayi i-OR Tambo International ngoSondo nakama-28 kuRhoboyi wee-.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya bobedi – neng ntshitswe ke Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Dipatlisiso – yona ne etswe ke Mokgatlo wa Diyunivesithi tsa Afrika Borwa leng mokgatlo emetseng diyunivesithi tse 26 tsa setjhaba naheng ena.

src_text: Ukubanjwa kwalesisidakamizwa kuzakuthumela umlayezo ozwakala kuhle eenqhemeni zehlanganyela yeenlelesi ukuthi siqinile isandla sevikeleko emasangweni wokungena nokuphuma elizweni lekhethu, nokuthi iimphathimandla zelizwe lekhethu zisebenza ngokukhuthala ukucitha nanyana kungaba ngebamhlobobani ubulelesi      Iinqunto Zekhabinethi.
tgt_text: Ka bobedi ditlaleho tsena di kgothaletsa taba ya ho potlakiswa ha diphetoho dikarolong tse hlano leng tshebediso ya dirutehi; ho nka karolo ha basebeletsi ba diyunivesithi; mokgwa le tshebetso ya diyunivesithi; melawana le maano tshebetso, le kgaello ya disebediswa.

src_text: Umbiko Wephenyo Womkhandlu Wezefundo Ephakemeko (i-CHE) Ngomrholo Wama-Vice Chancellor Kunye Neenkhulu Eziphethe Iinkhundla Eziphakemeko ESewula Afrika                                                                                                                                .
tgt_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ho Tshebediso ya Dimela le Diphoofolo Tlhahisong ya Dijo le tsa Temo (the Treaty).

src_text: IKhabinethi ibikelwe ngomphumela wephenyo le-CHE elatlanywa nguNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula uDorh.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha the Treaty Palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo.

src_text: Blade Nzimande ngomnyaka wee-2020, kobanyana kuphenywe ngezinga lemirholo yeenkhulu eziphethe amayunivesithi esikhathini seminyaka eli-15 ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 ukuyokufika kowee-.
tgt_text: Sena se tla etsa hore Afrika Borwa be karolo ya Tumellano ena fanang ka tataiso ho dinaha tseo leng ditho mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo dijong le ho tsa temo.
Ho amohelwa ha Tumellano ena, ho tla matlafatsa boitlamo ba naha ena mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo, mme ho tshehetswe le batho ba mahaeng.

src_text: Umnqopho wephenyweli kuthola ukuthi amayunivesithi namkha ikoro yefundo ephakemeko elizweni lekhethu anobubambelelo obungangani, akghona kangangani ukwenza izinto ekufanele azenze nokuthi athuthuka kangangani.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Umbiko lo uveza amaphuzu aqakathekileko walokho okutholwe nabekuphenywa, okuphekelelwa ziimphakamiso zokuthi kungenziwani ukulungisa lapho kunetlhayelo khona.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho.
Moralo ona hlakisa ponelopele ka Afrika Borwa nang le Maemo Lehodimo Tsitsitseng.

src_text: Hlangana nokhunye okuphakanyiswako, kuphakanyiswa nokuthi kuqiniswe iindlela zokurhola, nehlelo lemirholo libe yinto eyenzelwa emkhanyweni.
tgt_text: Moralo ona hlalosa tsela le mekgwa ya ho fihlela sena.

src_text: Ukusungulwa kwesijamiso sangaphandle esizijameleko esizakwengamela ihlelo lokuthathwa kweenqunto zemirholo.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla ama motho ohle Afrika Borwa fane le ka menyetla ya ho lokisa ho se lekalekane ha nako fetileng le ho aha moruo tla tswela bohle molemo.

src_text: Kuphakanyiswa godu nokuqiniswa kwamahlelo wokuhlunga amazinga wokusebenza kilamaziko wezefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Komeshene ya Mopresidente ya Maemo Lehodimo buisane le mahlahana yona mme ya fumana tshehetso kgolo ka moralo ona.

src_text: Iphenyweli godu liqalelele nobukhulu obuhlukahlukako bamaziko wezefundo la, godu  lalinganisa nangamazinga wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka netefatsa taba ya hore moralo ona wa ho fihlela tikoloho moya hlwekileng ka selemo sa 2050 tlameha ho tshehetsa moruo le ntshetsopele ya naha ho kenyeletsa menyetla ya mesebetsi ho bohle, tshebedisano le setjhaba le phediso ya bofuma.
Kabinete ipiletsa ho mahlahana yona ohle hore tshehetse moralo ona.

src_text: UNgqongqotjhe wezeFundo ePhakemeko, zeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kulindeleke bona abonisane nabarholi bamayunivesithi njengegadango lokuqinisa leziinjamiso zefundo.
tgt_text: Ho tla ralwa tsela eo moralo ona tlang ho kengwa tshebetsong ka yona mme tla kenyelletswa moralong wa maano le kabo ya ditjhelete tsa mmuso.

src_text: Ngalokho-ke umbiko lo uzakumenyezelwa kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeFundo nokuThwasisa: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Mofuta Motjha wa Lengolo la Afrika Borwa la ho Kganna.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fetolwa ha mofuta sebetsang ha jwale wa lengolo la ho kganna ho ya ho le nang le dikarolo tse ntjha tsa tshireletso.

src_text: ITjhuguluko Elikhanjiswa Msinyana Lephenyo Nekghono Lokufundisa Ekorweni Yezefundo Ephakemeko     .
tgt_text: Mofuta ona sebediswang ha jwale, haesale le tshebetsong ho tloha ka selemo sa.

src_text: IKhabinethi iyazisekela iimphakamiso zamaphenyo amabili la athunywe ukuphakamisa amagadango angasetjenziswa kobanyana azokukhambisa msinyana umsebenzi wokwenza amatjhuguluko werhubhululo namandla wokufundisa emaziko wefundo ephakemeko.
tgt_text: Maemo thekenoloji fetohile haholo matsatsing ana mme ho bitsa tjhelete ngata ho tswela pele le mofuta ona.
Mofuta motjha wa karete tsamaisana le Maemo Matjhaba Mangolo ho Kganna le Thekenoloji ya Poloko ya Dintlha tsa Batho.

src_text: Umbiko wokuthoma uhlanganiswe siQhema somSebenzi saboNgqongqotjhe ebesiphenya ngezinto ebeziliya ukuqatjhwa, nokuhlala kunye nokuthuthuka kweemfundiswa zabantu abanzima eSewula Afrika.

Umbiko wesibili ¬–   olayelwe mNyango wezeSayensi nezaMandla wokuSungula kunye nehlangano yezerhubhululo i-National Research Foundation – uhlanganiswe yiYunivesithi yeSewula Afrika (i-UNISA), eyona yengamele nejamele  amayunivesithi womphakathi ama-26 welizwe lekhethu.
tgt_text: Melawana ya Leano la Mmuso la Tshehetso ya Setjhaba (EPWP).
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha moralo wa EPWP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Yomibili imibiko le iphakamisa iindlela ezingasetjenziswa ukukhambisa amatjhuguluko msinyana emakorweni amahlanu angamakhulu, weemfundo ezitholakala ngemva kweziqu zokuthoma zeyunivesithi; ukuhlanganyela kwabasebenzi bemayunivesithi; isiko nejayelo yamaziko wezefundo;  umthethokambiso namahlelo wokwenza izinto, kunye nemithombo yamandla elinganiselweko nofana eyimbijana.
tgt_text: Leano lena la EPWP, ke leo ka lona mmuso thusang setjhaba ho leleka bofuma ka ho theha mesebetsi ya nakwana, haholo bakeng sa basadi le batjha.
Moralo ona motjha tla hlakisa dintho tse ngata tse kang meputso, tshehetso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso ya setjhaba le hore leano lena le ipapise le melao ya tsa kgiro.

src_text: Isivumelwano Samazwe Ngamazwe Ngemithombo Yamandla Yeentjalo Zendabuko Ekugomeni Nakezokulima (isiVumelwano).
tgt_text: Le tla boela le kgothaletsa le tshebedisano mmoho pakeng tsa mmuso le lekala le ikemetseng ho ka netefatsa hore lenaneo lena la EPWP le thusa ho theha mesebetsi ya moshwelella le ho leleka bofuma.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukudluliselwa kwesiVumelwano ePalamende kobanyana iyosiqinisa.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla hlaha ka mahlale ho kenya lenaneo lena la mesebetsi ya setjhaba tshebetsong naheng ka bophara.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakwenza iSewula Afrika ibe yingcenye yeenqhema zalesisiVumelwano, sona esibonisa amazwe amalunga ngokulondwa nokuqinisekiswa kokubabalelwa kokusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zendabuko ekugomeni nakezokulima.
tgt_text: Diphetoho Mofuteng wa Bone wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlhahisong ya Mofuta Motjha wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka selemo sa tjhaetse monwana ho tjhentjhisana ha tshebediso ya dipuo tse molao tjheleteng ena jwalo ka selemo.

src_text: Ukuqiniswa kwalesisiVumelwano kuzakubuye kuqinise namandla welizwe lekhethu wokuzibophelela ekulondeni nekubabaleleni ukusetjenziswa kwemithombo yamandla yeentjalo zemvelo, kusekelwe nabantu beendawo zemakhaya.
tgt_text: Lentswe lena “Afrika Borwa” le tla hlahella lehlakoreng le le leng la tjhelete mme ho tjhentjhanywe dipuo tsohle tse molaong.
Ho R5, ho tla sebediswa puo tse tharo; ho R2; 50c, 20c le 10c ho sebediswe puo tse pedi mme ho R1 ho sebediswe puo le nngwe.

src_text: Umtlamo Olungileko Wokweyamela Ematjhugulukweni ESewula Afrika    .
tgt_text: Dipuo tsena di tla nne di tjhentjhane jwalo ka selemo dilemong tsena tse leshome tse tlang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuphunyeleliswa komTlamo oLungileko wokweYamela emaTjhugulukweni.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Molawana wa Tlhwekiso ya Metsi (IWQM) wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Umtlamo lo uza nenembombono ekuvunyelanwa ngayo, elungileko, yeSewula Afrika elungele ukujamelana nanyana yitlayimethi enjani.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa IWQM bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Uhlathulula ikambisolawulo nomthethokambiso wokuphumelelisa lokhu.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla kena sebakeng sa wa kgale wa WQM wa selemo sa 1991 neng kengwe tshebetsong ka selemo sa..  Molawana ona hlakisa dintlha tsa bohlokwa tsamaisong ya tlhwekiso ya metsi.

src_text: Umtlamo wokweyamela ematjhugulukweni lo uzakuthinta woke umuntu eSewula Afrika, kanti unjalo nje godu uvula nethuba lokulungisa okwakungakalungi kusukela eminyakeni eyadlulako, ube wakhe nomnotho ozakuhlomulisa boke abantu.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tsamaisana le melao yohle ya naha laolang metsi mme ntse ikamahantse le boinehelo ba naha ba ho nka metsi jwalo ka sehlahiswa se sa atang.
Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya Bakeng sa Nako Tlang.

src_text: IKomitjhini yobeNgameli ngezeTlayimethi ikhe yaphuma ijima elinabileko lokubonisana nababelani, yathola isekelo elikhulu ngomtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya bakeng sa Nako Tlang bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: IKhabinethi ifakazele ukuthi ukweyamela ehlelweni elizakwenza ukuthi ilizwe lekhethu libe selinganammoya osilaphazekileko ngomnyaka wee-2050, kufuze kusekele iinrhuluphelo zetuthuko yelizwe loke, sekubalwa nemisebenzi ehloniphekileko kibo boke abantu, ukuqalelelwa kwabantu boke kunye nokurarhwa kobuchaka nomtlhago wabo.
tgt_text: Maqhubu kgaso ya diyalemoya, ke bohlokwa ho tsa kgokahano le tshebedisong ya dijithale Afrika Borwa.

Molawana ona tla hlakisa taba ya ho fana ka dilaesense bakeng sa diselefounu; kgaso; tshebeletso tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele; tshebedisano le setjhaba ha mmoho le diindasteri tse ding tse amehang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele boke ababelani bomphakathi ukuthi basingathe bebasekele umtlamo lo.
tgt_text: Molawana ona tla netefatsa tshebetso hlokang leemo kabong ya dilaesense lekaleng lena ha mmoho le ho netefatsa hore bohle ba fumana kgokahano ntle ka mokgwa wa dijithale le dibakeng tse dikoting naheng ena.

src_text: Kuzokuhlanganiswa ihlelo eliphelele ngemininingwana lokuphumelelisa umtlamo lo, kanti-ke lizakuthi lingatlanywa bese lihlanganiswa nehlelo likarhulumende lokulungiselela izinto nokuhlelela iimali..     Ikarada Lelayisense Yokutjhayela Elitjha ESewula Afrika   .
tgt_text: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ho Boto ya Matjhaba ya Moifo wa Taolo ho tsa Kgokahano ya Diyalemoya (ITU).

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuvumele ukujanyiselelwa kweKarada leLayisense yokuTjhayela esetjenziswa njenganje, ijanyiselelwe ngekarda eliphephe ngcono.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kgethwa ha Ntate Mandla Samuel Mchunu ho ya emela Afrika Borwa ho ITU (Region .
Ha jwale Ntate Mchunu ke setho sa boto ena.

src_text: Ihlelo ekusebenza ngalo ilayisense yekarada yanje solo lathoma ukusebenza ngomnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Ho sisintswe hore boele kgethelwe ho sebetsa teng hape ho tloha ka semo sa 2023 ho isa ho sa..  Dikgetho di tla tshwarelwa Sebokeng sa ITU sa Kemedi tsa Dinaha se tla ba mane Bucharest, Romania ho tloha ka la 26 Lwetse ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.

src_text: Ikarada elitjha ekuphakanyiswa ukuthi kujanyiselelwe ngalweli lizakwenza ilayisense yokutjhayela yekhethwapha ikhambisane nechwephetjhe lethekhnoloji yamazwe ngamazwe, i-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ikemiseditse ho ikamahanya le dipehelo tsa ITU ho netefatsa hore kgokahanyo finyella diqoleng tsohle tsa lefatshe ka mokgwa wa dijithale .
Kgwedi ya Botjhaba.

src_text: Umthethokambiso Wehlelo Elinabileko Lemisebenzi Yomphakathi (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ya Botjhaba leng ya Lwetse re tla keteka tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukugazedwa komtlamo womThethokambiso we-EPWP kobanyana kuyokubonisanwa ngawo nomphakathi.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa kaofela ho keteka Botjhaba ba rona ka ho fapana ha rona empa re ntse re le setjhaba se le seng se bopahaneng.

src_text: I-EPWP ingelinye lamahlelo karhulumende aqakathekileko anqophe ukuphungula ubuchaka asize nangengeniso yemali ebantwini abadingileko, ngokwakha amathuba wemisebenzi wesikhatjhana, khulu khulu elutjheni nebantwini abasikazi.
tgt_text: Re tlameha ho sebetsa mmoho re tshwarane ho fedisa dikarohano le dipherekano tsa nako  fetileng mme re be setjhaba se le seng se motlotlo ka Afrika Borwa  Melaetsa.

DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho:Bahlodi bohle, ba fumaneng dimetale le bohle ba nkileng karolo lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades tummeng ka hore ke “Lebelo Botho la ho Hlola Kaofela”, le neng le mathwa ka la 28 Phato.

src_text: Umtlamo womthethokambiso omutjha lo uzakuqinisa ihlelo ube ulethe nomkhanyo eendabeni ezinjengomrholo, ihlelo lokusekela ngeemali nokuvikeleka komphakathi, ube uthomanise ne-EPWP neendlela zemisebenzi zanamhlanje (zesimodeni).
tgt_text: Mokgahlelong wa banna mohlodi bile Tete Dijana (ka nako ya dihora tse 5, metsotso 30 le metsotswana 38).

src_text: Uzakukhuthaza ukusebenzisana hlangana kwakarhulumende nekoro yangeqadi ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi i-EPWP iba nendima ebonakalako ekuvulweni kwemisebenzi ehloniphekako nekuphungulweni komtlhago.
tgt_text: Mohlodi enwa tswa Mahikeng profensing ya Leboya Bophirima.

src_text: Umthethokambiso lo uzakubuye godu ukhuthaze amandla wokusungula ekuphunyelelisweni kwamahlelo wemisebenzi yomphakathi elizweni lokeli.
tgt_text: Mokgahlelong wa basadi teng mohlodi bile Alexandra Morozova ho tswa naheng ya Rashia (ka nako ya dihora tse 6, metsotso 17 le metsotswana 47).

MatshidisoKabinete lebisa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya:Mme Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), eo neng le molwanedi wa tsa tokoloho le ditokelo tsa basebetsi ya neng fumane Kgau ya National Order of Luthuli ka selemo sa 2004 ka “Kabelo ya hae ho lwaneleng ditokelo tsa basebetsi le tsa Afrika Borwa sa kgetholleng ka morabe le bonng.”Ditho tse hlano tsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) tse ileng tsa swahlamana le sefofane Boemafofaneng ba Rand, Germiston, ka Labobedi la la 30 Phato.

src_text: Amatjhuguluko Werherho Lesigaba Sesine Lemali YeSewula Afrika Eziinthoro.
tgt_text: SAPS ntse fuputsa sesosa sa kotsi ena.

src_text: IKhabinethi iphasise ubungako, umtlamo kunye nokukhandwa kweMali eziinThoro yeSewula Afrika yomNyaka wee-2023, engeyeHlandla lesiNe lokukhandwa kwemali eziinthoro.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mofofisi wa teng ya lemetseng haholo ho fola ka potlako  Kgiro.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele irherho lehlandla lesine lokukhandwa kwalemali, elidlheganisa ukusetjenziswa kwamalimi weSewula Afrika kileziinthoro qobe mnyaka.
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane jwalo ka Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): ba keng sa Tekolo le Ntshetsopele Lefapheng la Meralo, Tekolo le Tekolobotjha  Mme Kwena Komape jwalo ka DDG: Ntshetsopele ya Moruo, tsa Kgwebo le Dipapatso Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ditaba tsa Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahaeng  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Ofising ya Naha ya Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo.

src_text: Zamandla.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ibikelwe nguNgqongqotjhe womNyango wezamaBubulo kaRhulumende u- Pravin Gordhan ngekghono le-Eskom lokukhandela ukucinywa-cinywa kwegezi kwenzelwa ukuyonga begodu ifumene umbiko weKomidi eTjheja ubuJamo obuQokamileko beGezi eliZweniloke.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya fumana tlaleho ho tswa ho Letona la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso Pravin Gordhan ka mekgwa eo Eskom tlang ho sebedisa ho lwantshana le ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa.

Kabinete boetse hape ya fumana le tlaleho ya kgatelo pele mosebetsing wa Komiti ya Naha Shebaneng le Mathata Motlakase..     Ha ditlaleho tsena ka bobedi di se di sekasekilwe ho tla ba teng phatlalatso tla etswa..     Kabinete ikwahlaya haholo ka ditshitiso tse bakwang ke ho tingwa hona ha motlakase dikgwebong le malapeng, haholoholo nakong eo mmuso kenyang tshebetsong matsapa neng phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu.

src_text: Ezinye iimmemezelo zikokwethulwa ngemva kokubanjwa kwemikhulumiswano engeneneleko yokuqalisisa imibiko le.

Ikhabinethi iveze ukudana kwayo ngokuphazamiseka nokugugunywa kucinywa cinywa kwegezi okuthikameza amabhizinisi namakhaya, khulukhulu ukucinywokhu nakwenzeka lokha urhulumende nakalukana namano wokungenelela amenyezelwa nguMengameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa ngoVelabahlinze wee-.
tgt_text: Matsete.

Kabinete amohetse ho thakgolwa ha Sitsi se setjha sa Tlhahiso sa Sandvik Khomanani mane Kempton Park, seo bileng karolo ya ditshepiso tse neng di etswe Sebokeng sa bone sa Matsete sa Afrika Borwa (SAIC) se neng se tshwaretswe Sandton Convention Centre ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2022 sa dimilione tse  .

src_text: Zamasiso .
tgt_text: Sitsi sena se setjha se bobatsi ba 62 000m², se kopantse tshebetso ya ditsi tse hlano tse neng di sebeletsa mona nakong fetileng mme se hirile batho ba ka bang.

src_text: Ikhabinethi yemukele ukuhlonywa kwesiKhungo sokuKhiqiza i-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park esingesitjha esaba yingcenye yesithembiso samasiso aziinGidi ezima-R350 esenziwa kuKhomferensi yesiNe yamaSiso yeSewula Afrika (i-SAIC) egade ibanjelwe e-Sandton Convention Centre eJwanasbhege mhla ama- 24 kuNtaka wee-..     Isikhungo esitjhesi esiziinkwere zamamitha azii-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenzi egade ngaphambilini ebeyenziwa eendaweni ezihlanu ezihlukeneko begodu simumethe abasebenzi ababalelwa ema-.
tgt_text: Sena ke se seng sa ditsi tse kgolo le tse tswetseng pele tsa Sandvik lefatsheng ka bophara mme se kgona ho hlahisa dipersente tse fetang tse 60 tsa tlhahiso Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Lesi singesinye seenkhungo zakwa-Sandvik ezikulu nezithuthuke khulu ephasini zombelele begodu sikghona ukukhiqiza imitjhini/abomakalanyana bokulayitjha emathunjini wephasi abakhandwe ngeengcenye zeensimbi ezenza ama-60% zeSewula Afrika..     IKhabinethi ilemukele nevakatjho likaMengameli u-Ramaphosa lokuyokuHlola KwaZulu-Natala nagade kuhlonywa isikhungo sokukhiqiza i-Hesto Harnessese e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ali-13 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinite boetse ya amohela ho etela ha Mopresidente ho thakgolweng ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa Hesto Harnesses mane Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Loetse.

src_text: Isikhungwesi sihlangana nezinye ezihlanu zamaphrojekthi ayingcenye wokusisa ayingcenye yesithembiso samaBhiliyoni ali-R. 4 esenziwe yikhampani i-Metair Investments Limited ukusekela umsebenzi wokunatjiswa nokukhuliswa komkhiqizo womhlobo omutjha we-Ford Ranger elizweni lekhethu.
tgt_text: Sitsi sena ke se seng sa diprojeke tse hlano tsa matsete tseo leng karolo ya matsete Metair Investments Limited dibilione tse  4 tlo tshehetsa katoloso ya tlhahiso ya mofuta motjha wa koloi ya Ford Ranger.

src_text: UMengameli ubuye wahlangela  ukuvulwa kwephrojekthi evuselelweko nenatjisiweko  i-Sappi Saiccor Mill ebize  amaBhiliyoni ali-R7,7 eMkhomazi, ekunqotjhwe ngayo ukwandisa ikghono lekhampani lokuphalisana ephasiniloke ngokunjalo kuvuleke namathuba womsebenzi wesikhatjhana newesikhathi eside..     Amasiso la ayingcenye yeenthembiso ezenziwa bosomabubulo kukhomferensi ye- SAIC.
tgt_text: Mopresidente ile boela etela le ho bulweng ha khamphane atolotsweng ya ha Sappi Saiccor Mill bitsang dibilione tse R7,7 mane Umkomaas ikemiseditseng ho atolla tlhodisano ya tshebetso ya yona maemong matjhaba ha mmoho le ho eketsa menyetla ya mosebetsi bakeng sa nako kgutshwane le telele..     Matsete ana ke mang ditshepiso tse neng di etswe ke diindasteri tsena ho SAIC.

src_text: Amasiso amatjha ngelizweni lekhethu asiza ekwakhiweni kabutjha nekuvuseleleni umnotho weKhethu godu amasiso la abeka iSewula Afrika ebujameni bokukarekelwa ngamanye amazwe ayibone ililizwe lapho kungasiswa khona.
tgt_text: Matsete mang le mang matjha naheng ena thusa letsholong la kahobotjha le tsoseletso ya moruo, mme hape tswela pele ho etsa Afrika Borwa sebaka se setle sa ho etsa matsete..     Ntshetsopele ya Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: Ukuthuthukiswa Komthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho bulwa ha karolo ntjha ya Mmila wa Ring Road wa Musina mane Limpopo tla bebofatsa kgwebelano ha mmoho le ho tsamaya ha batho Musina le dinaheng tsa boahisane tse ka borwa ho Afrika.

src_text: IKhabinethi yemukele ukuvulwa kwengcenye etja yendlela i-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo ezokwenza kukhambeke lula ngaphakathi kwedrobha ye-Musina begodu ngokuvumela ukwanda kwerhwebo nokwabelana ngezomnotho hlangana neSewula Afrika neHlangano eThuthukisa amaZwe angeSewula ye-Afrika.
tgt_text: Projeke ena ya dimilione tse R640 thehile mesebetsi ya moshwelella fetang 275 mme ya thehela le dikgwebo tse nyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo menyetla..     Ho ahwa ha mmila ona wa Musina Ring Road ke karolo ya leano la mmuso la meralo ya motheo tlasa lenaneo la ERRP, leo ka lona ho ikemiseditsweng ho theha le hona ho hodisa menyetla ya mesebetsi setjhabeng ho tswa makaleng fapafapaneng..     Koduwa ya Jagersfontein.

src_text: Iphrojekthi le ebize iinGidi ezima-R640 ivulele abantu bekhethu imisebenzi yasafuthi engaphezulu kwama-275 yanikela nangamathuba emiphakathini yendawo le kunye namabhizinisi asakhasako (ama-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwendlela i-Musina Ring Road kuyingcenye yehlelo likarhulumende lokuthuthukisa umthangalasisekelo, ngokusebenzisa iHlelo lokwAkha nokuVuselela umNotho (i-ERRP), kunqotjhwe ukukhulisa umnotho ohlanganyelweko namathuba wemisebenzi emikhakheni yoke nemiphakathini ehlukahlukeneko.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebisa kutlwelo bohloko ya yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka ona ka lebaka la ho phatloha ha letamo la morafo neng se sa sebediswe wa Jagersfontein mane Foreisitata ka Sontaha sa la 11 Loetse.

src_text: Ihlekelele ye-Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Koduwa ena sentse meralo mengata ya motheo esitana le matlo le dikoloi tsa batho..     Ketelong ya hae sebakeng sena sa koduwa ka Mantaha wa la 12 Loetse 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile thoholetsa matsapa neng se entswe ho leka ho thusa sebakeng seo ile ba ikana hore mmuso tla fana ka tshehetso hlokahalang setjhabeng seo sa Jagersfontein.

src_text: 1     Ikhabinethi ibalilela imbiko beyiyaduduza emindenini yalabo abahlongakele ngemva kokugirika kwamaboda wedamu lekhucukhucu yemikhiqizo yemayini ese-Jagersfontein eFreyistata lapha kwadaleka iinkhukhula zedaka ezadala umonakalo ngokuphuma kwelanga ngoSondo nakali-11 kuKhukhulamungu wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ya kgothatswa ke taba ya hore beng ba morafo ona ba ikemiseditse ho tshehetsa mmuso ka tshehetso ya setekginiki haeba ka kotjwa ke Moifo okametseng Dimenerale Afrika Borwa..     Indasteri ya merafo ke le leng la makala nang le seabo se seholo kgolong ya moruo wa naha ena ka ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi, ho romelwa ha thepa dinaheng tsa kantle ha mmoho le ho etsa matsete dinaheng tsa kantle, tseo tsohle tse tswelang batho ba dibaka tsa merafong molemo..     Mmuso le mekgatlo ikemetseng ba ile ba phallela ho thusa mahlatsipa ka dintho tse kang mepheme ya nakwana, ditshebeletso tsa ho thojwa maikutlo le ditlhoko tsa sethatho tse kang dikobo, mealo ha mmoho le dijo.

src_text: Ihlekelele le yone khulu umthangalasisekelo, ipahla yabantu eziinkoloyi neenkumba ezithileko.. 2     Ngesikhathi nakavakatjhele indawo yehlekelele ngoMvulo, mhla ali-12 kuKhukhulamungu wee-2022, uMengameli u-Ramaphosa uthokoze imizamo eyenziweko ukuhlenga ipilo nokufunyanwa kwabongazimbi endaweni leya.
tgt_text: Metsi le motlakase le tsona di boetse setlwaeding sebakeng sena..     Ha ho se ho hlwekisitswe sebakeng seo sa koduwa, boratekginiki ba tla hlahloba maemo matlo moo.

src_text: Wathembisa ukuthi urhulumende uzokunikela abahlali abathintekileko be-Jagersfontein ngesekelo elifaneleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso, mekgatlo ya setjhaba le setjhaba ka kakaretso ka ho phallela ka thuso..     Moruo.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ikhuthazekile ngokuthi abanikazi bemayini bathe bajame ngomumo ekunikeleni ngesizo lecwephetjhe nokusekela lokha nakungenzeka umKhandlu wezeNjiwa weSewula Afrika ubakhombele.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya sekaseka maemo moruo naha ena ho latela dipalopalo tse sa tswa lokollwa ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo (Stats SA) la naha ena tse bontshang ha tlhahiso ya thepa kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sena theohile ka persente tse 0,7%.

src_text: 3    Ibubulo lezeemayini lihlala limfakisandla oqakathekileko emnothweni ngemisebenzi enqophileko nengakanqophi, inzuzo ethunyelwa ngaphandle kwemikhawulo, namasiso wamazwe wangaphandle anqophileko godu lilima indima eqakathekileko ekwenzeni ngcono ipilo yemiphakathi emagega neemayini.
tgt_text: Hara dintlha tse bakileng phokotseho ena re ka bala ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ntwa ya Rashiya le Ukraine ha mmoho le ho nyoloha ha ditjeho tsa bophelo ka kakaretso..     Matsapa ileng etswa ka Lenaneo la Kahobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ile thusa haholo ho thibella ho lahleha ho hong ha mesebetsi ha mmoho le kgahlamelo mpe ya maemo matjhaba moruong wa rona.

src_text: 4    Urhulumende neenhlangano ezingasebenzeli ukwenza inzuzo zingenelele msinyana ngokunikela iindawo zokufihla ihloko kwesikhatjhana, ukwelulekwa ngokomkhumbulo neendingoqangi eziziingubo, abomatrasi neemphuthelwana zokugoma.
tgt_text: Matsapa ana mmuso bontsha katleho kgolo, mme bopaki ba teng bo bonahetse dipalopalong tsa Kotara tsa Stats SA tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Batho ba Sebetsang.

src_text: Ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nokusatjalaliswa kwegezi sekubuyiselwe esigeni.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsena di bontsha ha le batho ba 648 000 ba fumaneng mesebetsi pakeng tsa kotara ya pele le ya bobedi ya selemo sa     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
Ho Behwa Leihlo le ho Lekolwa Botjha (M&E) ha Moralo wa Leano la Naha la Batjha (NYP).

src_text: 5    Nasele kuhlwengiswe icabazi lehlekelele, abosonjiniyera balindeleke bona bayokuhlola umonakalo owenzekileko nokuphepha kweenkumba.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana moralo wa M&E mme tla matlafatsa ho behwa leihlo ha ditshiya tsa NYP 2020-.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze besizo elirhabako, iinhlangano zomphakathi namalunga womphakathi ngeminikelo nesizo labo.
tgt_text: Moralo ona na le dipontsho tse hlano tse tsamaisanang le ditshiya tsa NYP.

src_text: Zomnotho .
tgt_text: Dipontsho tsena di ile tsa thehwa ka tshebedisano mmoho le bankakarolo ba nang le thahasello tshehetsong le ntshetsopeleng ya batjha naheng ena.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhulumisene ngobujamo bomnotho welizwe ngemva kweembalobalo zamhlapha ezikhutjhwe LiZiko leemBalobalo leSewula Afrika (i-Stats SA)   ezitjengisa ukuthi iNgeniso yangeKhaya ePheleleko (i-GDP) kukota yesibili emnyakeni wee-2022 yehle nge-0,7%.
tgt_text: Dintlha tsa teng di tla arolwa ho ya ka dilemo, bonng, maemo ho itekanela, morabe ha mmoho le dibaka..     Ho behwa leihlo hona ho tla etsuwa maemong ohle mmuso ha mmoho le lekaleng le ikemetseng.

src_text: Abonobangela bokwehlokhu bafaka hlangana ukucinywacinywa kwegezi kwenzelelwa ukuyonga, ipi ehlangana kwe-Russia ne-Ukraine nezinga lepilo elikhuphukileko kunye nentengotjhuguluko.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya teng tla bokeletswa jwalo ka kotara mme phatlalatswe habedi ka selemo..     Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo.

src_text: Amagadango athethweko ngaphasi kwe-ERRP adambise umthelela omumbi obewulethwa miraro yomnotho yamazwe wangaphetjheya, avikela godu imisebenzi neendlela zokuziphilisa zabantu.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo mmusong oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho hlwaya dikgeo tse teng moralong wa ha jwale..     Matsapa ana rerilweng, ka ona ho ikemiseditswe ho shebana le ho hloleha ho etsa meralo maemong ka boraro mmuso.

src_text: Ukungenelela kukarhulumende kuthoma ukuba nemiphumela emihle njengokutjho kwemiphumela yeHlolo yezomSebenzi yaQobe Kota ekhutjhwe yi-StatsSA etjengise ukuthi kwavulwa imisebezi engaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima-648 hlangana kwekota yokuthoma neyesibili yomnyaka wee-     IinQunto zeKhabinethi.
tgt_text: Matsapa ana tla tla ka lenaneo le bontshang bopaki le tla beha tshebetso leihlo.

src_text: Umtlamo wokuTjheja nokuHlunga (i-M&E) umThethomgomo weLutjha weliZweloke (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Leano lena le boetse le tla le leano la tjhebelopele la nako telele bohareng le kgutshwane maemong ohle mmuso..     Sena se tla thusa ho tla le diphetoho melaong ka maikemisetso ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano meralong le tjhebelong pele..     Ho Amohelwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha Akgente ya Meriana ya Seafrika (AMA).

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele umtlamo we-M&E ozokghonakalisa ukutjhejisisa nokuhlola umthelela weensika ze-NYP ka-2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha AMA le ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.

src_text: Umtlamo lo unikela ngamatshwayo amahlanu akhambisana neensika ze-NYP.
tgt_text: Sena se tla thusa ho theha tumellano eo ho neng ho dumellanwe ka yona Palamente ya Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.

src_text: Amatshwayo la atlanywa nababambisani abanqophileko abanetjisakalo ekuthuthukisweni kwelutjha ngelizweni.
tgt_text: Ka tumellano ena, ho tla thehwa AMA bakeng sa kontinente ya Afrika.

src_text: Ukubuthelelwa kwemininingwana kuzokuhlukaniswa ukuya ngokweminyaka, ubulili, ukukhubazeka, ubutjhaba nobujamo bendawo ngamano la wokungenelela..     Ukuhlunga kuzokwenziwa kiyo yoke imikhakha karhulumende, amabubulo nemakhapanini wangeqadi..     ITlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko.
tgt_text: Akgente ena tla laola meriana yohle ya kontinente ena mme ntlafatse le polokeho le tshebediso ya yona..     Ho tekenwa ha tumellano ena ho tla ntshetsa pele boinehelo ba Afrika Borwa matjhabeng ba ho ntlafatsa ho laolwa ha meriana kontinenteng ena..     Tlaleho Tshebetsong ya Dipatlisiso le Ntshetsong Pele (R&D) ya Lenaneo la Merokotso ya Lekgetho – 2019/20 le 2020/.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele iTlhatlha lomThethomgomo weHlelo eliHlanganyelweko kurhulumende, elinqophe ukuqalana neenkhala ezikhona kumthethomgomo wokuhlela ehlelweni lokuhlela lagadesi.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Lenaneo la R&D la Merokotso ya Lekgetho la dilemo tse pedi tse fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).

src_text: Amano wokungenelela ahlongozwako azokuqalana nokutlhayela kokulinganiswa kokuhlela nemikhakha yomithathu karhulumende.
tgt_text: Sena se tsamaisana le karoloya bo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho, wa 1962 (Molao wa bo 58 wa 1962) bolelang tlhokeho ya ho tliswa ha ditlaleho tsena Palamenteng..     Lenaneo lena la merokotso ya lekgetho le kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ikemetseng ho tsetela ho R&D le ho tshehetsa kgolo ya matsete.

src_text: Ukungenelela lokhu kuzokwethula ihlelo lokuhlunga elifakazelekako.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena le tshehetsa ntlafatso ya saense le mahlale kgolong ya moruo le matlafatsong ya tlhodisano..     Kabinete kgotsofetse ka tlaleho ena bontshang dikhamphane tse ntjha tse kentseng dikopo tsa merokotso ya lekgetho.

src_text: Itlhatlheli lomthethomgomo lethula godu ihlelo elibonakala lula ngokuhlela emikhakheni karhulumende isikhathi eside ukuya kesiphakathi nesifitjhani.
tgt_text: Sena se kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ngata ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho hodisa matsete tsona le ho matlafatsa kgolo ya moruo..     Dikhamphane tse nne tse ka pele lenaneong lena la merokotso ya lekgetho ke tsa lekala la tlhahiso ya tsa temo, tsa merafo, tsa dikhemikhale, ditlolo, meriana, setekginiki le tsa thekenoloji ya dikhomputara mme Kabinete nkile makala ana la ona ka Sehloohong Leanong la Meralo ya Diindasteri.

src_text: Lizokusebenzela ukwethula amatjhuguluko wezomthetho ukuThuthukisa ukukhambelana nomphumela olindelekileko ekuhleleni kukarhulumende nekuhlungeni..     Ukwamukelwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwe-Ejensi yemiTjhoga ye-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Tlaleho feletseng ka fumaneha ho websaete ya Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramo ya Afrika ya Menyetla ya Kgolo (AGOA) –.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukutlikitlwa kwesiVumelwano sokuTlanywa kwesiVumelwano i-AMA nokwethulwa kwaso ePalamende.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Foramo ya AGOA ya.

src_text: Lokhu kuzokuphumelelisa isivumelwano esasayinwa siGungu seHlangano yobuNye bamaZwe we-Afrika ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: AGOA ne thakgolwe ke naha ya Amerika ka selemo sa 2000 ho fana ka tshebedisano ya tsa kgwebo dinaheng tse ka tlase ho lehwatata la Sahara..     Thumello ya thepa ya Afrika Borwa ka tlasa lenaneo la AGOA kenyeletsa ditholwana, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolwana tsa dikoloi, menerale ya ho etsa tshepe, tshepe le dihlahiswa tsa dikhemikhale.

src_text: Isivumelwanesi sethulela ikhonthinenti i-AMA ngokusemthethweni.
tgt_text: Sebaka le letsatsi la seboka seo di tla phatlalatswa ha nako ntse tsamaya..     Seboka sa Matona sa Tlhahlobo ya Lefatshe (GEO) –.

src_text: I-ejensi le izokulawula imikhiqizo yezokwelapha godu ithuthukise ukuphepha kufikelelwe imiphumela enqotjhiweko ngemikhiqizo yokwelapha kukhonthinenti.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matona sa GEO mane Kapa ka.

src_text: Ukutlikitlwa nokuvunyelwa kwesivumelwanesi kuzokuthuthukisa ukuzibophelela kweSewula Afrika ephasini nakukhothinenti mayelana nokuqinisa ihlelo lokulawula imikhiqizo yezepilo..     Umbiko ngokuSebenza kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa  (i-R&D)  – yomnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/.
tgt_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa kopanelo wa mmuso neng thehwe ka selemo sa 2003 ka mora Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Ntshetsopele se neng se tshwarwe ka.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende kweHlelo leKuthazomthelo kezokuRhubhulula nokuThuthukisa (i-R&D) leminyaka emibili edlulileko (Umnyaka wee-2019/20 newee-2020/21).
tgt_text: Lena ke lepatlelo leo dinaha tse fapafapaneng di fanang ka kabelo ya tsona molemong le mong wa ho aha tshebeletso ya GEO..     Ha jwale GEO na le ditho tsa mebuso ya dinaha tse fetang tse 113, mme tse 30 tsa tsona ke tsa mona Afrika.

src_text: Lokhu kukhambisana nesigaba se-11D (17) somThetho weButhelelo lomThelo we-1962 (umThetho Nomboro 58 we-1962), odinga bona imibiko le yethulwe ePalamende.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho se ka sehloohong ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 mme borasaense ba rona ke karolo ya dipatlisiso tse ngata tse etswang ke GEO..     Mphalane Kgwedi ya Dipalangwang (OTM) –.

src_text: Ihlelo leKuthazomthelo linqophe ukukhuthaza amakhampani wangeqadi ukusisa ku-R&D kobana kunzinziswe ukukhula kwamasiso.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.

src_text: Likghonakalisa ukuthuthukiswa kwesayensi nekghono lokusungula imikhiqizo emitjha ngehloso yokukhulisa umnotho begodu kukhuthaza nokuphalisana.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ithabile ukuthi umbiko utjengisa ukuthi amakhampani amatjha enze isibawo sesibonelelo somthelo.
tgt_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.

src_text: Ukhuthaza amanye amakhampani ukufikelela iskimu lesi njengengcenye yokukhulisa amasiso wawo nokusimamisa ukukhula komnotho.
tgt_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.

src_text: Amakhampani aphezulu amane ekungiwo afumana isibonelelo somthelo asemkhiqizweni wezokulima, zeemayini, amakhemikhali; ubunikazi beemayini; amakhemikhali, zokuziphotjhonga, imikhakha yeenhlahla yobuqharhaqharha bethekniki nelwazi lamakhompyutha evunyelwe yiKhabinethi njengemikhakha emaqaloqangi eHlelweni lokuThuthukisa amaBubulo.
tgt_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.

src_text: Umbiko ozeleko uyafumaneka kubunzinzolwazi bomNyango wezeSayensi nobuKghwari ku-www.dst.gov.za..     IForamu Yokukhuliswa Komnotho namaThuba e-Afrika (i-AGOA) Yomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kweForamu i-AGOA ngomnyaka wee-.
I-AGOA yenziwa yabamthetho yi-United States of America (i-USA) ngomnyaka wee-2000 ukunikela ukuzikhethela ngezerhwebo emazweni amanengi we-Afrika engeSewula nemamakethe we-USA.
tgt_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: Imikhiqizo yeSewula Afrika ngaphasi kwe-AGOA ifaka hlangana iinthelo ezigonywako, amantongomani, iinkoloyi, iinsimbi zeenkoloyi, i-ayoni, isimbi nemikhiqizo yekhemikhali.
tgt_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.

src_text: Kusazokumenyezelwa ilanga nendawo ekuzokubanjelwa kiyo iforamu le.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.

src_text: UmButhano waboNgqongqotjhe wesiQhema esiThunywe ukuButhelela iLwazijikelele ngePhasi (i-GEO) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele iSewula Afrika ukubamba umButhano waboNgqongqotjhe we- GEO eKapa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.

src_text: I-GEO iyihlangano yaborhulumende eyahlonywa ngomnyaka we-2003 ngemva komButhano wePhasiloke weTuthuko eNzinzileko.
tgt_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.

src_text: Umbuthano lo usebenza njengekundla emikhakhaminengi lapho amazwe azinikela ngokufaka isandla emnqopheni ofanako wokwakha amahlelo we-GEO.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.

src_text: I-GEO njenganje inaborhulumende bamazwe abangaphezu kwe-113, abama-30 babo ngebe-Afrika kanti iinhlangano ezizibandakanyako ezili-140, ezili-11 zazo ngeze-Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: ISewula Afrika kade ililunga leKomidi yesiGungu esiPhezulu ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2005 begodu njenganje abososayeni belizwe lekhethu bayazibandakanya emahlelweni wezerhubhululo adoswa phambili yi-GEO.
tgt_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).

src_text: USewula yiNyanga yeenThuthi (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukuhlonywa kwejima le-OTM ngoMgqibelo nali-1 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Sishov’ingolovane: sisoke sakha umthangalasisekelo weenthuthi owakha nonzinzisa iindlela zokuziphilisa”.
tgt_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).

src_text: I-OTM yaqobe mnyaka iyelelisa ngeenthuthi njengenye yamatshwayo aqakathekileko ekukhuleni komnotho nokuthuthuka okusabaleleko.
tgt_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.

src_text: Kunezinto ezizokwenziwa ukukhangisa imikhakha ehlukileko yomthangalasisekelo weenthuthi kezemmoyeni, zemanzini, iinthuthi zomphakathi neendlela.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.

src_text: Okhunye okuzokwenziwa kuzokuba kuyelelisa mayelana nokuphepha ngaphakathi kweenthuthi nokuvikeleka emkhakheni weenthuthi.
tgt_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.

src_text: Urhulumende uhlala azibophelele ekuthuthukiseni umthangalasisekelo wezeenthuthi, eendaweni zemakhaya nezedrobheni, ukuze kuphunyeleliswe ukuthuthwa kwepahla nabantu..     UmHlangano weHlangano yeenTjhaba eziBumbeneko (i-UN) weHlelo lezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu (i-UN-HABITAT).
tgt_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukubanjwa komhlangano wamalunga we-UN-HABITAT eJwanisbhege mhla ali- 16 ukufikela nakali-17 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.
Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.

src_text: UmNyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabaNtu uzokuhlela umhlangano lo wamalanga amabili ozokukhanjelwa badosiphambili bezepolitiki, izazi ezibasebenzi kilomkhakha nabarhubhululi, kufaka hlangana amalunga aqakathekileko weKomidi yabaJameli basaFuthi be-UN-HABITAT abanzinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.

src_text: Amaphuzu aqakathekileko azokufaka hlangana ukungenelela kwamatjhuguluko eendaweni zemitlhatlhana nalezo eziminyeneko..     Imiphumela yemikhulumiswano le izokufikela esitlhorini sokuhlonywa kweTlhatlha leHlelo lokuSebenza lePhasiloke, elizokwethulwa emKhandlwini we-UN-HABITAT ngomnyaka wee-     ImiThethomlingwa.
tgt_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke wezeNturhu eQothele bobuLili obuThileko nokuBulawa kwabaNtu abaSikazi (i-GBVF) womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Ikhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa womKhandlu weliZweloke we-GBVF womnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo uqalelela itlhatlha lomthetho lokuhlonywa kwehlangano ezokusiza ngokungenelela ekuruthuleni ngomrabhu i-GBVF.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.

src_text: Uqalelela godu ukuhlonywa kweBhodi yomKhandlu ezokusiza nokutjheja ukwethulwa kweQhinga lokulwisana ne-GBVF leliZweloke, elavunyelwa yiKhabinethi ngoSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.

src_text: Ibhodi le izokuba nobujameli beenhlangano zomphakathi obuma-51% nama-49% wembusweni.
tgt_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlule esigabeni sokulalelwa mphakathi bewuveze amazizo ngawo..     UmThethomlingwa Wokulawulwa Kwemikhiqizo yeGwayi  neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibuLekthroniki wee-.
tgt_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: IKhabinethi ivumele ukwethulwa ePalamende komThethomlingwa wemiKhiqizo yeGwayi neGwayi Elibhenywa Ngeensetjenziswa ezibu-Lekhthroniki wee-2018, onqophe ukwesula umThetho we-1993 (umThetho Nomboro 83 womNyaka we-1993)  wokuLawula imikhiqizo yeGwayi, njengombana ukhitjelelwe.
tgt_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo unqophe ukuqinisa amagadango wezamaphilo womphakathi ngomnqopho wowuwukhambelanisa nesiVumelwano seKoro yeHlangano yezePilo ePhasiniloke eQalelela ukuLawula ukuBhenywa kweGwayi.
tgt_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo utjhukumisa hlangana nokhunye, iindawo ezingaphakathi nezingaphandle kwemakhiwo ekungakafaneli nakancani ukukhokhelwa igwayi ngakizo; ukupheliswa kokuthengwa kwegwayi emitjhinini, uqinise nokupakwa kwegwayi netshwayo eliyelelisako.
tgt_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.

src_text: UmThethomlingwa lo sele udlulile esigabeni esingeneleleko sokukhulumisana nababelani, kufaka hlangana ibubulo legwayi, iinhlangano zomphakathi neminyango karhulumende ethintekako     Iminyanya Ezako.
tgt_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.

src_text: UmButhano wama-77 weBandla Jikelele le-UN (i-UNGA77).
tgt_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.

src_text: ISewula Afrika iyingcenge ye-UNGA77 ebanjwe e-Ofisi eliKhulu le-UN e-New York City e-USA ukuthoma mhlana ama-20 ukufikela nakama-27 kuSewula wee-2022 ngaphasi kommongondaba othi: “Isikhathi Somlando: Ukutherhula ipengu ezokuletha amatjhuguluko emirarweni ehlobanako”.
tgt_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Emazweni angeSewula, umthelela kezomnotho nakezehlalakuhle wehlekelele yobuLwele beNgogwana i-Corona (i-COVID-19) awulingani mayelana nokuvuselelwa emazweni athuthukileko ngeTlhagwini godu lokhu kubiza ukubambisana kizo zoke iintjhaba ukuqinisekisa kobana akunalizwe elisalelako..     Ukwandulela iKulumopikiswano ye-UN, uNobhala Zombelele we-UN, uNom.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.

src_text: António Guterres, uzokubiza umhlangano omayelana “Nokuletha Amatjhuguluko kezeFundo” abambe nomhlangano wezinga eliphezulu omayelana nemiNqopho yokuThuthukisa ukuNzinza (ama-SDG).
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).

src_text: Ukutholakala Kwamanzi.
tgt_text: Paballo ya Metsi.

src_text: IKhabinethi ithokoze amaSewula Afrika ngokuhlonipha kwawo imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi ekhe yabekelwa iindawo ezithileko zangeJwanisbhege, e-Tshwane kunye ne-Ekurhuleni ngomnqopho wokunzinzisa umthamo wamanzi eenlulwini zamanzi kileziindawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.

src_text: Amadamu neenlulu zamanzi zilokhu zingaphasi kwegandelelo e-Gauteng ngenca yomtjhiso osahleleko amalanga la, kanti-ke njengoba asolo afunwa ngobunengi nje amanzi, i-Rand Water ibe yakateleleka ukuthi ibanciphisele khulu amanzi abomasipala beendawezi.
tgt_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.

src_text: Ihlangano yamanzi le iphakela umthamo wamanzi abantu abangaphezulu kweengidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, nakezinye iindawo zeMpumalanga, iFreyistata kunye neTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.
Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.

src_text: Lokhu kuqinteliswa kwamanzi esingeze sakubalekela kunqophe ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi, kanti-ke azokusolo aqinteliswe njalo bekube mhlazana kuba nobungcono kilobubujamo bezinto.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombele umphakathi ukuthi usolo ulandela imibandela yokuqinteliswa kwamanzi, ulime indimawo ngokubabalela amanzi njengoba ayindlala kangaka nje.
tgt_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.

src_text: Ukunghalwa Komsebenzi Kwa-Transnet.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu esenziwe hlangana kwe-Transnet neyuniyoni yabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esithoma ukusebenza ngomhla wo-01 kuSihlabantangana wee-2022 ukuyokufika nakama-31 kuNtaka wee-.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Imikhulumiswano yalesisivumelwano beyenganyelwe yiKomitjhini yokuThobelana, ukuColela nokuLamula, lesisivumelwano-ke siqede khonokho ukunghalwa komsebenzi malunga we-UNTU.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.

src_text: IKhabinethi ibuye yasithokozela nesiqunto seyuniyoni i-South African Transport and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokuqeda ukunghalwa komsebenzi.
tgt_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.

Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.

src_text: IKhabinethi isithokozele isibopho se-Transnet sokuqalana nokuqeda ukusalela emva komsebenzi okwenzeke emadoyelweni wemikhumbi nesiporweni njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje, ngaleyindlela kwathikaziseka umnotho namakoro athembele kiwo.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.
Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: IKhabinethi izwakalise ukuthokoza kwayo ngesekelo nebambiswano elinikelwe mabhizinisi njengoba bekunghalwe umsebenzi nje.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.

src_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwano obungapheliko hlangana kwabaphathi bakwa-Transnet nebamayuniyoni kobanyana kuzokusizakala ikhampani le nomnotho welizwe.
tgt_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.

src_text: Ubudlelwano BeSewula Afrika Ne-Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilithokozele iVakatjho lomSebenzi elibe yipumelelo likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokuya emBusweni we-Saudi Arabia ngomhla we-15 ukufikela ngomhla we-16 kuSewula wee-.
tgt_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.

src_text: Evakatjhwenelo, amazwe amabili lawa atlikitle iimVumelwano zokuZwana (ama-MoU) ezili-17 emakorweni ahlukahlukileko, njengeyezokulima, yokuthiya iinhlambi, yokumayina, yegezi evuselelwako, yezokuphepha, zokuthutha kunye nokufuywa kweenyamazana zamanzi nokulinywa kweentjalo zamanzi.
tgt_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.

src_text: Amanye ama-MoU atlikitliweko ngamalungana nokusungulwa komKhandlu wezamaBhizinisi oHlanganyelweko, ukusebenzisana kezamabubulo weenkhali nokuthengwa kweensetjenziswa zepi kunye nezokusebenzisana ngerhubhululo lebhoduluko.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.
Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.

src_text: UMengameli usebenzise ivakatjhweli ukumema abosomabhizinisi be-Saudi Arabia ekhonferensini yamasiso yesihlanu yeSewula Afrika ezokubanjwa ngomnyaka wee-.
tgt_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe lesibili ngobukhulu emazweni we-Middle East arhwebelana neSewula Afrika, kanti-ke ngiyo emthombo omkhulu ukudlula yoke esiphandeni sekhabo kathengisela iSewula Afrika ipahla.
tgt_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.

src_text: Ubudlelwano bamazwe ngamazwe hlangana kwamazwe amabili la, benze ukuthi kube nokurhwebelana nokusiselana okuhle.
tgt_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.

src_text: Ukusisa Kumthangalasisekelo.
tgt_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukugunyazwa kokwakhiwa kwefemu eyenza iplastiki yezinga eliphezulu e-Lanseria, e-Gauteng, ezakwakhiwa yi-ALPLA Group emkhiqizi wamazwe ngamazwe.
tgt_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.
Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuqinisa isibopho sikaMengameli Ramaphosa sokulungiselela ukuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo njengendlela yokukhuthaza ukuhluma komnotho nokwandiswa kwemisebenzi.
tgt_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.
Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.

src_text: Amasiso weengidi ezima-US$50 aliliqha eliqakathekileko eplanini ye-Lanseria Smart City ezakusekela ukubambelela nokusetjenziswa kweensetjenziswa ngobutjha beyisize nokuvulwa nokulondwa kwemisebenzi ema-.
tgt_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Hlanganapho kubalwe nehlelo lokuthwasisela abantu abama-36 umsebenzi wama-mechatronic nabosocwephetjhe bokusebenzisa iinsetjenziswa ngobutjha emisebenzini ye-ALPLA Group e-Afrika engeSewula.
tgt_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.

src_text: Ihlelo lokufundiselwa umsebenzeli lizokuthoma ngomnyaka wee-2023, la kuzokuthonywa khona ngabantu abali-12 beSewula Afrika abavela eendaweni zakhona kilesisifunda.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.

src_text: Ukumayina Ngokungasi Semthethweni.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.

src_text: Ukumayina ngokungasi semthethweni kulimaza umphakathi nomnotho welizwe lekhethu, bekubangele nokuthi urhulumende nekoro yeemayini balahlekelwe yimali.

tgt_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikuthokozele ukufunyanwa kwetjathokazi leengidi nokubotjhwa kwabasolwa abama-20 abahlotjaniswa nokumayina ngokungasi semthethweni, ababotjhwe lokhuya abathobelisimthetho nabebahlola umgodi wemayini ye-Stilfontein eTlhagwini Tjingalanga.
tgt_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.

src_text: IKhabinethi ikhombela amaSewula Afrika ukuthi aragele phambili asebenzisane nabathobelisimthetho ukuqinisekisa ipumelelo yamajima alwisana nobulelesi.
tgt_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.

src_text: Lokhu-ke kuzakuthumela umlayezo onamandla othi ubulelesi abunamvuzo, nothi izelelesi zizakubotjhwa bezitjhutjhiswe ngaphandle kwevalo nokurhawukelwa.
Iindaba Zegezi.
tgt_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).

src_text: Mhlapha u-Eskom utlikitle iimvumelwano zama-30 weminyaka zokuthenga sakuqatjha nabaphehli begezi abazijameleko abane abazakwakha iimphehligezi ezitja ezingasilaphazi ummoya eMajuba neThuthuka, eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Ukuqatjhiswa kwenarha kilelijima kuzakudosa amasiso alinganiselwa ema-R40 wamabhiliyoni.
tgt_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.
Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.

src_text: Abasisaba begezi abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ubuncani bakhona bazakungezelela igezi ezii-2000 zama-megawatt ethungelelwaneni legezi lelizwe.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: Amandla amatjha wokuphehlwa kwegezi kulindeleke ukuthi athungelelwe ethungelelwaneni legezi kungakapheli iinyanga ezima-24 ukuya kezima-36 ukusukela esikhathini sokutlikitlwa kwemitlolo yesekelo leemali, kuye ngokuthi iindaba zebhoduluko, zokusikwa kwenarha nezinye ezifuna imvumo zizakusetjenzwa ziqedwe ngesikhathi esingangani.
tgt_text: Moralo ona ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa 2021 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..  Moralo ona fana ka ditshiya tse hlano mabapi le ho ntlafatsa Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

Ditshiya tsena di kenyeletsa tsela ya kamohelo ya ba sa tswa hirwa Ditshebeletsong tsa Mmuso; tataiso ya mosebetsi ho ba sa tswa hirwa; meralo le ho behwa leihlo ha tsela eo basebeletsi ba sebetsang ka yona; thupello tswellang ha mmoho le menyetla ya ntlafatso ya maemo thuto..   Diphetoho dipehelong tsa kgiro ya Balaodi Kakaretso (bo DG).

src_text: Ukutholakala Kokugoma Okwaneleko.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho sisinyang dipehelo le boiphihlelo boo ba hirwang jwalo ka Balaodi Kakaretso Mafapheng Mmuso ba tlamehang ho ba le bona.
